388#ifdef __ANDROID__
389void prepareSlider(wxSlider* slider) {
390 slider->GetHandle()->setStyleSheet(
391 prepareAndroidSliderStyleSheet(slider->GetSize().x));
392 slider->GetHandle()->setAttribute(Qt::WA_AcceptTouchEvents);
393 slider->GetHandle()->grabGesture(Qt::PanGesture);
394 slider->GetHandle()->grabGesture(Qt::SwipeGesture);
395}
396#endif
397
398// sort callback for Connections list Sort by priority.
399int wxCALLBACK SortConnectionOnPriority(wxIntPtr item1, wxIntPtr item2,
400 wxIntPtr list) {
401 wxListCtrl* lc = reinterpret_cast<wxListCtrl*>(list);
402
403 wxListItem it1, it2;
404 it1.SetId(lc->FindItem(-1, item1));
405 it1.SetColumn(3);
406 it1.SetMask(it1.GetMask() | wxLIST_MASK_TEXT);
407
408 it2.SetId(lc->FindItem(-1, item2));
409 it2.SetColumn(3);
410 it2.SetMask(it2.GetMask() | wxLIST_MASK_TEXT);
411
412 lc->GetItem(it1);
413 lc->GetItem(it2);
414
415#ifdef __WXOSX__
416 return it1.GetText().CmpNoCase(it2.GetText());
417#else
418 return it2.GetText().CmpNoCase(it1.GetText());
419#endif
420}
421
423
424class ChartDirPanelHardBreakWrapper : public wxTextWrapper {
425public:
426 ChartDirPanelHardBreakWrapper(wxWindow* win, const wxString& text,
427 int widthMax) {
428 m_lineCount = 0;
429
430 // Replace all spaces in the string with a token character '^'
431 wxString textMod = text;
432 textMod.Replace(" ", "^");
433
434 // Replace all path separators with spaces
435 wxString sep = wxFileName::GetPathSeparator();
436 textMod.Replace(sep, " ");
437
438 Wrap(win, textMod, widthMax);
439
440 // walk the output array, repairing the substitutions
441 for (size_t i = 0; i < m_array.GetCount(); i++) {
442 wxString a = m_array[i];
443 a.Replace(" ", sep);
444 if (m_array.GetCount() > 1) {
445 if (i < m_array.GetCount() - 1) a += sep;
446 }
447 a.Replace("^", " ");
448 m_array[i] = a;
449 }
450 }
451 wxString const& GetWrapped() const { return m_wrapped; }
452 int const GetLineCount() const { return m_lineCount; }
453 wxArrayString GetLineArray() { return m_array; }
454
455protected:
456 virtual void OnOutputLine(const wxString& line) {
457 m_wrapped += line;
458 m_array.Add(line);
459 }
460 virtual void OnNewLine() {
461 m_wrapped += '\n';
462 m_lineCount++;
463 }
464
465private:
466 wxString m_wrapped;
467 int m_lineCount;
468 wxArrayString m_array;
469};
470
471class OCPNChartDirPanel : public wxPanel {
472public:
473 OCPNChartDirPanel(wxWindow* parent, wxWindowID id, const wxPoint& pos,
474 const wxSize& size, ChartDirInfo& cdi);
475 ~OCPNChartDirPanel();
476
477 void DoChartSelected();
478 void SetSelected(bool selected);
479 void OnPaint(wxPaintEvent& event);
480 // void OnEraseBackground( wxEraseEvent &event );
481 void OnSize(wxSizeEvent& event);
482 ChartDirInfo GetCDI() { return m_cdi; }
483 int GetUnselectedHeight() { return m_unselectedHeight; }
484 int GetRefHeight() { return m_refHeight; }
485 bool IsSelected() { return m_bSelected; }
486 void OnClickDown(wxMouseEvent& event);
487 void OnClickUp(wxMouseEvent& event);
488
489private:
490 // shopPanel *m_pContainer;
491 bool m_bSelected;
492 wxColour m_boxColour;
493 int m_unselectedHeight;
494 wxString m_pChartDir;
495 int m_refHeight;
496 ChartDirInfo m_cdi;
497
498 DECLARE_EVENT_TABLE()
499};
500
501BEGIN_EVENT_TABLE(OCPNChartDirPanel, wxPanel)
502EVT_PAINT(OCPNChartDirPanel::OnPaint)
503// EVT_ERASE_BACKGROUND( OCPNChartDirPanel::OnEraseBackground)
504EVT_SIZE(OCPNChartDirPanel::OnSize)
505END_EVENT_TABLE()
506
507OCPNChartDirPanel::OCPNChartDirPanel(wxWindow* parent, wxWindowID id,
508 const wxPoint& pos, const wxSize& size,
509 ChartDirInfo& cdi)
510 : wxPanel(parent, id, pos, size, wxBORDER_NONE) {
511 m_pChartDir = cdi.fullpath;
512
513 // On Android, shorten the displayed path name by removing well-known prefix
514 if (cdi.fullpath.StartsWith(
515 "/storage/emulated/0/Android/data/org.opencpn.opencpn/files"))
516 m_pChartDir = "..." + cdi.fullpath.Mid(58);
517
518 m_cdi = cdi;
519 m_bSelected = false;
520
521 m_refHeight = GetCharHeight();
522
523 m_unselectedHeight = 2 * m_refHeight;
524
525 // #ifdef __ANDROID__
526 // m_unselectedHeight = 2 * m_refHeight;
527 // #endif
528
529 SetMinSize(wxSize(-1, m_unselectedHeight));
530
531 Connect(wxEVT_LEFT_DOWN, wxMouseEventHandler(OCPNChartDirPanel::OnClickDown),
532 NULL, this);
533#ifdef __ANDROID__
534 Connect(wxEVT_LEFT_UP, wxMouseEventHandler(OCPNChartDirPanel::OnClickUp),
535 NULL, this);
536#endif
537}
538
539OCPNChartDirPanel::~OCPNChartDirPanel() {}
540
541static wxStopWatch swclick;
542#ifdef __ANDROID__
543static int downx, downy;
544#endif
545
546void OCPNChartDirPanel::OnClickDown(wxMouseEvent& event) {
547#ifdef __ANDROID__
548 swclick.Start();
549 event.GetPosition(&downx, &downy);
550#else
551 DoChartSelected();
552#endif
553}
554
555void OCPNChartDirPanel::OnClickUp(wxMouseEvent& event) {
556#ifdef __ANDROID__
557 qDebug() << swclick.Time();
558 if (swclick.Time() < 200) {
559 int upx, upy;
560 event.GetPosition(&upx, &upy);
561 if ((fabs(upx - downx) < GetCharWidth()) &&
562 (fabs(upy - downy) < GetCharWidth())) {
563 DoChartSelected();
564 }
565 }
566 swclick.Start();
567#endif
568}
569
570void OCPNChartDirPanel::DoChartSelected() {
571 if (!m_bSelected) {
572 SetSelected(true);
573 // m_pContainer->SelectChart( this );
574 } else {
575 SetSelected(false);
576 // m_pContainer->SelectChart( (OCPNChartDirPanel*)NULL );
577 }
578}
579
580void OCPNChartDirPanel::SetSelected(bool selected) {
581 m_bSelected = selected;
582
583 if (selected) {
584 m_boxColour =
585 wxSystemSettings::GetColour(wxSystemColour::wxSYS_COLOUR_HIGHLIGHT);
586 } else {
587 m_boxColour =
588 wxSystemSettings::GetColour(wxSystemColour::wxSYS_COLOUR_WINDOW);
589 }
590
591 Refresh(true);
592
593 g_pOptions->SetDirActionButtons();
594}
595
596// void OCPNChartDirPanel::OnEraseBackground( wxEraseEvent &event )
597// {
598// }
599
600void OCPNChartDirPanel::OnSize(wxSizeEvent& event) {
601 if (m_pChartDir.Length()) {
602 int x, y;
603 GetClientSize(&x, &y);
604
605 ChartDirPanelHardBreakWrapper wrapper(this, m_pChartDir, x * 9 / 10);
606 wxArrayString nameWrapped = wrapper.GetLineArray();
607
608 SetMinSize(wxSize(-1, (nameWrapped.GetCount() + 1) * m_refHeight));
609 }
610
611 event.Skip();
612}
613
614void OCPNChartDirPanel::OnPaint(wxPaintEvent& event) {
615 int width, height;
616 GetSize(&width, &height);
617 wxPaintDC dc(this);
618
619 dc.SetPen(*wxTRANSPARENT_PEN);
620 dc.SetBrush(wxBrush(GetBackgroundColour()));
621 dc.DrawRectangle(GetVirtualSize());
622
623 wxString nameString = m_pChartDir;
624 ChartDirPanelHardBreakWrapper wrapper(this, nameString, width * 9 / 10);
625 wxArrayString nameWrapped = wrapper.GetLineArray();
626
627 if (height < (int)(nameWrapped.GetCount() + 1) * m_refHeight) {
628 SetMinSize(wxSize(-1, (nameWrapped.GetCount() + 1) * m_refHeight));
629 GetParent()->GetSizer()->Layout();
630 }
631
632 if (m_bSelected) {
633 dc.SetBrush(wxBrush(m_boxColour));
634
635 dc.SetPen(wxPen(wxColor(0xCE, 0xD5, 0xD6), 3));
636
637 dc.DrawRoundedRectangle(0, 0, width - 1, height - 1, height / 10);
638
639 int offset = height / 10;
640 int text_x = offset * 2;
641
642 wxFont* dFont = GetOCPNScaledFont_PlugIn(_("Dialog"));
643 dc.SetFont(*dFont);
644
645 dc.SetTextForeground(
646 wxSystemSettings::GetColour(wxSystemColour::wxSYS_COLOUR_WINDOWTEXT));
647
648 int yd = height * 20 / 100;
649 for (size_t i = 0; i < nameWrapped.GetCount(); i++) {
650 if (i == 0)
651 dc.DrawText(nameWrapped[i], text_x, yd);
652 else
653 dc.DrawText(nameWrapped[i], text_x + GetCharWidth(), yd);
654 yd += GetCharHeight();
655 }
656 } // selected
657 else {
658 dc.SetBrush(wxBrush(m_boxColour));
659
660 dc.SetPen(wxPen(
661 wxSystemSettings::GetColour(wxSystemColour::wxSYS_COLOUR_WINDOWFRAME),
662 1));
663
664 int offset = height / 10;
665 dc.DrawRoundedRectangle(offset, offset, width - (2 * offset),
666 height - (2 * offset), height / 10);
667
668 int text_x = offset * 2;
669
670 wxFont* dFont = GetOCPNScaledFont_PlugIn(_("Dialog"));
671 dc.SetFont(*dFont);
672
673 dc.SetTextForeground(
674 wxSystemSettings::GetColour(wxSystemColour::wxSYS_COLOUR_WINDOWTEXT));
675
676 int yd = height * 20 / 100;
677 for (size_t i = 0; i < nameWrapped.GetCount(); i++) {
678 if (i == 0)
679 dc.DrawText(nameWrapped[i], text_x, yd);
680 else
681 dc.DrawText(nameWrapped[i], text_x + GetCharWidth(), yd);
682 yd += GetCharHeight();
683 }
684
685 } // not selected
686}
687
689
690static bool LoadAllPlugIns(bool load_enabled) {
691 g_Platform->ShowBusySpinner();
692 bool b = PluginLoader::getInstance()->LoadAllPlugIns(load_enabled);
693 g_Platform->HideBusySpinner();
694 return b;
695}
696
697WX_DECLARE_LIST(wxCheckBox, CBList);
698
699class OCPNCheckedListCtrl : public wxScrolledWindow {
700public:
701 OCPNCheckedListCtrl() {}
702
703 OCPNCheckedListCtrl(wxWindow* parent, wxWindowID id = -1,
704 const wxPoint& pt = wxDefaultPosition,
705 const wxSize& sz = wxDefaultSize,
706 long style = wxHSCROLL | wxVSCROLL,
707 const wxString& name = _T("scrolledWindow")) {
708 Create(parent, id, pt, sz, style, name);
709 }
710
711 bool Create(wxWindow* parent, wxWindowID id = -1,
712 const wxPoint& pt = wxDefaultPosition,
713 const wxSize& sz = wxDefaultSize,
714 long style = wxHSCROLL | wxVSCROLL,
715 const wxString& name = _T("scrolledWindow"));
716
717 virtual ~OCPNCheckedListCtrl() {}
718
719 unsigned int Append(wxString& label, bool benable = true);
720 unsigned int GetCount() { return m_list.GetCount(); }
721
722 void Clear();
723 void Check(int index, bool val);
724 bool IsChecked(int index);
725
726private:
727 wxBoxSizer* m_sizer;
728
729 CBList m_list;
730};
731
732#include <wx/listimpl.cpp>
733WX_DEFINE_LIST(CBList);
734
735bool OCPNCheckedListCtrl::Create(wxWindow* parent, wxWindowID id,
736 const wxPoint& pt, const wxSize& sz,
737 long style, const wxString& name) {
738 if (!wxScrolledWindow::Create(parent, id, pt, sz, style, name)) return FALSE;
739
740#ifdef __ANDROID__
741 GetHandle()->setObjectName("OCPNCheckedListCtrl");
742 GetHandle()->setStyleSheet(getAdjustedDialogStyleSheet());
743#endif
744
745 SetScrollRate(0, 2);
746 m_sizer = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
747 SetSizer(m_sizer);
748
749 return TRUE;
750}
751
752unsigned int OCPNCheckedListCtrl::Append(wxString& label, bool benable) {
753 wxCheckBox* cb = new wxCheckBox(this, wxID_ANY, label);
754 cb->Enable(benable);
755 cb->SetValue(!benable);
756 m_sizer->Add(cb);
757 m_sizer->Layout();
758
759 m_list.Append(cb);
760
761 return m_list.GetCount() - 1;
762}
763
764void OCPNCheckedListCtrl::Check(int index, bool val) {
765 CBList::Node* node = m_list.Item(index);
766 wxCheckBox* cb = node->GetData();
767
768 if (cb) cb->SetValue(val);
769}
770
771bool OCPNCheckedListCtrl::IsChecked(int index) {
772 CBList::Node* node = m_list.Item(index);
773 wxCheckBox* cb = node->GetData();
774
775 if (cb)
776 return cb->GetValue();
777 else
778 return false;
779}
780
781void OCPNCheckedListCtrl::Clear() {
782 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_list.GetCount(); i++) {
783 wxCheckBox* cb = m_list[i];
784 delete cb;
785 }
786 m_list.Clear();
787 Scroll(0, 0);
788}
789
790// Helper for conditional file name separator
791void appendOSDirSlash(wxString* pString);
792
793extern ArrayOfMmsiProperties g_MMSI_Props_Array;
794
798
799BEGIN_EVENT_TABLE(ConfigCreateDialog, wxDialog)
800EVT_BUTTON(ID_CONFIGEDIT_CANCEL, ConfigCreateDialog::OnConfigEditCancelClick)
801EVT_BUTTON(ID_CONFIGEDIT_OK, ConfigCreateDialog::OnConfigEditOKClick)
802END_EVENT_TABLE()
803
804ConfigCreateDialog::ConfigCreateDialog(wxWindow* parent, wxWindowID id,
805 const wxString& caption,
806 const wxPoint& pos, const wxSize& size,
807 long style)
808 : wxDialog(parent, id, caption, pos, size,
809 wxDEFAULT_DIALOG_STYLE | wxRESIZE_BORDER) {
810 CreateControls();
811 GetSizer()->SetSizeHints(this);
812 Centre();
813}
814
815ConfigCreateDialog::~ConfigCreateDialog(void) {}
816
817void ConfigCreateDialog::CreateControls(void) {
818 wxBoxSizer* mainSizer = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
819 SetSizer(mainSizer);
820
821 mainSizer->Add(new wxStaticText(this, wxID_STATIC, _("Title")), 0,
822 wxALIGN_LEFT | wxLEFT | wxRIGHT | wxTOP, 5);
823
824 m_TitleCtl = new wxTextCtrl(this, wxID_ANY, wxEmptyString, wxDefaultPosition,
825 wxSize(40 * GetCharHeight(), -1), 0);
826 mainSizer->Add(m_TitleCtl, 0,
827 wxALIGN_LEFT | wxLEFT | wxRIGHT | wxBOTTOM | wxEXPAND, 5);
828
829 mainSizer->AddSpacer(2 * GetCharHeight());
830
831 mainSizer->Add(new wxStaticText(this, wxID_STATIC, _("Description")), 0,
832 wxALIGN_LEFT | wxLEFT | wxRIGHT | wxTOP, 5);
833
834 m_DescriptionCtl =
835 new wxTextCtrl(this, wxID_ANY, wxEmptyString, wxDefaultPosition,
836 wxSize(-1, 6 * GetCharHeight()), wxTE_MULTILINE);
837 mainSizer->Add(m_DescriptionCtl, 0,
838 wxALIGN_LEFT | wxLEFT | wxRIGHT | wxBOTTOM | wxEXPAND, 5);
839
840 mainSizer->AddSpacer(2 * GetCharHeight());
841
842 mainSizer->Add(
843 new wxStaticText(
844 this, wxID_STATIC,
845 _("Create a private configuration template based on current settings.\n\
846This template will be saved, and may be selected for further use at any time.\n\
847 ")),
848 0, wxALIGN_LEFT | wxLEFT | wxRIGHT | wxTOP, 5);
849
850 mainSizer->AddSpacer(2 * GetCharHeight());
851
852 wxBoxSizer* btnSizer = new wxBoxSizer(wxHORIZONTAL);
853 mainSizer->Add(btnSizer, 0, wxALIGN_RIGHT | wxALL, 5);
854
855 m_CancelButton = new wxButton(this, ID_CONFIGEDIT_CANCEL, _("Cancel"));
856 btnSizer->Add(m_CancelButton, 0, wxALIGN_CENTER_VERTICAL | wxALL, 5);
857
858 m_OKButton = new wxButton(this, ID_CONFIGEDIT_OK, _("OK"));
859 btnSizer->Add(m_OKButton, 0, wxALIGN_CENTER_VERTICAL | wxALL, 5);
860 m_OKButton->SetDefault();
861}
862
863void ConfigCreateDialog::OnConfigEditCancelClick(wxCommandEvent& event) {
864 EndModal(wxID_CANCEL);
865}
866
867void ConfigCreateDialog::OnConfigEditOKClick(wxCommandEvent& event) {
868 const wxString& title = m_TitleCtl->GetValue();
869 const wxString& desc = m_DescriptionCtl->GetValue();
870 m_createdTemplateGUID =
871 ConfigMgr::Get().CreateNamedConfig(title, desc, _T(""));
872 EndModal(wxID_OK);
873}
874
878
879BEGIN_EVENT_TABLE(MMSIEditDialog, wxDialog)
880EVT_BUTTON(ID_MMSIEDIT_CANCEL, MMSIEditDialog::OnMMSIEditCancelClick)
881EVT_BUTTON(ID_MMSIEDIT_OK, MMSIEditDialog::OnMMSIEditOKClick)
882END_EVENT_TABLE()
883
884MMSIEditDialog::MMSIEditDialog(MmsiProperties* props, wxWindow* parent,
885 wxWindowID id, const wxString& caption,
886 const wxPoint& pos, const wxSize& size,
887 long style)
888 : wxDialog(parent, id, caption, pos, size,
889 wxDEFAULT_DIALOG_STYLE | wxRESIZE_BORDER),
890 m_props(props) {
891 CreateControls();
892 GetSizer()->SetSizeHints(this);
893 Centre();
894}
895
896MMSIEditDialog::~MMSIEditDialog(void) { delete m_MMSICtl; }
897
898void MMSIEditDialog::CreateControls(void) {
899 wxBoxSizer* mainSizer = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
900 SetSizer(mainSizer);
901
902 wxStaticBox* mmsiBox =
903 new wxStaticBox(this, wxID_ANY, _("MMSI Extended Properties"));
904
905 wxStaticBoxSizer* mmsiSizer = new wxStaticBoxSizer(mmsiBox, wxVERTICAL);
906 mainSizer->Add(mmsiSizer, 0, wxEXPAND | wxALL, 5);
907
908 mmsiSizer->Add(new wxStaticText(this, wxID_STATIC, _("MMSI")), 0,
909 wxALIGN_LEFT | wxLEFT | wxRIGHT | wxTOP, 5);
910
911 m_MMSICtl = new wxTextCtrl(this, ID_MMSI_CTL, wxEmptyString,
912 wxDefaultPosition, wxSize(180, -1), 0);
913 mmsiSizer->Add(m_MMSICtl, 0,
914 wxALIGN_LEFT | wxLEFT | wxRIGHT | wxBOTTOM | wxEXPAND, 5);
915
916 wxStaticBoxSizer* trackSizer = new wxStaticBoxSizer(
917 new wxStaticBox(this, wxID_ANY, _("Tracking")), wxVERTICAL);
918
919 wxGridSizer* gridSizer = new wxGridSizer(0, 3, 0, 0);
920
921 m_rbTypeTrackDefault =
922 new wxRadioButton(this, wxID_ANY, _("Default tracking"),
923 wxDefaultPosition, wxDefaultSize, wxRB_GROUP);
924 m_rbTypeTrackDefault->SetValue(TRUE);
925 gridSizer->Add(m_rbTypeTrackDefault, 0, wxALL, 5);
926
927 m_rbTypeTrackAlways = new wxRadioButton(this, wxID_ANY, _("Always track"));
928 gridSizer->Add(m_rbTypeTrackAlways, 0, wxALL, 5);
929
930 m_rbTypeTrackNever = new wxRadioButton(this, wxID_ANY, _(" Never track"));
931 gridSizer->Add(m_rbTypeTrackNever, 0, wxALL, 5);
932
933 m_cbTrackPersist = new wxCheckBox(this, wxID_ANY, _("Persistent"));
934 gridSizer->Add(m_cbTrackPersist, 0, wxALL, 5);
935
936 trackSizer->Add(gridSizer, 0, wxEXPAND, 0);
937 mmsiSizer->Add(trackSizer, 0, wxEXPAND, 0);
938
939 m_IgnoreButton = new wxCheckBox(this, wxID_ANY, _("Ignore this MMSI"));
940 mmsiSizer->Add(m_IgnoreButton, 0, wxEXPAND, 5);
941
942 m_MOBButton = new wxCheckBox(this, wxID_ANY,
943 _("Handle this MMSI as SART/PLB(AIS) MOB."));
944 mmsiSizer->Add(m_MOBButton, 0, wxEXPAND, 5);
945
946 m_VDMButton =
947 new wxCheckBox(this, wxID_ANY, _("Convert AIVDM to AIVDO for this MMSI"));
948 mmsiSizer->Add(m_VDMButton, 0, wxEXPAND, 5);
949
950 m_FollowerButton = new wxCheckBox(
951 this, wxID_ANY, _("This MMSI is my Follower - No CPA Alert"));
952 mmsiSizer->Add(m_FollowerButton, 0, wxEXPAND, 5);
953
954 wxBoxSizer* btnSizer = new wxBoxSizer(wxHORIZONTAL);
955 mainSizer->Add(btnSizer, 0, wxALIGN_RIGHT | wxALL, 5);
956
957 m_CancelButton = new wxButton(this, ID_MMSIEDIT_CANCEL, _("Cancel"));
958 btnSizer->Add(m_CancelButton, 0, wxALIGN_CENTER_VERTICAL | wxALL, 5);
959
960 m_OKButton = new wxButton(this, ID_MMSIEDIT_OK, _("OK"));
961 btnSizer->Add(m_OKButton, 0, wxALIGN_CENTER_VERTICAL | wxALL, 5);
962 m_OKButton->SetDefault();
963
964 // Set initial values...
965 wxString sMMSI;
966 if (m_props->MMSI > 0)
967 sMMSI.Printf(_T("%d"), m_props->MMSI);
968 else
969 sMMSI = _T("");
970 m_MMSICtl->AppendText(sMMSI);
971
972 switch (m_props->TrackType) {
973 case TRACKTYPE_ALWAYS:
974 m_rbTypeTrackAlways->SetValue(TRUE);
975 break;
976 case TRACKTYPE_NEVER:
977 m_rbTypeTrackNever->SetValue(TRUE);
978 break;
979 default:
980 break;
981 }
982
983 m_cbTrackPersist->SetValue(m_props->m_bPersistentTrack);
984 m_IgnoreButton->SetValue(m_props->m_bignore);
985 m_MOBButton->SetValue(m_props->m_bMOB);
986 m_VDMButton->SetValue(m_props->m_bVDM);
987 m_FollowerButton->SetValue(m_props->m_bFollower);
988
989 SetColorScheme(GLOBAL_COLOR_SCHEME_RGB);
990}
991
992void MMSIEditDialog::SetColorScheme(ColorScheme cs) { DimeControl(this); }
993
994void MMSIEditDialog::OnMMSIEditCancelClick(wxCommandEvent& event) {
995 EndModal(wxID_CANCEL);
996}
997
998void MMSIEditDialog::Persist() {
999 if (m_props) {
1000 if (m_rbTypeTrackDefault->GetValue())
1001 m_props->TrackType = TRACKTYPE_DEFAULT;
1002 else if (m_rbTypeTrackAlways->GetValue())
1003 m_props->TrackType = TRACKTYPE_ALWAYS;
1004 else
1005 m_props->TrackType = TRACKTYPE_NEVER;
1006
1007 m_props->m_bignore = m_IgnoreButton->GetValue();
1008 m_props->m_bMOB = m_MOBButton->GetValue();
1009 m_props->m_bVDM = m_VDMButton->GetValue();
1010 m_props->m_bFollower = m_FollowerButton->GetValue();
1011 m_props->m_bPersistentTrack = m_cbTrackPersist->GetValue();
1012 if (m_props->m_ShipName == wxEmptyString) {
1013 auto proptarget = g_pAIS->Get_Target_Data_From_MMSI(m_props->MMSI);
1014 if (proptarget) {
1015 wxString s = proptarget->GetFullName();
1016 m_props->m_ShipName = s;
1017 } else {
1018 wxString GetShipNameFromFile(int);
1019 m_props->m_ShipName = GetShipNameFromFile(m_props->MMSI);
1020 }
1021 }
1022 }
1023}
1024
1025void MMSIEditDialog::OnMMSIEditOKClick(wxCommandEvent& event) {
1026 // Update the MmsiProperties by the passed pointer
1027 if (m_props) {
1028 long nmmsi;
1029 m_MMSICtl->GetValue().ToLong(&nmmsi);
1030 m_props->MMSI = nmmsi;
1031 Persist();
1032
1033 if (m_MMSICtl->GetValue().Length() != 9) {
1034 OCPNMessageDialog* dlg = new OCPNMessageDialog(
1035 this,
1036 _("An MMSI Id is generally a number of nine digits.\nPlease check "
1037 "your entries and cancel if necessary."),
1038 _("OpenCPN Info"), wxOK | wxCANCEL);
1039
1040 dlg->ShowWindowModalThenDo([this, dlg](int retcode) {
1041 if (retcode == wxID_OK) {
1042 Persist();
1043 }
1044 EndModal(retcode);
1045 });
1046 } else {
1047 EndModal(wxID_OK);
1048 }
1049 }
1050}
1051
1052void MMSIEditDialog::OnCtlUpdated(wxCommandEvent& event) {}
1053
1054BEGIN_EVENT_TABLE(MMSIListCtrl, wxListCtrl)
1055EVT_LIST_ITEM_SELECTED(ID_MMSI_PROPS_LIST, MMSIListCtrl::OnListItemClick)
1056EVT_LIST_ITEM_ACTIVATED(ID_MMSI_PROPS_LIST, MMSIListCtrl::OnListItemActivated)
1057EVT_LIST_ITEM_RIGHT_CLICK(ID_MMSI_PROPS_LIST,
1058 MMSIListCtrl::OnListItemRightClick)
1059EVT_MENU(ID_DEF_MENU_MMSI_EDIT, MMSIListCtrl::PopupMenuHandler)
1060EVT_MENU(ID_DEF_MENU_MMSI_DELETE, MMSIListCtrl::PopupMenuHandler)
1061END_EVENT_TABLE()
1062
1063MMSIListCtrl::MMSIListCtrl(wxWindow* parent, wxWindowID id, const wxPoint& pos,
1064 const wxSize& size, long style)
1065 : wxListCtrl(parent, id, pos, size, style) {
1066 m_parent = parent;
1067}
1068
1069MMSIListCtrl::~MMSIListCtrl(void) {}
1070
1071wxString MMSIListCtrl::OnGetItemText(long item, long column) const {
1072 wxString ret;
1073 MmsiProperties* props = g_MMSI_Props_Array[item];
1074
1075 if (!props) return ret;
1076 switch (column) {
1077 case mlMMSI:
1078 if (props->MMSI > 0) ret = wxString::Format(_T( "%d" ), props->MMSI);
1079 break;
1080 case mlTrackMode:
1081 switch (props->TrackType) {
1082 case TRACKTYPE_DEFAULT:
1083 ret = _("Default");
1084 break;
1085 case TRACKTYPE_ALWAYS:
1086 ret = _("Always");
1087 break;
1088 case TRACKTYPE_NEVER:
1089 ret = _("Never");
1090 break;
1091 default:
1092 ret = _T( "???" );
1093 }
1094 if (props->m_bPersistentTrack)
1095 ret.Append(_T( ", " )).Append(_("Persistent"));
1096 break;
1097 case mlIgnore:
1098 if (props->m_bignore) ret = _T( "X" );
1099 break;
1100 case mlMOB:
1101 if (props->m_bMOB) ret = _T( "X" );
1102 break;
1103 case mlVDM:
1104 if (props->m_bVDM) ret = _T( "X" );
1105 break;
1106 case mlFollower:
1107 if (props->m_bFollower) ret = _T("X");
1108 break;
1109 case mlShipName:
1110 ret = props->m_ShipName;
1111 break;
1112 default:
1113 ret = _T( "??" );
1114 break;
1115 }
1116 return ret;
1117}
1118
1119void MMSIListCtrl::OnListItemClick(wxListEvent& event) {}
1120
1121void MMSIListCtrl::OnListItemActivated(wxListEvent& event) {
1122 MmsiProperties* props = g_MMSI_Props_Array.Item(event.GetIndex());
1123 MmsiProperties* props_new = new MmsiProperties(*props);
1124
1125 MMSIEditDialog* pd =
1126 new MMSIEditDialog(props_new, m_parent, -1, _("Edit MMSI Properties"),
1127 wxDefaultPosition, wxSize(200, 200));
1128
1129 if (pd->ShowModal() == wxID_OK) {
1130 g_MMSI_Props_Array.RemoveAt(event.GetIndex());
1131 delete props;
1132 g_MMSI_Props_Array.Insert(props_new, event.GetIndex());
1133 } else
1134 delete props_new;
1135
1136 pd->Destroy();
1137}
1138
1139void MMSIListCtrl::OnListItemRightClick(wxListEvent& event) {
1140 m_context_item = GetNextItem(-1, wxLIST_NEXT_ALL, wxLIST_STATE_SELECTED);
1141 if (m_context_item == wxNOT_FOUND) return;
1142 wxMenu* menu = new wxMenu(_("MMSI Properties"));
1143 wxMenuItem* item_edit =
1144 new wxMenuItem(menu, ID_DEF_MENU_MMSI_EDIT, _("Edit") + _T("..."));
1145 menu->Append(item_edit);
1146 wxMenuItem* item_delete =
1147 new wxMenuItem(menu, ID_DEF_MENU_MMSI_DELETE, _("Delete"));
1148 menu->Append(item_delete);
1149
1150#ifdef __WXMSW__
1151 wxFont* qFont = GetOCPNScaledFont(_("Menu"));
1152 item_edit->SetFont(*qFont);
1153 item_delete->SetFont(*qFont);
1154#endif
1155
1156 wxPoint p = ScreenToClient(wxGetMousePosition());
1157 PopupMenu(menu, p.x, p.y);
1158
1159 SetItemCount(g_MMSI_Props_Array.GetCount());
1160 Refresh(TRUE);
1161}
1162
1163void MMSIListCtrl::PopupMenuHandler(wxCommandEvent& event) {
1164 int context_item = m_context_item;
1165 MmsiProperties* props = g_MMSI_Props_Array[context_item];
1166
1167 if (!props) return;
1168
1169 switch (event.GetId()) {
1170 case ID_DEF_MENU_MMSI_EDIT: {
1171 MmsiProperties* props_new = new MmsiProperties(*props);
1172 MMSIEditDialog* pd =
1173 new MMSIEditDialog(props_new, m_parent, -1, _("Edit MMSI Properties"),
1174 wxDefaultPosition, wxSize(200, 200));
1175
1176 if (pd->ShowModal() == wxID_OK) {
1177 g_MMSI_Props_Array.RemoveAt(context_item);
1178 delete props;
1179 props_new->m_ShipName = GetShipNameFromFile(props_new->MMSI);
1180 g_MMSI_Props_Array.Insert(props_new, context_item);
1181 } else {
1182 delete props_new;
1183 }
1184 pd->Destroy();
1185 break;
1186 }
1187 case ID_DEF_MENU_MMSI_DELETE:
1188 g_MMSI_Props_Array.RemoveAt(context_item);
1189 delete props;
1190 break;
1191 }
1192}
1193
1194MMSI_Props_Panel::MMSI_Props_Panel(wxWindow* parent)
1195 : wxPanel(parent, wxID_ANY, wxDefaultPosition, wxDefaultSize,
1196 wxBORDER_NONE) {
1197 m_pparent = parent;
1198
1199 wxFont* qFont = GetOCPNScaledFont(_("Dialog"));
1200 SetFont(*qFont);
1201
1202 wxBoxSizer* topSizer = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
1203 SetSizer(topSizer);
1204
1205 wxString MMSI_props_column_spec = _T("120;120;100;100;100;100;100;100");
1206 // Parse the global column width string as read from config file
1207 wxStringTokenizer tkz(MMSI_props_column_spec, _T(";"));
1208 wxString s_width = tkz.GetNextToken();
1209 int width;
1210 long lwidth;
1211
1212 m_pListCtrlMMSI = new MMSIListCtrl(
1213 this, ID_MMSI_PROPS_LIST, wxDefaultPosition, wxSize(-1, -1),
1214 wxLC_REPORT | wxLC_SINGLE_SEL | wxLC_HRULES | wxLC_VRULES |
1215 wxBORDER_SUNKEN | wxLC_VIRTUAL);
1216 // wxImageList* imglist = new wxImageList(16, 16, TRUE, 2);
1217
1218 ocpnStyle::Style* style = g_StyleManager->GetCurrentStyle();
1219 // imglist->Add(style->GetIcon(_T( "sort_asc" )));
1220 // imglist->Add(style->GetIcon(_T( "sort_desc" )));
1221
1222 // m_pListCtrlMMSI->AssignImageList( imglist, wxIMAGE_LIST_SMALL );
1223 int dx = GetCharWidth();
1224
1225 width = dx * 5;
1226 if (s_width.ToLong(&lwidth)) {
1227 width = wxMax(dx * 2, lwidth);
1228 width = wxMin(width, dx * 13);
1229 }
1230 m_pListCtrlMMSI->InsertColumn(tlMMSI, _("MMSI"), wxLIST_FORMAT_LEFT, width);
1231
1232 s_width = tkz.GetNextToken();
1233 width = dx * 12;
1234 if (s_width.ToLong(&lwidth)) {
1235 width = wxMax(dx * 2, lwidth);
1236 width = wxMin(width, dx * 25);
1237 }
1238 m_pListCtrlMMSI->InsertColumn(tlCLASS, _("Track Mode"), wxLIST_FORMAT_CENTER,
1239 width);
1240
1241 s_width = tkz.GetNextToken();
1242 width = dx * 8;
1243 if (s_width.ToLong(&lwidth)) {
1244 width = wxMax(dx * 2, lwidth);
1245 width = wxMin(width, dx * 10);
1246 }
1247 m_pListCtrlMMSI->InsertColumn(tlTYPE, _("Ignore"), wxLIST_FORMAT_CENTER,
1248 width);
1249
1250 s_width = tkz.GetNextToken();
1251 width = dx * 8;
1252 if (s_width.ToLong(&lwidth)) {
1253 width = wxMax(dx * 2, lwidth);
1254 width = wxMin(width, dx * 10);
1255 }
1256 m_pListCtrlMMSI->InsertColumn(tlTYPE, _("MOB"), wxLIST_FORMAT_CENTER, width);
1257
1258 s_width = tkz.GetNextToken();
1259 width = dx * 8;
1260 if (s_width.ToLong(&lwidth)) {
1261 width = wxMax(dx * 2, lwidth);
1262 width = wxMin(width, dx * 15);
1263 }
1264 m_pListCtrlMMSI->InsertColumn(tlTYPE, _("VDM->VDO"), wxLIST_FORMAT_CENTER,
1265 width);
1266
1267 s_width = tkz.GetNextToken();
1268 width = dx * 8;
1269 if (s_width.ToLong(&lwidth)) {
1270 width = wxMax(dx * 2, lwidth);
1271 width = wxMin(width, dx * 30);
1272 }
1273 m_pListCtrlMMSI->InsertColumn(tlTYPE, _("Ship name"), wxLIST_FORMAT_CENTER,
1274 width);
1275
1276 s_width = tkz.GetNextToken();
1277 width = dx * 8;
1278 if (s_width.ToLong(&lwidth)) {
1279 width = wxMax(dx * 2, lwidth);
1280 width = wxMin(width, dx * 10);
1281 }
1282 m_pListCtrlMMSI->InsertColumn(tlTYPE, _("Follower"), wxLIST_FORMAT_CENTER,
1283 width); // Has
1284
1285 topSizer->Add(m_pListCtrlMMSI, 1, wxEXPAND | wxALL, 0);
1286
1287 m_pButtonNew = new wxButton(this, wxID_ANY, _("New..."), wxDefaultPosition,
1288 wxSize(200, -1));
1289 m_pButtonNew->Connect(wxEVT_COMMAND_BUTTON_CLICKED,
1290 wxCommandEventHandler(MMSI_Props_Panel::OnNewButton),
1291 NULL, this);
1292 topSizer->Add(m_pButtonNew, 0, wxALIGN_RIGHT | wxALL, 0);
1293
1294 topSizer->Layout();
1295
1296 // This is silly, but seems to be required for __WXMSW__ build
1297 // If not done, the SECOND invocation of the panel fails to expand the list
1298 // to the full wxSizer size....
1299 SetSize(GetSize().x, GetSize().y - 1);
1300
1301 SetColorScheme(GLOBAL_COLOR_SCHEME_RGB);
1302}
1303
1304MMSI_Props_Panel::~MMSI_Props_Panel(void) {}
1305
1306void MMSI_Props_Panel::OnNewButton(wxCommandEvent& event) {
1307 MmsiProperties* props = new MmsiProperties(-1);
1308
1309 MMSIEditDialog* pd =
1310 new MMSIEditDialog(props, m_parent, -1, _("Add MMSI Properties"),
1311 wxDefaultPosition, wxSize(200, 200));
1312
1313 DimeControl(pd);
1314 pd->ShowWindowModalThenDo([this, pd, props](int retcode) {
1315 if (retcode == wxID_OK) {
1316 g_MMSI_Props_Array.Add(props);
1317 } else {
1318 delete props;
1319 }
1320 UpdateMMSIList();
1321 });
1322}
1323
1324void MMSI_Props_Panel::UpdateMMSIList(void) {
1325 // Capture the MMSI of the curently selected list item
1326 long selItemID = wxNOT_FOUND;
1327 m_pListCtrlMMSI->GetNextItem(selItemID, wxLIST_NEXT_ALL,
1328 wxLIST_STATE_SELECTED);
1329
1330 int selMMSI = wxNOT_FOUND;
1331 if (selItemID != wxNOT_FOUND) selMMSI = g_MMSI_Props_Array[selItemID]->MMSI;
1332
1333 m_pListCtrlMMSI->SetItemCount(g_MMSI_Props_Array.GetCount());
1334
1335 // Restore selected item
1336 long item_sel = wxNOT_FOUND;
1337 if (selItemID != wxNOT_FOUND && selMMSI != wxNOT_FOUND) {
1338 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < g_MMSI_Props_Array.GetCount(); i++) {
1339 if (g_MMSI_Props_Array[i]->MMSI == selMMSI) {
1340 item_sel = i;
1341 break;
1342 }
1343 }
1344 }
1345
1346 if (g_MMSI_Props_Array.GetCount() > 0)
1347 m_pListCtrlMMSI->SetItemState(item_sel,
1348 wxLIST_STATE_SELECTED | wxLIST_STATE_FOCUSED,
1349 wxLIST_STATE_SELECTED | wxLIST_STATE_FOCUSED);
1350
1351#ifdef __WXMSW__
1352 m_pListCtrlMMSI->Refresh(FALSE);
1353#endif
1354}
1355
1356void MMSI_Props_Panel::SetColorScheme(ColorScheme cs) { DimeControl(this); }
1357
1358// WX_DECLARE_OBJARRAY(wxBitmap, ArrayOfBitmaps);
1359// #include <wx/arrimpl.cpp>
1360// WX_DEFINE_OBJARRAY(ArrayOfBitmaps);
1361
1362class OCPNFatCombo : public wxOwnerDrawnComboBox {
1363public:
1364 OCPNFatCombo();
1365
1366 OCPNFatCombo(wxWindow* parent, wxWindowID id, const wxString& value = _T(""),
1367 const wxPoint& pos = wxDefaultPosition,
1368 const wxSize& size = wxDefaultSize, int n = 0,
1369 const wxString choices[] = NULL, long style = 0,
1370 const wxValidator& validator = wxDefaultValidator,
1371 const wxString& name = _T("OCPNFatCombo"));
1372
1373 ~OCPNFatCombo();
1374
1375 void OnDrawItem(wxDC& dc, const wxRect& rect, int item, int flags) const;
1376 wxCoord OnMeasureItem(size_t item) const;
1377 wxCoord OnMeasureItemWidth(size_t item) const;
1378 bool SetFont(const wxFont& font);
1379
1380 int Append(const wxString& item, wxBitmap bmp);
1381 void Clear(void);
1382
1383 const wxFont* dfont;
1384
1385private:
1386 int itemHeight;
1387 ArrayOfBitmaps bmpArray;
1388};
1389
1390OCPNFatCombo::OCPNFatCombo() : wxOwnerDrawnComboBox() {}
1391
1392OCPNFatCombo::OCPNFatCombo(wxWindow* parent, wxWindowID id,
1393 const wxString& value, const wxPoint& pos,
1394 const wxSize& size, int n, const wxString choices[],
1395 long style, const wxValidator& validator,
1396 const wxString& name)
1397 : wxOwnerDrawnComboBox(parent, id, value, pos, size, n, choices, style,
1398 validator, name) {
1399 double fontHeight =
1400 GetFont().GetPointSize() / g_Platform->getFontPointsperPixel();
1401 itemHeight = (int)wxRound(fontHeight);
1402 SetPopupMaxHeight(::wxGetDisplaySize().y / 2);
1403}
1404
1405OCPNFatCombo::~OCPNFatCombo() {}
1406
1407bool OCPNFatCombo::SetFont(const wxFont& font) {
1408 dfont = &font;
1409 return true;
1410}
1411
1412void OCPNFatCombo::OnDrawItem(wxDC& dc, const wxRect& rect, int item,
1413 int flags) const {
1414 int offset_x = 10;
1415 // dc.DrawBitmap(bmpArray.Item(item), rect.x, rect.y + (rect.height -
1416 // bmpHeight)/2, true);
1417 dc.SetFont(*dfont);
1418
1419 wxColor bg = wxSystemSettings::GetColour(wxSYS_COLOUR_LISTBOX);
1420 wxBrush br = wxBrush(bg);
1421 wxBrush sv = dc.GetBrush();
1422 dc.SetBrush(br);
1423 dc.DrawRectangle(0, 0, rect.width, rect.height);
1424 dc.SetBrush(sv);
1425 dc.SetTextForeground(wxColour(0, 0, 0));
1426
1427 if (flags & wxODCB_PAINTING_CONTROL) {
1428 wxString text = GetValue();
1429 int margin_x = 2;
1430 dc.DrawText(text, rect.x + margin_x + offset_x,
1431 (rect.height - dc.GetCharHeight()) / 2 + rect.y);
1432 } else {
1433 dc.SetBackground(wxBrush(br));
1434 dc.Clear();
1435 dc.DrawText(GetVListBoxComboPopup()->GetString(item), rect.x + 2 + offset_x,
1436 (rect.height - dc.GetCharHeight()) / 2 + rect.y);
1437 }
1438}
1439
1440wxCoord OCPNFatCombo::OnMeasureItem(size_t item) const {
1441 if (item < bmpArray.GetCount())
1442 return wxMax(itemHeight, bmpArray.Item(item).GetHeight());
1443
1444 return itemHeight * 12 / 10;
1445}
1446
1447wxCoord OCPNFatCombo::OnMeasureItemWidth(size_t item) const { return -1; }
1448
1449int OCPNFatCombo::Append(const wxString& item, wxBitmap bmp) {
1450 bmpArray.Add(bmp);
1451 int idx = wxOwnerDrawnComboBox::Append(item);
1452
1453 return idx;
1454}
1455
1456void OCPNFatCombo::Clear(void) {
1457 wxOwnerDrawnComboBox::Clear();
1458 bmpArray.Clear();
1459}

1461BEGIN_EVENT_TABLE(options, wxDialog)
1462EVT_INIT_DIALOG(options::OnDialogInit)
1463EVT_CHECKBOX(ID_DEBUGCHECKBOX1, options::OnDebugcheckbox1Click)
1464EVT_BUTTON(ID_BUTTONADD, options::OnButtonaddClick)
1465EVT_BUTTON(ID_BUTTONDELETE, options::OnButtondeleteClick)
1466EVT_BUTTON(ID_PARSEENCBUTTON, options::OnButtonParseENC)
1467EVT_BUTTON(ID_BUTTONCOMPRESS, options::OnButtoncompressClick)
1468EVT_BUTTON(ID_BUTTONMIGRATE, options::OnButtonmigrateClick)
1469EVT_BUTTON(ID_TCDATAADD, options::OnInsertTideDataLocation)
1470EVT_BUTTON(ID_TCDATADEL, options::OnRemoveTideDataLocation)
1471EVT_BUTTON(ID_APPLY, options::OnApplyClick)
1472EVT_BUTTON(xID_OK, options::OnXidOkClick)
1473EVT_BUTTON(wxID_CANCEL, options::OnCancelClick)
1474EVT_BUTTON(ID_BUTTONFONTCHOOSE, options::OnChooseFont)
1475EVT_BUTTON(ID_BUTTONFONT_RESET, options::OnResetFont)
1476EVT_BUTTON(ID_BUTTONECDISHELP, options::OnButtonEcdisHelp)
1477
1478EVT_CHOICE(ID_CHOICE_FONTELEMENT, options::OnFontChoice)
1479EVT_CLOSE(options::OnClose)
1480
1481#if defined(__WXGTK__) || defined(__WXQT__)
1482EVT_BUTTON(ID_BUTTONFONTCOLOR, options::OnChooseFontColor)
1483#endif
1484#ifdef ocpnUSE_GL
1485EVT_BUTTON(ID_OPENGLOPTIONS, options::OnOpenGLOptions)
1486#endif
1487EVT_CHOICE(ID_RADARDISTUNIT, options::OnDisplayCategoryRadioButton)
1488EVT_CHOICE(ID_DEPTHUNITSCHOICE, options::OnUnitsChoice)
1489EVT_BUTTON(ID_CLEARLIST, options::OnButtonClearClick)
1490EVT_BUTTON(ID_SELECTLIST, options::OnButtonSelectClick)
1491EVT_BUTTON(ID_SETSTDLIST, options::OnButtonSetStd)
1492EVT_CHOICE(ID_SHIPICONTYPE, options::OnShipTypeSelect)
1493EVT_CHOICE(ID_RADARRINGS, options::OnRadarringSelect)
1494EVT_CHOICE(ID_OPWAYPOINTRANGERINGS, options::OnWaypointRangeRingSelect)
1495EVT_CHAR_HOOK(options::OnCharHook)
1496
1497END_EVENT_TABLE()
1498
1499options::options(wxWindow* parent, wxWindowID id, const wxString& caption,
1500 const wxPoint& pos, const wxSize& size, long style)
1501 : pTrackRotateTime(0) {
1502 Init();
1503
1504 pParent = parent;
1505
1506 SetExtraStyle(wxWS_EX_BLOCK_EVENTS);
1507
1508 wxDialog::Create(parent, id, caption, pos, size, style, "Options");
1509 SetFont(*dialogFont);
1510
1511 CreateControls();
1512 RecalculateSize(size.x, size.y);
1513
1514 wxDEFINE_EVENT(EVT_COMPAT_OS_CHANGE, wxCommandEvent);
1515 GlobalVar<wxString> compat_os(&g_compatOS);
1516 compat_os_listener.Listen(compat_os, this, EVT_COMPAT_OS_CHANGE);
1517 Bind(EVT_COMPAT_OS_CHANGE, [&](wxCommandEvent&) {
1518 PluginLoader::getInstance()->LoadAllPlugIns(false);
1519 m_pPlugInCtrl->ReloadPluginPanels();
1520 });
1521 auto action = [&](wxCommandEvent& evt) {
1522 g_persist_active_route = m_persist_active_route_chkbox->IsChecked();
1523 };
1524 m_persist_active_route_chkbox->Bind(wxEVT_CHECKBOX, action);
1525 m_persist_active_route_chkbox->SetValue(g_persist_active_route);
1526}
1527
1528options::~options(void) {
1529 wxNotebook* nb =
1530 dynamic_cast<wxNotebook*>(m_pListbook->GetPage(m_pageCharts));
1531 if (nb)
1532 nb->Disconnect(wxEVT_COMMAND_NOTEBOOK_PAGE_CHANGED,
1533 wxListbookEventHandler(options::OnChartsPageChange), NULL,
1534 this);
1535
1536 groupsPanel->EmptyChartGroupArray(m_pGroupArray);
1537
1538 delete m_pSerialArray;
1539 delete m_pGroupArray;
1540 delete m_topImgList;
1541
1542 // Take care of the plugin manager...
1543
1544 delete m_pPlugInCtrl;
1545 if (g_pi_manager) g_pi_manager->SetListPanelPtr(NULL);
1546#ifndef __ANDROID__
1547 delete m_PluginCatalogMgrPanel;
1548#endif
1549}
1550
1551// with AIS it's called very often
1552bool options::SendIdleEvents(wxIdleEvent& event) {
1553 if (IsShown()) return wxDialog::SendIdleEvents(event);
1554 return false;
1555}
1556
1557void options::RecalculateSize(int hint_x, int hint_y) {
1558 if (!g_bresponsive) {
1559 m_nCharWidthMax = GetSize().x / GetCharWidth();
1560
1561 // Protect against unreasonable small size
1562 // And also handle the empty config file init case.
1563 if ((hint_x < 200) || (hint_y < 200)) {
1564 // Constrain size on small displays
1565 int display_width, display_height;
1566 display_width = g_monitor_info[g_current_monitor].width;
1567 display_height = g_monitor_info[g_current_monitor].height;
1568
1569 if (display_height < 600) {
1570 SetSize(wxSize(GetOCPNCanvasWindow()->GetSize()));
1571 } else {
1572 vectorPanel->SetSizeHints(ps57Ctl);
1573 Fit();
1574 }
1575 }
1576
1577 CenterOnScreen();
1578 return;
1579 }
1580
1581 wxSize esize;
1582 esize.x = GetCharWidth() * 110;
1583 esize.y = GetCharHeight() * 40;
1584
1585 wxSize dsize = GetParent()->GetSize(); // GetClientSize();
1586 esize.y = wxMin(esize.y, dsize.y - 0 /*(2 * GetCharHeight())*/);
1587 esize.x = wxMin(esize.x, dsize.x - 0 /*(2 * GetCharHeight())*/);
1588 SetSize(esize);
1589
1590 wxSize fsize = GetSize();
1591 wxSize canvas_size = GetParent()->GetSize();
1592 wxPoint screen_pos = GetParent()->GetScreenPosition();
1593 int xp = (canvas_size.x - fsize.x) / 2;
1594 int yp = (canvas_size.y - fsize.y) / 2;
1595 Move(screen_pos.x + xp, screen_pos.y + yp);
1596
1597 m_nCharWidthMax = GetSize().x / GetCharWidth();
1598}
1599
1600void options::Init(void) {
1601 m_pWorkDirList = NULL;
1602
1603 pShowStatusBar = NULL;
1604 pShowMenuBar = NULL;
1605 pShowCompassWin = NULL;
1606 pSelCtl = NULL;
1607 // pActiveChartsList = NULL;
1608 m_scrollWinChartList = NULL;
1609 ps57CtlListBox = NULL;
1610 pDispCat = NULL;
1611 m_pSerialArray = NULL;
1612 pUpdateCheckBox = NULL;
1613 pParseENCButton = NULL;
1614 k_charts = 0;
1615 k_vectorcharts = 0;
1616 k_plugins = 0;
1617 k_tides = 0;
1618 m_pConfig = NULL;
1619
1620 pSoundDeviceIndex = NULL;
1621
1622 pCBNorthUp = NULL;
1623 pCBCourseUp = NULL;
1624 pCBLookAhead = NULL;
1625 pCDOQuilting = NULL;
1626 pPreserveScale = NULL;
1627 pSmoothPanZoom = NULL;
1628 pEnableZoomToCursor = NULL;
1629 pSDisplayGrid = NULL;
1630 pCDOOutlines = NULL;
1631 pSDepthUnits = NULL;
1632 pSLiveETA = NULL;
1633 pSDefaultBoatSpeed = NULL;
1634
1635 activeSizer = NULL;
1636 itemActiveChartStaticBox = NULL;
1637
1638 pCheck_SOUNDG = NULL;
1639 pCheck_META = NULL;
1640 pCheck_SHOWIMPTEXT = NULL;
1641 pCheck_SCAMIN = NULL;
1642 pCheck_ATONTEXT = NULL;
1643 pCheck_LDISTEXT = NULL;
1644 pCheck_XLSECTTEXT = NULL;
1645
1646 m_bVisitLang = FALSE;
1647 m_itemFontElementListBox = NULL;
1648 m_textSample = NULL;
1649 m_topImgList = NULL;
1650
1651 m_pListbook = NULL;
1652 m_pGroupArray = NULL;
1653 m_groups_changed = 0;
1654
1655 m_pageDisplay = -1;
1656 m_pageConnections = -1;
1657 m_pageCharts = -1;
1658 m_pageShips = -1;
1659 m_pageUI = -1;
1660 m_pagePlugins = -1;
1661 m_pageConnections = -1;
1662
1663 auto loader = PluginLoader::getInstance();
1664 b_haveWMM = loader && loader->IsPlugInAvailable(_T("WMM"));
1665 b_oldhaveWMM = b_haveWMM;
1666
1667 lastPage = 0;
1668 m_bneedNew = false;
1669
1670 m_bForceNewToolbaronCancel = false;
1671
1672 m_cs = (ColorScheme)0;
1673
1674 // for deferred loading
1675 m_pPlugInCtrl = NULL;
1676 m_PluginCatalogMgrPanel = NULL;
1677
1678 m_pNMEAForm = NULL;
1679 // FIXME Do this in CTOR of connections dialog
1680 // mSelectedConnection = NULL;
1681
1682#ifdef __ANDROID__
1683 m_scrollRate = 1;
1684#else
1685 m_scrollRate = 15;
1686#endif
1687
1688 dialogFont = GetOCPNScaledFont(_("Dialog"));
1689
1690 m_bVectorInit = false;
1691
1692 // This variable is used by plugin callback function AddOptionsPage
1693 g_pOptions = this;
1694
1695 pCmdSoundString = NULL;
1696
1697 m_sconfigSelect_single = NULL;
1698 m_sconfigSelect_twovertical = NULL;
1699
1700 wxScreenDC dc;
1701 dc.SetFont(*dialogFont);
1702 int width, height;
1703 dc.GetTextExtent(_T("H"), &width, &height, NULL, NULL, dialogFont);
1704
1705 m_colourPickerDefaultSize =
1706 wxSize(4 * height, height * 2 * OCPN_GetWinDIPScaleFactor());
1707
1708 m_bcompact = false;
1709
1710 // wxSize dSize = g_Platform->getDisplaySize();
1711 // if ( dSize.x < width * 40)
1712 // m_bcompact = true;
1713
1714 double dsizemm = g_Platform->GetDisplaySizeMM();
1715 if (dsizemm < 80) // Probably and Android Phone, portrait mode
1716 m_bcompact = true;
1717
1718 auto sound_action = [](ObservedEvt ev) {
1719 auto sound = static_cast<OcpnSound*>(ev.GetClientData());
1720 delete sound;
1721 };
1722 m_sound_done_listener.Init(m_on_sound_done, sound_action);
1723}
1724
1725#if defined(__GNUC__) && __GNUC__ < 8
1726// Handle old gcc C++-11 bugs, remove when builders updated to gcc >= 8.1.1.
1727
1728static const wxString BAD_ACCESS_MSG = _(
1729 "The device selected is not accessible; opencpn will likely not be able\n"
1730 "to use this device as-is. You might want to exit OpenCPN, reboot and\n"
1731 "retry after creating a file called /etc/udev/rules.d/70-opencpn.rules\n"
1732 "with the following contents:\n\n"
1733 " KERNEL==\"ttyUSB*\", MODE=\"0666\"\n"
1734 " KERNEL==\"ttyACM*\", MODE=\"0666\"\n"
1735 " KERNEL==\"ttyS*\", MODE=\"0666\"\n\n"
1736 "For more info, see the file LINUX_DEVICES.md in the distribution docs.\n");
1737
1738#else
1739
1740static const wxString BAD_ACCESS_MSG = _(R"(
1741The device selected is not accessible; opencpn will likely not be able
1742to use this device as-is. You might want to exit OpenCPN, reboot and
1743retry after creating a file called /etc/udev/rules.d/70-opencpn.rules
1744with the following contents:
1745
1746 KERNEL=="ttyUSB*", MODE="0666"
1747 KERNEL=="ttyACM*", MODE="0666"
1748 KERNEL=="ttyS*", MODE="0666"
1749
1750For more info, see the file LINUX_DEVICES.md in the distribution docs.
1751)");
1752
1753#endif // defined(__GNUC__) && __GNUC__ < 8
1754
1755void options::OnDialogInit(wxInitDialogEvent& event) {}
1756
1757void options::CheckDeviceAccess(/*[[maybe_unused]]*/ wxString& path) {}
1758
1759size_t options::CreatePanel(const wxString& title) {
1760 size_t id = m_pListbook->GetPageCount();
1761 /* This is the default empty content for any top tab.
1762 It'll be replaced when we call AddPage */
1763 wxPanel* panel = new wxPanel(m_pListbook, wxID_ANY, wxDefaultPosition,
1764 wxDefaultSize, wxTAB_TRAVERSAL, title);
1765 m_pListbook->AddPage(panel, title, FALSE, id);
1766 return id;
1767}
1768
1769wxScrolledWindow* options::AddPage(size_t parent, const wxString& title) {
1770 if (parent > m_pListbook->GetPageCount() - 1) {
1771 wxLogMessage(
1772 wxString::Format(
1773 _T("Warning: invalid parent in options::AddPage( %d, "), parent) +
1774 title + _T(" )"));
1775 return NULL;
1776 }
1777 wxNotebookPage* page = m_pListbook->GetPage(parent);
1778 wxNotebook* nb;
1779 wxScrolledWindow* sw;
1780
1781 int style = wxVSCROLL | wxTAB_TRAVERSAL;
1782 if ((nb = dynamic_cast<wxNotebook*>(page))) {
1783 sw = new wxScrolledWindow(page, wxID_ANY, wxDefaultPosition, wxDefaultSize,
1784 style);
1785 sw->SetScrollRate(m_scrollRate, m_scrollRate);
1786 nb->AddPage(sw, title);
1787 } else if ((sw = dynamic_cast<wxScrolledWindow*>(page))) {
1788 wxString toptitle = m_pListbook->GetPageText(parent);
1789 wxNotebook* nb = new wxNotebook(m_pListbook, wxID_ANY, wxDefaultPosition,
1790 wxDefaultSize, wxNB_TOP);
1791 /* Only remove the tab from listbook, we still have original content in
1792 * {page} */
1793 m_pListbook->InsertPage(parent, nb, toptitle, FALSE, parent);
1794 m_pListbook->SetSelection(0); // avoid gtk assertions
1795 m_pListbook->RemovePage(parent + 1);
1796 wxString previoustitle = page->GetName();
1797 page->Reparent(nb);
1798 nb->Connect(wxEVT_COMMAND_NOTEBOOK_PAGE_CHANGED,
1799 wxNotebookEventHandler(options::OnSubNBPageChange), NULL, this);
1800
1801 nb->AddPage(page, previoustitle);
1802 /* wxNotebookPage is hidden under wxGTK after RemovePage/Reparent
1803 * we must explicitely Show() it */
1804 page->Show();
1805 sw = new wxScrolledWindow(nb, wxID_ANY, wxDefaultPosition, wxDefaultSize,
1806 style);
1807 sw->SetScrollRate(m_scrollRate, m_scrollRate);
1808 nb->AddPage(sw, title);
1809 nb->ChangeSelection(0);
1810 } else { // This is the default content, we can replace it now
1811 sw = new wxScrolledWindow(m_pListbook, wxID_ANY, wxDefaultPosition,
1812 wxDefaultSize, style, title);
1813 sw->SetScrollRate(m_scrollRate, m_scrollRate);
1814 wxString toptitle = m_pListbook->GetPageText(parent);
1815 m_pListbook->InsertPage(parent, sw, toptitle, FALSE, parent);
1816 m_pListbook->SetSelection(0); // avoid gtk assertions
1817 m_pListbook->DeletePage(parent + 1);
1818 }
1819
1820#ifdef __ANDROID__
1821 sw->GetHandle()->setStyleSheet(getAdjustedDialogStyleSheet());
1822#endif
1823
1824 return sw;
1825}
1826
1827bool options::DeletePluginPage(wxScrolledWindow* page) {
1828 for (size_t i = 0; i < m_pListbook->GetPageCount(); i++) {
1829 wxNotebookPage* pg = m_pListbook->GetPage(i);
1830 auto nb = dynamic_cast<wxNotebook*>(pg);
1831
1832 if (nb) {
1833 for (size_t j = 0; j < nb->GetPageCount(); j++) {
1834 wxNotebookPage* spg = nb->GetPage(j);
1835 if (spg == page) {
1836 nb->DeletePage(j);
1837 if (nb->GetPageCount() != 1) return TRUE;
1838 /* There's only one page, remove inner notebook */
1839 spg = nb->GetPage(0);
1840 spg->Reparent(m_pListbook);
1841 nb->RemovePage(0);
1842 wxString toptitle = m_pListbook->GetPageText(i);
1843 m_pListbook->DeletePage(i);
1844 m_pListbook->InsertPage(i, spg, toptitle, FALSE, i);
1845 return TRUE;
1846 }
1847 }
1848 } else if (pg == page) {
1849 /* There's only one page, replace it with empty panel */
1850 m_pListbook->DeletePage(i);
1851 wxPanel* panel = new wxPanel(m_pListbook);
1852 wxString toptitle = m_pListbook->GetPageText(i);
1853 m_pListbook->InsertPage(i, panel, toptitle, FALSE, i);
1854 return TRUE;
1855 }
1856 }
1857 return FALSE;
1858}
1859
1860void options::CreatePanel_NMEA(size_t parent, int border_size,
1861 int group_item_spacing) {
1862 m_pNMEAForm = AddPage(parent, _("NMEA"));
1863
1864 comm_dialog =
1865 std::make_shared<ConnectionsDlg>(m_pNMEAForm, TheConnectionParams());
1866 // Hijacks the options | Resize event for use by comm_dialog only.
1867 // Needs new solution if other pages also have a need to act on it.
1868 Bind(wxEVT_SIZE, [&](wxSizeEvent& ev) {
1869 comm_dialog->OnResize();
1870 ev.Skip();
1871 });
1872}
1873
1874void options::CreatePanel_Ownship(size_t parent, int border_size,
1875 int group_item_spacing) {

1888 new wxFlexGridSizer(0, 2, group_item_spacing, group_item_spacing);

2168
2169void options::CreatePanel_Routes(size_t parent, int border_size,
2170 int group_item_spacing) {
2171 itemPanelRoutes = AddPage(parent, _("Routes/Points"));
2172
2173 Routes = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
2174 itemPanelRoutes->SetSizer(Routes);
2175
2176 wxString pDistUnitsStrings[] = {_("Nautical miles"), _("Kilometers")};
2177
2178 wxString rrAlt[] = {_("None"), _T( "1" ), _T( "2" ), _T( "3" ),
2179 _T( "4" ), _T( "5" ), _T( "6" ), _T( "7" ),
2180 _T( "8" ), _T( "9" ), _T( "10" )};
2181
2182 // Routes
2183 wxStaticBox* routeText =
2184 new wxStaticBox(itemPanelRoutes, wxID_ANY, _("New Routes"));
2185 wxStaticBoxSizer* routeSizer = new wxStaticBoxSizer(routeText, wxVERTICAL);
2186 Routes->Add(routeSizer, 0, wxGROW | wxALL, border_size);
2187
2188 wxStaticBox* activeRouteText =
2189 new wxStaticBox(itemPanelRoutes, wxID_ANY, _("Active Route"));
2190 wxStaticBoxSizer* activeRouteSizer =
2191 new wxStaticBoxSizer(activeRouteText, wxVERTICAL);
2192
2193 m_persist_active_route_chkbox = new wxCheckBox(
2194 itemPanelRoutes, wxID_ANY,
2195 _("Persist active route, automatically activate on start up"));
2196 activeRouteSizer->Add(m_persist_active_route_chkbox, 0, wxALL, 5);
2197 Routes->Add(activeRouteSizer, 0, wxGROW | wxALL, border_size);
2198
2199 routeSizer->AddSpacer(5);
2200
2201 // Default ICON
2202 wxFlexGridSizer* routepointiconSelect =
2203 new wxFlexGridSizer(1, 2, group_item_spacing, group_item_spacing);
2204 routepointiconSelect->AddGrowableCol(1);
2205 routeSizer->Add(routepointiconSelect, 0, wxLEFT | wxRIGHT | wxEXPAND,
2206 border_size);
2207
2208 wxStaticText* routepointiconTxt =
2209 new wxStaticText(itemPanelRoutes, wxID_ANY, _("Waypoint default icon"));
2210 routepointiconSelect->Add(routepointiconTxt, 1, wxEXPAND | wxALL,
2211 group_item_spacing);
2212
2213 pRoutepointDefaultIconChoice = new OCPNIconCombo(
2214 itemPanelRoutes, wxID_ANY, _("Combo!"), wxDefaultPosition, wxDefaultSize,
2215 0, NULL, wxCB_READONLY);
2216 routepointiconSelect->Add(pRoutepointDefaultIconChoice, 0,
2217 wxALIGN_RIGHT | wxALL, group_item_spacing);
2218
2219 pRoutepointDefaultIconChoice->SetPopupMaxHeight(::wxGetDisplaySize().y / 2);
2220
2221 // Accomodate scaling of icon
2222 int min_size = GetCharHeight() * 2;
2223 min_size = wxMax(min_size, (32 * g_MarkScaleFactorExp) + 4);
2224 pRoutepointDefaultIconChoice->SetMinSize(
2225 wxSize(GetCharHeight() * 15, min_size));
2226
2227 routeSizer->AddSpacer(5);
2228
2229 wxFlexGridSizer* pRouteGrid =
2230 new wxFlexGridSizer(1, 2, group_item_spacing, group_item_spacing);
2231 pRouteGrid->AddGrowableCol(1);
2232 routeSizer->Add(pRouteGrid, 0, wxALL | wxEXPAND, border_size);
2233
2234 wxStaticText* raText = new wxStaticText(
2235 itemPanelRoutes, wxID_STATIC, _("Waypoint Arrival Circle Radius (NMi)"));
2236 pRouteGrid->Add(raText, 1, wxEXPAND | wxALL, group_item_spacing);
2237
2238 m_pText_ACRadius = new wxTextCtrl(itemPanelRoutes, -1, "TEXT ");
2239 pRouteGrid->Add(m_pText_ACRadius, 0, wxALL | wxALIGN_RIGHT,
2240 group_item_spacing);
2241
2242 pAdvanceRouteWaypointOnArrivalOnly =
2243 new wxCheckBox(itemPanelRoutes, ID_DAILYCHECKBOX,
2244 _("Advance route waypoint on arrival only"));
2245 routeSizer->Add(pAdvanceRouteWaypointOnArrivalOnly, 0, wxALL, 5);
2246
2247#ifdef __WXGTK__
2248 Routes->AddSpacer(8 * group_item_spacing);
2249 wxStaticLine* pln =
2250 new wxStaticLine(itemPanelRoutes, wxID_ANY, wxDefaultPosition,
2251 wxDefaultSize, wxLI_HORIZONTAL);
2252 Routes->Add(pln, 0, wxEXPAND);
2253#endif
2254
2255 // Waypoints
2256 wxStaticBox* waypointText =
2257 new wxStaticBox(itemPanelRoutes, wxID_ANY, _("New Marks"));
2258 wxStaticBoxSizer* waypointSizer =
2259 new wxStaticBoxSizer(waypointText, wxVERTICAL);
2260 Routes->Add(waypointSizer, 0, wxTOP | wxALL | wxEXPAND, border_size);
2261
2262 waypointSizer->AddSpacer(5);
2263
2264 // Default ICON
2265 wxFlexGridSizer* waypointiconSelect =
2266 new wxFlexGridSizer(1, 2, group_item_spacing, group_item_spacing);
2267 waypointiconSelect->AddGrowableCol(1);
2268 waypointSizer->Add(waypointiconSelect, 0, wxLEFT | wxRIGHT | wxEXPAND,
2269 border_size);
2270
2271 wxStaticText* waypointiconTxt =
2272 new wxStaticText(itemPanelRoutes, wxID_ANY, _("Mark default icon"));
2273 waypointiconSelect->Add(waypointiconTxt, 1, wxEXPAND | wxALL,
2274 group_item_spacing);
2275
2276 pWaypointDefaultIconChoice = new OCPNIconCombo(
2277 itemPanelRoutes, wxID_ANY, _("Combo!"), wxDefaultPosition, wxDefaultSize,
2278 0, NULL, wxCB_READONLY);
2279 waypointiconSelect->Add(pWaypointDefaultIconChoice, 0, wxALIGN_RIGHT | wxALL,
2280 group_item_spacing);
2281
2282 pWaypointDefaultIconChoice->SetPopupMaxHeight(::wxGetDisplaySize().y / 2);
2283
2284 // Accomodate scaling of icon
2285 int rmin_size = GetCharHeight() * 2;
2286 min_size = wxMax(rmin_size, (32 * g_MarkScaleFactorExp) + 4);
2287 pWaypointDefaultIconChoice->SetMinSize(
2288 wxSize(GetCharHeight() * 15, rmin_size));
2289
2290 waypointSizer->AddSpacer(5);
2291 // ScaMin
2292 wxFlexGridSizer* ScaMinSizer =
2293 new wxFlexGridSizer(1, 2, group_item_spacing, group_item_spacing);
2294 ScaMinSizer->AddGrowableCol(1);
2295 waypointSizer->Add(ScaMinSizer, 0, wxLEFT | wxRIGHT | wxEXPAND, border_size);
2296 pScaMinChckB =
2297 new wxCheckBox(itemPanelRoutes, wxID_ANY,
2298 _("Show marks only at a chartscale greater than 1 :"));
2299 ScaMinSizer->Add(pScaMinChckB, 0);
2300 m_pText_ScaMin = new wxTextCtrl(itemPanelRoutes, -1, "TEXTTEXTTEXT");
2301 ScaMinSizer->Add(m_pText_ScaMin, 0, wxALL | wxALIGN_RIGHT,
2302 group_item_spacing);
2303
2304 // Overrule the Scamin settings
2305 pScaMinOverruleChckB =
2306 new wxCheckBox(itemPanelRoutes, wxID_ANY,
2307 _("Override the settings for chartscale based visibility "
2308 "and show always"));
2309 waypointSizer->Add(pScaMinOverruleChckB, 0, wxALL, 5);
2310
2311 waypointSizer->AddSpacer(5);
2312 // Range Rings
2313 wxFlexGridSizer* waypointrrSelect =
2314 new wxFlexGridSizer(1, 2, group_item_spacing, group_item_spacing);
2315 waypointrrSelect->AddGrowableCol(1);
2316 waypointSizer->Add(waypointrrSelect, 0, wxLEFT | wxRIGHT | wxEXPAND,
2317 border_size);
2318
2319 wxStaticText* waypointrrTxt =
2320 new wxStaticText(itemPanelRoutes, wxID_ANY, _("Mark range rings"));
2321 waypointrrSelect->Add(waypointrrTxt, 1, wxEXPAND | wxALL, group_item_spacing);
2322
2323 pWaypointRangeRingsNumber =
2324 new wxChoice(itemPanelRoutes, ID_OPWAYPOINTRANGERINGS, wxDefaultPosition,
2325 m_pShipIconType->GetSize(), 11, rrAlt);
2326 waypointrrSelect->Add(pWaypointRangeRingsNumber, 0, wxALIGN_RIGHT | wxALL,
2327 group_item_spacing);
2328
2329 waypointradarGrid =
2330 new wxFlexGridSizer(0, 2, group_item_spacing, group_item_spacing);
2331 waypointradarGrid->AddGrowableCol(1);
2332 waypointSizer->Add(waypointradarGrid, 0, wxLEFT | wxEXPAND, 30);
2333
2334 wxStaticText* waypointdistanceText = new wxStaticText(
2335 itemPanelRoutes, wxID_STATIC, _("Distance between rings"));
2336 waypointradarGrid->Add(waypointdistanceText, 1, wxEXPAND | wxALL,
2337 group_item_spacing);
2338
2339 pWaypointRangeRingsStep =
2340 new wxTextCtrl(itemPanelRoutes, ID_OPTEXTCTRL, _T(""), wxDefaultPosition,
2341 wxSize(100, -1), 0);
2342 waypointradarGrid->Add(pWaypointRangeRingsStep, 0, wxALIGN_RIGHT | wxALL,
2343 group_item_spacing);
2344
2345 wxStaticText* waypointunitText =
2346 new wxStaticText(itemPanelRoutes, wxID_STATIC, _("Distance Unit"));
2347 waypointradarGrid->Add(waypointunitText, 1, wxEXPAND | wxALL,
2348 group_item_spacing);
2349
2350 m_itemWaypointRangeRingsUnits =
2351 new wxChoice(itemPanelRoutes, ID_RADARDISTUNIT, wxDefaultPosition,
2352 m_pShipIconType->GetSize(), 2, pDistUnitsStrings);
2353 waypointradarGrid->Add(m_itemWaypointRangeRingsUnits, 0,
2354 wxALIGN_RIGHT | wxALL, border_size);
2355
2356 wxStaticText* waypointrangeringsColour = new wxStaticText(
2357 itemPanelRoutes, wxID_STATIC, _("Waypoint Range Ring Colors"));
2358 waypointradarGrid->Add(waypointrangeringsColour, 1, wxEXPAND | wxALL, 1);
2359
2360 m_colourWaypointRangeRingsColour = new OCPNColourPickerCtrl(
2361 itemPanelRoutes, wxID_ANY, *wxRED, wxDefaultPosition,
2362 m_colourPickerDefaultSize, 0, wxDefaultValidator,
2363 _T( "ID_COLOURWAYPOINTRANGERINGSCOLOUR" ));
2364 waypointradarGrid->Add(m_colourWaypointRangeRingsColour, 0,
2365 wxALIGN_RIGHT | wxALL, 1);
2366
2367 // Control Options
2368
2369#ifdef __WXGTK__
2370 Routes->AddSpacer(8 * group_item_spacing);
2371 wxStaticLine* pln1 =
2372 new wxStaticLine(itemPanelRoutes, wxID_ANY, wxDefaultPosition,
2373 wxDefaultSize, wxLI_HORIZONTAL);
2374 Routes->Add(pln1, 0, wxEXPAND);
2375#endif
2376
2377 wxStaticBox* waypointControl =
2378 new wxStaticBox(itemPanelRoutes, wxID_ANY, _("Control Options"));
2379 wxStaticBoxSizer* ControlSizer =
2380 new wxStaticBoxSizer(waypointControl, wxVERTICAL);
2381 Routes->Add(ControlSizer, 0, wxTOP | wxALL | wxEXPAND, border_size);
2382
2383 ControlSizer->AddSpacer(5);
2384
2385 pWayPointPreventDragging = new wxCheckBox(
2386 itemPanelRoutes, ID_DRAGGINGCHECKBOX,
2387 _("Lock marks and waypoints (Unless object property dialog visible)"));
2388 pWayPointPreventDragging->SetValue(FALSE);
2389 ControlSizer->Add(pWayPointPreventDragging, verticleInputFlags);
2390
2391 pConfirmObjectDeletion =
2392 new wxCheckBox(itemPanelRoutes, ID_DELETECHECKBOX,
2393 _("Confirm deletion of tracks and routes"));
2394 pConfirmObjectDeletion->SetValue(FALSE);
2395 ControlSizer->Add(pConfirmObjectDeletion, verticleInputFlags);
2396 ControlSizer->AddSpacer(5);
2397
2398 // Fill the default waypoint icon selector combo box
2399 pWaypointDefaultIconChoice->Clear();
2400 // Iterate on the Icon Descriptions, filling in the combo control
2401 bool fillCombo = true;
2402
2403 if (fillCombo) {
2404 for (int i = 0; i < pWayPointMan->GetNumIcons(); i++) {
2405 wxString* ps = pWayPointMan->GetIconDescription(i);
2406 wxBitmap bmp = pWayPointMan->GetIconBitmapForList(i, 2 * GetCharHeight());
2407
2408 pWaypointDefaultIconChoice->Append(*ps, bmp);
2409 }
2410 }
2411
2412 // find the correct item in the combo box
2413 int iconToSelect = -1;
2414 for (int i = 0; i < pWayPointMan->GetNumIcons(); i++) {
2415 if (*pWayPointMan->GetIconKey(i) == g_default_wp_icon) {
2416 iconToSelect = i;
2417 pWaypointDefaultIconChoice->Select(iconToSelect);
2418 break;
2419 }
2420 }
2421
2422 // Fill the default Routepoint icon selector combo box
2423 pRoutepointDefaultIconChoice->Clear();
2424 // Iterate on the Icon Descriptions, filling in the combo control
2425 fillCombo = true;
2426
2427 if (fillCombo) {
2428 for (int i = 0; i < pWayPointMan->GetNumIcons(); i++) {
2429 wxString* ps = pWayPointMan->GetIconDescription(i);
2430 wxBitmap bmp = pWayPointMan->GetIconBitmapForList(i, 2 * GetCharHeight());
2431
2432 pRoutepointDefaultIconChoice->Append(*ps, bmp);
2433 }
2434 }
2435
2436 // find the correct item in the combo box
2437 iconToSelect = -1;
2438 for (int i = 0; i < pWayPointMan->GetNumIcons(); i++) {
2439 if (*pWayPointMan->GetIconKey(i) == g_default_routepoint_icon) {
2440 iconToSelect = i;
2441 pRoutepointDefaultIconChoice->Select(iconToSelect);
2442 break;
2443 }
2444 }
2445
2446 // DimeControl(itemPanelRoutes);
2447}
2448
2449void options::CreatePanel_ChartsLoad(size_t parent, int border_size,
2450 int group_item_spacing) {
2451 chartPanelWin = AddPage(m_pageCharts, _("Chart Files"));
2452
2453 chartPanel = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
2454 chartPanelWin->SetSizer(chartPanel);
2455
2456 loadedBox = new wxStaticBox(chartPanelWin, wxID_ANY, _("Directories"));
2457 activeSizer = new wxStaticBoxSizer(loadedBox, wxHORIZONTAL);
2458 chartPanel->Add(activeSizer, 1, wxALL | wxEXPAND, border_size);
2459
2460 m_scrollWinChartList = new wxScrolledWindow(
2461 chartPanelWin, wxID_ANY, wxDefaultPosition,
2462 wxDLG_UNIT(this, wxSize(-1, -1)), wxBORDER_RAISED | wxVSCROLL);
2463
2464 activeSizer->Add(m_scrollWinChartList, 1, wxALL | wxEXPAND, 5);
2465
2466#ifndef __ANDROID__
2467 m_scrollRate = 5;
2468#else
2469 m_scrollRate = 1;
2470#endif
2471 m_scrollWinChartList->SetScrollRate(m_scrollRate, m_scrollRate);
2472
2473 boxSizerCharts = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
2474 m_scrollWinChartList->SetSizer(boxSizerCharts);
2475
2476 cmdButtonSizer = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
2477 activeSizer->Add(cmdButtonSizer, 0, wxALL, border_size);
2478
2479 wxString b1 = _("Add Directory...");
2480 wxString b2 = _("Remove Selected");
2481 wxString b3 = _("Compress Selected");
2482
2483 if (m_bcompact) {
2484 b1 = _("Add..");
2485 b2 = _("Remove");
2486 b3 = _("Compress");
2487 }
2488
2489 wxButton* addBtn = new wxButton(chartPanelWin, ID_BUTTONADD, b1);
2490 cmdButtonSizer->Add(addBtn, 1, wxALL | wxEXPAND, group_item_spacing);
2491
2492 cmdButtonSizer->AddSpacer(GetCharHeight());
2493
2494 m_removeBtn = new wxButton(chartPanelWin, ID_BUTTONDELETE, b2);
2495 cmdButtonSizer->Add(m_removeBtn, 1, wxALL | wxEXPAND, group_item_spacing);
2496 m_removeBtn->Disable();
2497
2498 cmdButtonSizer->AddSpacer(GetCharHeight());
2499
2500#ifdef OCPN_USE_LZMA
2501 m_compressBtn = new wxButton(chartPanelWin, ID_BUTTONCOMPRESS, b3);
2502 cmdButtonSizer->Add(m_compressBtn, 1, wxALL | wxEXPAND, group_item_spacing);
2503 m_compressBtn->Disable();
2504#else
2505 m_compressBtn = NULL;
2506#endif
2507
2508#ifdef __ANDROID__
2509 if (g_Android_SDK_Version >= 30) {
2510 m_migrateBtn =
2511 new wxButton(chartPanelWin, ID_BUTTONMIGRATE, _("Migrate Charts.."));
2512 cmdButtonSizer->Add(m_migrateBtn, 1, wxALL | wxEXPAND, group_item_spacing);
2513 }
2514#endif
2515
2516 cmdButtonSizer->AddSpacer(GetCharHeight());
2517
2518 wxStaticBox* itemStaticBoxUpdateStatic =
2519 new wxStaticBox(chartPanelWin, wxID_ANY, _("Update Control"));
2520 wxStaticBoxSizer* itemStaticBoxSizerUpdate =
2521 new wxStaticBoxSizer(itemStaticBoxUpdateStatic, wxVERTICAL);
2522 chartPanel->Add(itemStaticBoxSizerUpdate, 0, wxGROW | wxALL, 5);
2523
2524 wxFlexGridSizer* itemFlexGridSizerUpdate = new wxFlexGridSizer(1);
2525 itemFlexGridSizerUpdate->SetFlexibleDirection(wxHORIZONTAL);
2526
2527 pScanCheckBox = new wxCheckBox(chartPanelWin, ID_SCANCHECKBOX,
2528 _("Scan Charts and Update Database"));
2529 itemFlexGridSizerUpdate->Add(pScanCheckBox, 1, wxALL, 5);
2530
2531 pUpdateCheckBox = new wxCheckBox(chartPanelWin, ID_UPDCHECKBOX,
2532 _("Force Full Database Rebuild"));
2533 itemFlexGridSizerUpdate->Add(pUpdateCheckBox, 1, wxALL, 5);
2534
2535 pParseENCButton = new wxButton(chartPanelWin, ID_PARSEENCBUTTON,
2536 _("Prepare all ENC Charts"));
2537 itemFlexGridSizerUpdate->Add(pParseENCButton, 1, wxALL, 5);
2538
2539 itemStaticBoxSizerUpdate->Add(itemFlexGridSizerUpdate, 1, wxEXPAND, 5);
2540
2541 // Currently loaded chart dirs
2542 ActiveChartArray.Clear();
2543 for (size_t i = 0; i < m_CurrentDirList.GetCount(); i++) {
2544 ActiveChartArray.Add(m_CurrentDirList[i]);
2545 }
2546
2547 UpdateChartDirList();
2548
2549 chartPanel->Layout();
2550}
2551
2552void options::UpdateChartDirList() {
2553 // Clear the sizer, and delete all the child panels
2554 m_scrollWinChartList->GetSizer()->Clear(true);
2555 m_scrollWinChartList->ClearBackground();
2556
2557 panelVector.clear();
2558
2559 // Add new panels
2560 for (size_t i = 0; i < ActiveChartArray.GetCount(); i++) {
2561 OCPNChartDirPanel* chartPanel =
2562 new OCPNChartDirPanel(m_scrollWinChartList, wxID_ANY, wxDefaultPosition,
2563 wxSize(-1, -1), ActiveChartArray[i]);
2564 chartPanel->SetSelected(false);
2565
2566 m_scrollWinChartList->GetSizer()->Add(chartPanel, 0, wxEXPAND | wxALL, 0);
2567
2568 panelVector.push_back(chartPanel);
2569 }
2570
2571 m_scrollWinChartList->GetSizer()->Layout();
2572
2573 chartPanelWin->ClearBackground();
2574 chartPanelWin->Layout();
2575
2576 // There are some problems with wxScrolledWindow after add/removing items.
2577 // Typically, the problem is that blank space remains at the top of the
2578 // scrollable range of the window.
2579 // Workarounds here...
2580 // n.b. according to wx docs, none of this should be necessary...
2581#ifdef __ANDROID__
2582 // This works on Android, but seems pretty drastic
2583 wxSize sza = GetSize();
2584 sza.y -= 1;
2585 SetSize(sza);
2586#else
2587 // This works, except on Android
2588 m_scrollWinChartList->GetParent()->Layout();
2589#endif
2590
2591 m_scrollWinChartList->Scroll(0, 0);
2592}
2593
2594void options::UpdateTemplateTitleText() {
2595 if (!m_templateTitleText) return;
2596
2597 wxString activeTitle;
2598 if (!g_lastAppliedTemplateGUID.IsEmpty()) {
2599 activeTitle = ConfigMgr::Get().GetTemplateTitle(g_lastAppliedTemplateGUID);
2600
2601 bool configCompare =
2602 ConfigMgr::Get().CheckTemplateGUID(g_lastAppliedTemplateGUID);
2603 if (!configCompare) activeTitle += _(" [Modified]");
2604 m_templateTitleText->SetLabel(activeTitle);
2605 } else
2606 m_templateTitleText->SetLabel(_("None"));
2607}
2608
2609void options::CreatePanel_Configs(size_t parent, int border_size,
2610 int group_item_spacing) {
2611 m_DisplayConfigsPage = AddPage(parent, _("Templates"));
2612
2613 // if (m_bcompact) {
2614 //}
2615 // else
2616 {
2617 wxBoxSizer* wrapperSizer = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
2618 m_DisplayConfigsPage->SetSizer(wrapperSizer);
2619
2620 // Template management
2621
2622 wxStaticBox* templateStatusBox =
2623 new wxStaticBox(m_DisplayConfigsPage, wxID_ANY, _("Template Status"));
2624 m_templateStatusBoxSizer =
2625 new wxStaticBoxSizer(templateStatusBox, wxHORIZONTAL);
2626 wrapperSizer->Add(m_templateStatusBoxSizer, 1, wxALL | wxEXPAND,
2627 border_size);
2628
2629 wxBoxSizer* statSizer = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
2630 m_templateStatusBoxSizer->Add(statSizer, 0, wxALL | wxEXPAND, border_size);
2631
2632 m_staticTextLastAppled = new wxStaticText(
2633 m_DisplayConfigsPage, wxID_ANY, _("Last Applied Template Title:"));
2634 m_staticTextLastAppled->Hide();
2635
2636 statSizer->Add(m_staticTextLastAppled);
2637
2638 m_templateTitleText =
2639 new wxStaticText(m_DisplayConfigsPage, wxID_ANY, wxEmptyString);
2640 statSizer->Add(m_templateTitleText);
2641 m_templateTitleText->Hide();
2642
2643 UpdateTemplateTitleText();
2644
2645 wxStaticBox* configsBox =
2646 new wxStaticBox(m_DisplayConfigsPage, wxID_ANY, _("Saved Templates"));
2647 wxStaticBoxSizer* configSizer =
2648 new wxStaticBoxSizer(configsBox, wxHORIZONTAL);
2649 wrapperSizer->Add(configSizer, 4, wxALL | wxEXPAND, border_size);
2650
2651 wxPanel* cPanel = new wxPanel(m_DisplayConfigsPage, wxID_ANY);
2652 configSizer->Add(cPanel, 1, wxALL | wxEXPAND, border_size);
2653
2654 wxBoxSizer* boxSizercPanel = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
2655 cPanel->SetSizer(boxSizercPanel);
2656
2657 m_scrollWinConfigList =
2658 new wxScrolledWindow(cPanel, wxID_ANY, wxDefaultPosition, wxDefaultSize,
2659 wxBORDER_RAISED | wxVSCROLL);
2660 m_scrollWinConfigList->SetScrollRate(1, 1);
2661 boxSizercPanel->Add(m_scrollWinConfigList, 0, wxALL | wxEXPAND,
2662 border_size);
2663 m_scrollWinConfigList->SetMinSize(wxSize(-1, 15 * GetCharHeight()));
2664
2665 m_boxSizerConfigs = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
2666 m_scrollWinConfigList->SetSizer(m_boxSizerConfigs);
2667
2668 wxBoxSizer* btnSizer = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
2669 configSizer->Add(btnSizer);
2670
2671 // Add the "Insert/Remove" buttons
2672 wxButton* createButton =
2673 new wxButton(m_DisplayConfigsPage, wxID_ANY, _("Create Config..."));
2674 btnSizer->Add(createButton, 1, wxALL | wxEXPAND, group_item_spacing);
2675 createButton->Connect(wxEVT_COMMAND_BUTTON_CLICKED,
2676 wxCommandEventHandler(options::OnCreateConfig), NULL,
2677 this);
2678
2679 // wxButton* editButton = new wxButton(m_DisplayConfigsPage, wxID_ANY,
2680 // _("Edit Config...")); btnSizer->Add(editButton, 1, wxALL | wxEXPAND,
2681 // group_item_spacing); editButton->Connect(wxEVT_COMMAND_BUTTON_CLICKED,
2682 // wxCommandEventHandler(options::OnEditConfig), NULL, this);
2683
2684 m_configDeleteButton = new wxButton(m_DisplayConfigsPage, wxID_ANY,
2685 _("Delete Selected Config..."));
2686 btnSizer->Add(m_configDeleteButton, 1, wxALL | wxEXPAND,
2687 group_item_spacing);
2688 m_configDeleteButton->Connect(
2689 wxEVT_COMMAND_BUTTON_CLICKED,
2690 wxCommandEventHandler(options::OnDeleteConfig), NULL, this);
2691
2692 m_configApplyButton = new wxButton(m_DisplayConfigsPage, wxID_ANY,
2693 _("Apply Selected Config"));
2694 btnSizer->Add(m_configApplyButton, 1, wxALL | wxEXPAND, group_item_spacing);
2695 m_configApplyButton->Connect(wxEVT_COMMAND_BUTTON_CLICKED,
2696 wxCommandEventHandler(options::OnApplyConfig),
2697 NULL, this);
2698
2699 // Populate the configs list from the ConfigMgr
2700 ClearConfigList();
2701 BuildConfigList();
2702
2703 SetConfigButtonState();
2704 }
2705}
2706
2707void options::ClearConfigList() {
2708 if (m_scrollWinConfigList) {
2709 wxWindowList kids = m_scrollWinConfigList->GetChildren();
2710 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < kids.GetCount(); i++) {
2711 wxWindowListNode* node = kids.Item(i);
2712 wxWindow* win = node->GetData();
2713 auto pcp = dynamic_cast<wxPanel*>(win);
2714 if (pcp) {
2715 auto cPanel = dynamic_cast<ConfigPanel*>(pcp);
2716 if (cPanel) {
2717 cPanel->Destroy();
2718 }
2719 }
2720 }
2721 }
2722 SetConfigButtonState();
2723}
2724
2725void options::BuildConfigList() {
2726 wxArrayString configGUIDs = ConfigMgr::Get().GetConfigGUIDArray();
2727
2728 for (size_t i = 0; i < configGUIDs.GetCount(); i++) {
2729 wxPanel* pp =
2730 ConfigMgr::Get().GetConfigPanel(m_scrollWinConfigList, configGUIDs[i]);
2731 if (pp) {
2732 m_panelBackgroundUnselected = pp->GetBackgroundColour();
2733 m_boxSizerConfigs->Add(pp, 1, wxEXPAND);
2734 pp->Connect(wxEVT_LEFT_DOWN,
2735 wxMouseEventHandler(options::OnConfigMouseSelected), NULL,
2736 this);
2737
2738 // Set mouse handler for children of the panel, too.
2739 wxWindowList kids = pp->GetChildren();
2740 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < kids.GetCount(); i++) {
2741 wxWindowListNode* node = kids.Item(i);
2742 wxWindow* win = node->GetData();
2743 win->Connect(wxEVT_LEFT_DOWN,
2744 wxMouseEventHandler(options::OnConfigMouseSelected), NULL,
2745 this);
2746 }
2747 }
2748 }
2749
2750 m_boxSizerConfigs->Layout();
2751
2752 m_selectedConfigPanelGUID = _T("");
2753 SetConfigButtonState();
2754}
2755
2756void options::SetConfigButtonState() {
2757 m_configDeleteButton->Enable(!m_selectedConfigPanelGUID.IsEmpty());
2758 if (m_selectedConfigPanelGUID.StartsWith(
2759 _T("11111111"))) // Cannot delete "Recovery" template
2760 m_configDeleteButton->Disable();
2761 m_configApplyButton->Enable(!m_selectedConfigPanelGUID.IsEmpty());
2762}
2763
2764void options::OnCreateConfig(wxCommandEvent& event) {
2765 ConfigCreateDialog* pd = new ConfigCreateDialog(
2766 this, -1, _("Create Config"), wxDefaultPosition, wxSize(200, 200));
2767 DimeControl(pd);
2768 pd->ShowWindowModalThenDo([this, pd](int retcode) {
2769 if (retcode == wxID_OK) {
2770 g_lastAppliedTemplateGUID = pd->GetCreatedTemplateGUID();
2771 UpdateTemplateTitleText();
2772
2773 ClearConfigList();
2774 BuildConfigList();
2775 m_DisplayConfigsPage->Layout();
2776 }
2777 SetConfigButtonState();
2778 });
2779}
2780
2781void options::OnEditConfig(wxCommandEvent& event) {}
2782
2783void options::OnDeleteConfig(wxCommandEvent& event) {
2784 if (m_selectedConfigPanelGUID.IsEmpty()) return;
2785
2786 ConfigMgr::Get().DeleteConfig(m_selectedConfigPanelGUID);
2787 m_selectedConfigPanelGUID = _T("");
2788
2789 ClearConfigList();
2790 BuildConfigList();
2791
2792 m_DisplayConfigsPage->Layout();
2793 SetConfigButtonState();
2794}
2795
2796void options::OnApplyConfig(wxCommandEvent& event) {
2797 if (m_selectedConfigPanelGUID.IsEmpty()) return;
2798
2799 // Record a few special items
2800 wxString currentLocale = g_locale;
2801
2802 // Apply any changed settings other than the target config template.
2803 wxCommandEvent evt;
2804 evt.SetId(ID_APPLY);
2805 OnApplyClick(evt);
2806
2807 // Then Apply the target config template
2808 bool bApplyStat = ConfigMgr::Get().ApplyConfigGUID(m_selectedConfigPanelGUID);
2809 if (bApplyStat) {
2810 // OCPNMessageBox(this, _("Configuration successfully applied."),
2811 // _("OpenCPN Info"), wxOK);
2812 g_lastAppliedTemplateGUID = m_selectedConfigPanelGUID;
2813 wxString activeTitle =
2814 ConfigMgr::Get().GetTemplateTitle(g_lastAppliedTemplateGUID);
2815 m_templateTitleText->SetLabel(activeTitle);
2816 m_templateTitleText->Show();
2817 m_staticTextLastAppled->Show();
2818 m_templateStatusBoxSizer->Layout();
2819 } else
2820 OCPNMessageBox(this, _("Problem applying selected configuration."),
2821 _("OpenCPN Info"), wxOK);
2822
2823 // Clear all selections
2824 if (m_scrollWinConfigList) {
2825 wxWindowList kids = m_scrollWinConfigList->GetChildren();
2826 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < kids.GetCount(); i++) {
2827 wxWindowListNode* node = kids.Item(i);
2828 wxWindow* win = node->GetData();
2829 auto pcp = dynamic_cast<wxPanel*>(win);
2830 if (pcp) {
2831 auto cPanel = dynamic_cast<ConfigPanel*>(pcp);
2832 if (cPanel) {
2833 cPanel->SetBackgroundColour(m_panelBackgroundUnselected);
2834 }
2835 }
2836 }
2837 }
2838 m_selectedConfigPanelGUID = wxEmptyString;
2839
2840 m_returnChanges |= CONFIG_CHANGED;
2841
2842 if (!currentLocale.IsSameAs(g_locale)) m_returnChanges |= LOCALE_CHANGED;
2843
2844 Finish();
2845}
2846
2847void options::OnConfigMouseSelected(wxMouseEvent& event) {
2848 wxPanel* selectedPanel = NULL;
2849 wxObject* obj = event.GetEventObject();
2850 if (obj) {
2851 auto panel = dynamic_cast<wxPanel*>(obj);
2852 if (panel) {
2853 selectedPanel = panel;
2854 }
2855 // Clicked on child?
2856 else {
2857 auto win = dynamic_cast<wxWindow*>(obj);
2858 if (win) {
2859 auto parentpanel = dynamic_cast<wxPanel*>(win->GetParent());
2860 if (parentpanel) {
2861 selectedPanel = parentpanel;
2862 }
2863 }
2864 }
2865
2866 if (m_scrollWinConfigList) {
2867 wxWindowList kids = m_scrollWinConfigList->GetChildren();
2868 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < kids.GetCount(); i++) {
2869 wxWindowListNode* node = kids.Item(i);
2870 wxWindow* win = node->GetData();
2871 auto panel = dynamic_cast<wxPanel*>(win);
2872 if (panel) {
2873 if (panel == selectedPanel) {
2874 panel->SetBackgroundColour(wxSystemSettings::GetColour(
2875 wxSystemColour::wxSYS_COLOUR_HIGHLIGHT));
2876 auto cPanel = dynamic_cast<ConfigPanel*>(panel);
2877 if (cPanel) m_selectedConfigPanelGUID = cPanel->GetConfigGUID();
2878 } else
2879 panel->SetBackgroundColour(m_panelBackgroundUnselected);
2880
2881 panel->Refresh(true);
2882 }
2883 }
2884 }
2885 m_DisplayConfigsPage->Layout();
2886 SetConfigButtonState();
2887 }
2888}
2889
2890void options::CreatePanel_Advanced(size_t parent, int border_size,
2891 int group_item_spacing) {
2892 m_ChartDisplayPage = AddPage(parent, _("Advanced"));
2893
2894 if (m_bcompact) {
2895 wxSize sz = g_Platform->getDisplaySize();
2896 double dpmm = g_Platform->GetDisplayDPmm();
2897
2898 wxBoxSizer* wrapperSizer = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
2899 m_ChartDisplayPage->SetSizer(wrapperSizer);
2900
2901 wxBoxSizer* itemBoxSizerUI = wrapperSizer;
2902
2903 // spacer
2904 itemBoxSizerUI->Add(0, border_size * 3);
2905 itemBoxSizerUI->Add(0, border_size * 3);
2906
2907 // Chart Display Options
2908 wxBoxSizer* boxCharts = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
2909 itemBoxSizerUI->Add(boxCharts, groupInputFlags);
2910
2911 pSkewComp = new wxCheckBox(m_ChartDisplayPage, ID_SKEWCOMPBOX,
2912 _("De-skew Raster Charts"));
2913 boxCharts->Add(pSkewComp, inputFlags);
2914
2915 itemBoxSizerUI->Add(0, border_size * 3);
2916 itemBoxSizerUI->Add(0, border_size * 3);
2917
2918 // OpenGL Options
2919#ifdef ocpnUSE_GL
2920 wxBoxSizer* OpenGLSizer = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
2921 itemBoxSizerUI->Add(OpenGLSizer, 0, 0, 0);
2922
2923 pOpenGL = new wxCheckBox(m_ChartDisplayPage, ID_OPENGLBOX,
2924 _("Use Accelerated Graphics (OpenGL)"));
2925 OpenGLSizer->Add(pOpenGL, inputFlags);
2926 pOpenGL->Enable(!g_bdisable_opengl && g_Platform->IsGLCapable());
2927
2928 wxButton* bOpenGL = new wxButton(m_ChartDisplayPage, ID_OPENGLOPTIONS,
2929 _("OpenGL Options") + _T("..."));
2930 OpenGLSizer->Add(bOpenGL, inputFlags);
2931 bOpenGL->Enable(!g_bdisable_opengl && g_Platform->IsGLCapable());
2932
2933 pOpenGL->Connect(wxEVT_COMMAND_CHECKBOX_CLICKED,
2934 wxCommandEventHandler(options::OnGLClicked), NULL, this);
2935#ifdef __ANDROID__
2936 pOpenGL->Hide();
2937 bOpenGL->Hide();
2938#endif
2939 itemBoxSizerUI->Add(0, border_size * 3);
2940 itemBoxSizerUI->Add(0, border_size * 3);
2941#endif // ocpnUSE_GL
2942
2943 // Course Up display update period
2944 wxStaticText* crat = new wxStaticText(m_ChartDisplayPage, wxID_ANY,
2945 _("Chart Rotation Averaging Time"));
2946 crat->Wrap(-1);
2947 wrapperSizer->Add(crat, 0,
2948 wxALL | wxEXPAND | wxALIGN_LEFT | wxALIGN_CENTRE_VERTICAL,
2949 group_item_spacing);
2950

2952 wrapperSizer->Add(pCOGUPFilterRow, 0, wxALL | wxEXPAND, group_item_spacing);
2953

2955 new wxTextCtrl(m_ChartDisplayPage, ID_OPTEXTCTRL, _T(""),
2956 wxDefaultPosition, wxSize(sz.x / 5, -1), wxTE_RIGHT);
2957 pCOGUPFilterRow->Add(pCOGUPUpdateSecs, 0, wxALIGN_RIGHT | wxALL,
2958 group_item_spacing);
2959
2960 pCOGUPFilterRow->Add(
2961 new wxStaticText(m_ChartDisplayPage, wxID_ANY, _("seconds")),
2962 inputFlags);
2963
2964 itemBoxSizerUI->Add(0, border_size * 3);
2965 itemBoxSizerUI->Add(0, border_size * 3);
2966
2967 // Chart Zoom Scale Weighting
2968 wxStaticText* zoomTextHead = new wxStaticText(
2969 m_ChartDisplayPage, wxID_ANY, _("Chart Zoom/Scale Weighting"));
2970 zoomTextHead->Wrap(-1);
2971 itemBoxSizerUI->Add(
2972 zoomTextHead, 0,
2973 wxALL | wxEXPAND | wxALIGN_LEFT | wxALIGN_CENTRE_VERTICAL,
2974 group_item_spacing);
2975 itemBoxSizerUI->Add(0, border_size * 1);
2976

2978 new wxStaticText(m_ChartDisplayPage, wxID_ANY, _("Raster")),
2979 inputFlags);
2980

2983 wxDefaultPosition, m_sliderSize, SLIDER_STYLE);
2984

2986 prepareSlider(m_pSlider_Zoom_Raster);
2987#endif

2993 inputFlags);

2997 wxDefaultPosition, m_sliderSize, SLIDER_STYLE);

3001#endif

3007 inputFlags);

3010 -CM93_ZOOM_FACTOR_MAX_RANGE, CM93_ZOOM_FACTOR_MAX_RANGE,
3011 wxDefaultPosition, m_sliderSize, SLIDER_STYLE);

3071 // itemBoxSizerUI->AddGrowableCol( 0, 1 );

3150 // wx2.8 doesn't support it

3152 0.5); // + 0.5 to round instead of truncate
3153 zoomText->SetFont(smallFont);
