3303
3304void options::CreatePanel_VectorCharts(size_t parent, int border_size,
3305 int group_item_spacing) {
3306 ps57Ctl = AddPage(parent, _("Vector Chart Display"));
3307
3308 if (!m_bcompact) {
3309 vectorPanel = new wxBoxSizer(wxHORIZONTAL);
3310 ps57Ctl->SetSizer(vectorPanel);
3311
3312 // 1st column, all options except Mariner's Standard
3313 wxFlexGridSizer* optionsColumn = new wxFlexGridSizer(2);
3314 optionsColumn->SetHGap(border_size);
3315 optionsColumn->AddGrowableCol(0, 2);
3316 optionsColumn->AddGrowableCol(1, 3);
3317 vectorPanel->Add(optionsColumn, 3, wxALL | wxEXPAND, border_size);
3318
3319 // spacer
3320 optionsColumn->Add(new wxStaticText(ps57Ctl, wxID_ANY, _T("")));
3321 optionsColumn->Add(new wxStaticText(ps57Ctl, wxID_ANY, _T("")));
3322
3323 if (!g_useMUI) {
3324 // display category
3325 optionsColumn->Add(
3326 new wxStaticText(ps57Ctl, wxID_ANY, _("Display Category")),
3327 labelFlags);
3328 wxString pDispCatStrings[] = {_("Base"), _("Standard"), _("All"),
3329 _("Mariner's Standard")};
3330 pDispCat = new wxChoice(ps57Ctl, ID_RADARDISTUNIT, wxDefaultPosition,
3331 wxDefaultSize, 4, pDispCatStrings);
3332 optionsColumn->Add(pDispCat, 0, wxALL, 2);
3333 }
3334
3335 // spacer
3336 optionsColumn->Add(new wxStaticText(ps57Ctl, wxID_ANY, _T("")));
3337 optionsColumn->Add(new wxStaticText(ps57Ctl, wxID_ANY, _T("")));
3338
3339 // display options
3340 optionsColumn->Add(new wxStaticText(ps57Ctl, wxID_ANY, ""),
3341 groupLabelFlags);
3342
3343 wxBoxSizer* miscSizer = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
3344 optionsColumn->Add(miscSizer, groupInputFlags);
3345
3346 if (!g_useMUI) {
3347 pCheck_SOUNDG =
3348 new wxCheckBox(ps57Ctl, ID_SOUNDGCHECKBOX, _("Depth Soundings"));
3349 pCheck_SOUNDG->SetValue(FALSE);
3350 miscSizer->Add(pCheck_SOUNDG, verticleInputFlags);
3351 }
3352
3353 pCheck_META = new wxCheckBox(ps57Ctl, ID_METACHECKBOX,
3354 _("Chart Information Objects"));
3355 pCheck_META->SetValue(FALSE);
3356 miscSizer->Add(pCheck_META, verticleInputFlags);
3357
3358 if (!g_useMUI) {
3359 optionsColumn->Add(new wxStaticText(ps57Ctl, wxID_ANY, _("Buoys/Lights")),
3360 groupLabelFlags);
3361
3362 wxBoxSizer* lightSizer = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
3363 optionsColumn->Add(lightSizer, groupInputFlags);
3364
3365 pCheck_ATONTEXT =
3366 new wxCheckBox(ps57Ctl, ID_ATONTEXTCHECKBOX, _("Buoy/Light Labels"));
3367 pCheck_ATONTEXT->SetValue(FALSE);
3368 lightSizer->Add(pCheck_ATONTEXT, verticleInputFlags);
3369
3370 pCheck_LDISTEXT =
3371 new wxCheckBox(ps57Ctl, ID_LDISTEXTCHECKBOX, _("Light Descriptions"));
3372 pCheck_LDISTEXT->SetValue(FALSE);
3373 lightSizer->Add(pCheck_LDISTEXT, verticleInputFlags);
3374
3375 pCheck_XLSECTTEXT = new wxCheckBox(ps57Ctl, ID_LDISTEXTCHECKBOX,
3376 _("Extended Light Sectors"));
3377 pCheck_XLSECTTEXT->SetValue(FALSE);
3378 lightSizer->Add(pCheck_XLSECTTEXT, verticleInputFlags);
3379 }
3380
3381 optionsColumn->Add(new wxStaticText(ps57Ctl, wxID_ANY, _("Chart Texts")),
3382 groupLabelFlags);
3383
3384 wxBoxSizer* textSizer = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
3385 optionsColumn->Add(textSizer, groupInputFlags);
3386
3387 pCheck_NATIONALTEXT = new wxCheckBox(ps57Ctl, ID_NATIONALTEXTCHECKBOX,
3388 _("National text on chart"));
3389 pCheck_NATIONALTEXT->SetValue(FALSE);
3390 textSizer->Add(pCheck_NATIONALTEXT, verticleInputFlags);
3391
3392 pCheck_SHOWIMPTEXT =
3393 new wxCheckBox(ps57Ctl, ID_IMPTEXTCHECKBOX, _("Important Text Only"));
3394 pCheck_SHOWIMPTEXT->SetValue(FALSE);
3395 textSizer->Add(pCheck_SHOWIMPTEXT, verticleInputFlags);
3396
3397 pCheck_DECLTEXT =
3398 new wxCheckBox(ps57Ctl, ID_DECLTEXTCHECKBOX, _("De-Cluttered Text"));
3399 pCheck_DECLTEXT->SetValue(FALSE);
3400 textSizer->Add(pCheck_DECLTEXT, verticleInputFlags);
3401
3402 optionsColumn->Add(new wxStaticText(ps57Ctl, wxID_ANY, _("Chart Detail")),
3403 labelFlags);
3404 pCheck_SCAMIN = new wxCheckBox(ps57Ctl, ID_SCAMINCHECKBOX,
3405 _("Reduced Detail at Small Scale"));
3406 pCheck_SCAMIN->SetValue(FALSE);
3407 optionsColumn->Add(pCheck_SCAMIN, inputFlags);
3408
3409 optionsColumn->Add(new wxStaticText(ps57Ctl, wxID_ANY, ""), labelFlags);
3410 pCheck_SuperSCAMIN =
3411 new wxCheckBox(ps57Ctl, ID_SUPERSCAMINCHECKBOX,
3412 _("Additional detail reduction at Small Scale"));
3413 pCheck_SuperSCAMIN->SetValue(FALSE);
3414 optionsColumn->Add(pCheck_SuperSCAMIN, inputFlags);
3415
3416 // spacer
3417 optionsColumn->Add(0, border_size * 4);
3418 optionsColumn->Add(0, border_size * 4);
3419
3420 // graphics options
3421 optionsColumn->Add(new wxStaticText(ps57Ctl, wxID_ANY, _("Graphics Style")),
3422 labelFlags);
3423 wxString pPointStyleStrings[] = {
3424 _("Paper Chart"),
3425 _("Simplified"),
3426 };
3427 pPointStyle = new wxChoice(ps57Ctl, ID_RADARDISTUNIT, wxDefaultPosition,
3428 wxDefaultSize, 2, pPointStyleStrings);
3429 optionsColumn->Add(pPointStyle, inputFlags);
3430
3431 optionsColumn->Add(new wxStaticText(ps57Ctl, wxID_ANY, _("Boundaries")),
3432 labelFlags);
3433 wxString pBoundStyleStrings[] = {
3434 _("Plain"),
3435 _("Symbolized"),
3436 };
3437 pBoundStyle = new wxChoice(ps57Ctl, ID_RADARDISTUNIT, wxDefaultPosition,
3438 wxDefaultSize, 2, pBoundStyleStrings);
3439 optionsColumn->Add(pBoundStyle, inputFlags);
3440
3441 optionsColumn->Add(new wxStaticText(ps57Ctl, wxID_ANY, _("Colors")),
3442 labelFlags);
3443 wxString pColorNumStrings[] = {
3444 _("2 Color"),
3445 _("4 Color"),
3446 };
3447 p24Color = new wxChoice(ps57Ctl, ID_RADARDISTUNIT, wxDefaultPosition,
3448 wxDefaultSize, 2, pColorNumStrings);
3449 optionsColumn->Add(p24Color, inputFlags);
3450
3451 // spacer
3452 optionsColumn->Add(0, border_size * 4);
3453 optionsColumn->Add(0, border_size * 4);
3454
3455 // depth options
3456 optionsColumn->Add(new wxStaticText(ps57Ctl, wxID_ANY, _("Shallow Depth")),
3457 labelFlags);
3458 wxBoxSizer* depShalRow = new wxBoxSizer(wxHORIZONTAL);
3459 optionsColumn->Add(depShalRow);
3460 m_ShallowCtl =
3461 new wxTextCtrl(ps57Ctl, ID_OPTEXTCTRL, _T(""), wxDefaultPosition,
3462 wxSize(60, -1), wxTE_RIGHT);
3463 depShalRow->Add(m_ShallowCtl, inputFlags);
3464 m_depthUnitsShal = new wxStaticText(ps57Ctl, wxID_ANY, _("meters"));
3465 depShalRow->Add(m_depthUnitsShal, inputFlags);
3466
3467 optionsColumn->Add(new wxStaticText(ps57Ctl, wxID_ANY, _("Safety Depth")),
3468 labelFlags);
3469 wxBoxSizer* depSafeRow = new wxBoxSizer(wxHORIZONTAL);
3470 optionsColumn->Add(depSafeRow);
3471 m_SafetyCtl = new wxTextCtrl(ps57Ctl, ID_OPTEXTCTRL, _T(""),
3472 wxDefaultPosition, wxSize(60, -1), wxTE_RIGHT);
3473 depSafeRow->Add(m_SafetyCtl, inputFlags);
3474 m_depthUnitsSafe = new wxStaticText(ps57Ctl, wxID_ANY, _("meters"));
3475 depSafeRow->Add(m_depthUnitsSafe, inputFlags);
3476
3477 optionsColumn->Add(new wxStaticText(ps57Ctl, wxID_ANY, _("Deep Depth")),
3478 labelFlags);
3479 wxBoxSizer* depDeepRow = new wxBoxSizer(wxHORIZONTAL);
3480 optionsColumn->Add(depDeepRow);
3481 m_DeepCtl = new wxTextCtrl(ps57Ctl, ID_OPTEXTCTRL, _T(""),
3482 wxDefaultPosition, wxSize(60, -1), wxTE_RIGHT);
3483 depDeepRow->Add(m_DeepCtl, inputFlags);
3484 m_depthUnitsDeep = new wxStaticText(ps57Ctl, wxID_ANY, _("meters"));
3485 depDeepRow->Add(m_depthUnitsDeep, inputFlags);
3486
3487 // 2nd column, Display Category / Mariner's Standard options
3488 wxBoxSizer* dispSizer = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
3489 vectorPanel->Add(dispSizer, 2, wxALL | wxEXPAND, border_size);
3490
3491 wxStaticBox* marinersBox =
3492 new wxStaticBox(ps57Ctl, wxID_ANY, _("User Standard Objects"));
3493 wxStaticBoxSizer* marinersSizer =
3494 new wxStaticBoxSizer(marinersBox, wxVERTICAL);
3495 dispSizer->Add(marinersSizer, 1, wxALL | wxEXPAND, border_size);
3496
3497 ps57CtlListBox = new OCPNCheckedListCtrl(
3498 ps57Ctl, ID_CHECKLISTBOX, wxDefaultPosition, wxSize(250, 350));
3499 marinersSizer->Add(ps57CtlListBox, 1, wxALL | wxEXPAND, group_item_spacing);
3500
3501 wxBoxSizer* btnRow1 = new wxBoxSizer(wxHORIZONTAL);
3502 itemButtonSelectList =
3503 new wxButton(ps57Ctl, ID_SELECTLIST, _("Select All"));
3504 btnRow1->Add(itemButtonSelectList, 1, wxALL | wxEXPAND, group_item_spacing);
3505 itemButtonClearList = new wxButton(ps57Ctl, ID_CLEARLIST, _("Clear All"));
3506 btnRow1->Add(itemButtonClearList, 1, wxALL | wxEXPAND, group_item_spacing);
3507 marinersSizer->Add(btnRow1);
3508
3509 wxBoxSizer* btnRow2 = new wxBoxSizer(wxHORIZONTAL);
3510 itemButtonSetStd =
3511 new wxButton(ps57Ctl, ID_SETSTDLIST, _("Reset to STANDARD"));
3512 btnRow2->Add(itemButtonSetStd, 1, wxALL | wxEXPAND, group_item_spacing);
3513 marinersSizer->Add(btnRow2);
3514
3515 }
3516
3517 else { // compact
3518 vectorPanel = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
3519 ps57Ctl->SetSizer(vectorPanel);
3520
3521 wxBoxSizer* optionsColumn = vectorPanel;
3522
3523 // spacer
3524 optionsColumn->Add(new wxStaticText(ps57Ctl, wxID_ANY, _T("")));
3525
3526 // display category
3527 if (!g_useMUI) {
3528 optionsColumn->Add(
3529 new wxStaticText(ps57Ctl, wxID_ANY, _("Display Category")),
3530 inputFlags);
3531 wxString pDispCatStrings[] = {_("Base"), _("Standard"), _("All"),
3532 _("Mariner's Standard")};
3533 pDispCat = new wxChoice(ps57Ctl, ID_RADARDISTUNIT, wxDefaultPosition,
3534 wxSize(350, -1), 4, pDispCatStrings);
3535 optionsColumn->Add(pDispCat, 0, wxALL, 2);
3536
3537 // spacer
3538 optionsColumn->Add(new wxStaticText(ps57Ctl, wxID_ANY, _T("")));
3539 }
3540
3541 // display options
3542
3543 wxBoxSizer* miscSizer = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
3544 optionsColumn->Add(miscSizer, groupInputFlags);
3545
3546 pCheck_SOUNDG =
3547 new wxCheckBox(ps57Ctl, ID_SOUNDGCHECKBOX, _("Depth Soundings"));
3548 pCheck_SOUNDG->SetValue(FALSE);
3549 miscSizer->Add(pCheck_SOUNDG, inputFlags);
3550
3551 pCheck_META = new wxCheckBox(ps57Ctl, ID_METACHECKBOX,
3552 _("Chart Information Objects"));
3553 pCheck_META->SetValue(FALSE);
3554 miscSizer->Add(pCheck_META, inputFlags);
3555
3556 wxBoxSizer* lightSizer = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
3557 optionsColumn->Add(lightSizer, groupInputFlags);
3558
3559 pCheck_ATONTEXT =
3560 new wxCheckBox(ps57Ctl, ID_ATONTEXTCHECKBOX, _("Buoy/Light Labels"));
3561 pCheck_ATONTEXT->SetValue(FALSE);
3562 lightSizer->Add(pCheck_ATONTEXT, inputFlags);
3563
3564 pCheck_LDISTEXT =
3565 new wxCheckBox(ps57Ctl, ID_LDISTEXTCHECKBOX, _("Light Descriptions"));
3566 pCheck_LDISTEXT->SetValue(FALSE);
3567 lightSizer->Add(pCheck_LDISTEXT, inputFlags);
3568
3569 pCheck_XLSECTTEXT = new wxCheckBox(ps57Ctl, ID_LDISTEXTCHECKBOX,
3570 _("Extended Light Sectors"));
3571 pCheck_XLSECTTEXT->SetValue(FALSE);
3572 lightSizer->Add(pCheck_XLSECTTEXT, inputFlags);
3573
3574 wxBoxSizer* textSizer = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
3575 optionsColumn->Add(textSizer, groupInputFlags);
3576
3577 pCheck_NATIONALTEXT = new wxCheckBox(ps57Ctl, ID_NATIONALTEXTCHECKBOX,
3578 _("National text on chart"));
3579 pCheck_NATIONALTEXT->SetValue(FALSE);
3580 textSizer->Add(pCheck_NATIONALTEXT, inputFlags);
3581
3582 pCheck_SHOWIMPTEXT =
3583 new wxCheckBox(ps57Ctl, ID_IMPTEXTCHECKBOX, _("Important Text Only"));
3584 pCheck_SHOWIMPTEXT->SetValue(FALSE);
3585 textSizer->Add(pCheck_SHOWIMPTEXT, inputFlags);
3586
3587 pCheck_DECLTEXT =
3588 new wxCheckBox(ps57Ctl, ID_DECLTEXTCHECKBOX, _("De-Cluttered Text"));
3589 pCheck_DECLTEXT->SetValue(FALSE);
3590 textSizer->Add(pCheck_DECLTEXT, inputFlags);
3591
3592 pCheck_SCAMIN = new wxCheckBox(ps57Ctl, ID_SCAMINCHECKBOX,
3593 _("Reduced Detail at Small Scale"));
3594 pCheck_SCAMIN->SetValue(FALSE);
3595 optionsColumn->Add(pCheck_SCAMIN, inputFlags);
3596
3597 optionsColumn->Add(new wxStaticText(ps57Ctl, wxID_ANY, ""), labelFlags);
3598 pCheck_SuperSCAMIN =
3599 new wxCheckBox(ps57Ctl, ID_SUPERSCAMINCHECKBOX,
3600 _("Additional detail reduction at Small Scale"));
3601 pCheck_SuperSCAMIN->SetValue(FALSE);
3602 optionsColumn->Add(pCheck_SuperSCAMIN, inputFlags);
3603
3604 // spacer
3605 optionsColumn->Add(0, border_size * 4);
3606 optionsColumn->Add(0, border_size * 4);
3607
3608 // graphics options
3609
3610 wxFlexGridSizer* StyleColumn = new wxFlexGridSizer(2);
3611 StyleColumn->SetHGap(border_size);
3612 StyleColumn->AddGrowableCol(0, 2);
3613 StyleColumn->AddGrowableCol(1, 3);
3614 optionsColumn->Add(StyleColumn);
3615
3616 StyleColumn->Add(new wxStaticText(ps57Ctl, wxID_ANY, _("Graphics Style")),
3617 inputFlags);
3618 wxString pPointStyleStrings[] = {
3619 _("Paper Chart"),
3620 _("Simplified"),
3621 };
3622 pPointStyle = new wxChoice(ps57Ctl, ID_RADARDISTUNIT, wxDefaultPosition,
3623 wxSize(m_fontHeight * 3, m_fontHeight), 2,
3624 pPointStyleStrings);
3625#ifdef __ANDROID__
3626 setChoiceStyleSheet(pPointStyle, m_fontHeight * 8 / 10);
3627#endif
3628
3629 StyleColumn->Add(pPointStyle, inputFlags);
3630
3631 StyleColumn->Add(new wxStaticText(ps57Ctl, wxID_ANY, _("Boundaries")),
3632 inputFlags);
3633 wxString pBoundStyleStrings[] = {
3634 _("Plain"),
3635 _("Symbolized"),
3636 };
3637 pBoundStyle = new wxChoice(ps57Ctl, ID_RADARDISTUNIT, wxDefaultPosition,
3638 wxSize(m_fontHeight * 3, m_fontHeight), 2,
3639 pBoundStyleStrings);
3640#ifdef __ANDROID__
3641 setChoiceStyleSheet(pBoundStyle, m_fontHeight * 8 / 10);
3642#endif
3643
3644 StyleColumn->Add(pBoundStyle, inputFlags);
3645
3646 StyleColumn->Add(new wxStaticText(ps57Ctl, wxID_ANY, _("Colors")),
3647 inputFlags);
3648
3649 wxString pColorNumStrings[] = {
3650 _("2 Color"),
3651 _("4 Color"),
3652 };
3653 p24Color = new wxChoice(ps57Ctl, ID_RADARDISTUNIT, wxDefaultPosition,
3654 wxSize(m_fontHeight * 3, m_fontHeight), 2,
3655 pColorNumStrings);
3656#ifdef __ANDROID__
3657 setChoiceStyleSheet(p24Color, m_fontHeight * 8 / 10);
3658#endif
3659 StyleColumn->Add(p24Color, inputFlags);
3660
3661 // spacer
3662 optionsColumn->Add(0, border_size * 4);
3663 optionsColumn->Add(0, border_size * 4);
3664
3665 wxFlexGridSizer* DepthColumn = new wxFlexGridSizer(3);
3666 DepthColumn->SetHGap(border_size);
3667 DepthColumn->AddGrowableCol(0, 3);
3668 DepthColumn->AddGrowableCol(1, 2);
3669 DepthColumn->AddGrowableCol(2, 3);
3670 optionsColumn->Add(DepthColumn);
3671
3672 // depth options
3673 DepthColumn->Add(new wxStaticText(ps57Ctl, wxID_ANY, _("Shallow Depth")),
3674 inputFlags);
3675 m_ShallowCtl =
3676 new wxTextCtrl(ps57Ctl, ID_OPTEXTCTRL, _T(""), wxDefaultPosition,
3677 wxSize(m_fontHeight * 2, m_fontHeight), wxTE_RIGHT);
3678 DepthColumn->Add(m_ShallowCtl, inputFlags);
3679 m_depthUnitsShal = new wxStaticText(ps57Ctl, wxID_ANY, _("meters"));
3680 DepthColumn->Add(m_depthUnitsShal, inputFlags);
3681
3682 DepthColumn->Add(new wxStaticText(ps57Ctl, wxID_ANY, _("Safety Depth")),
3683 inputFlags);
3684 m_SafetyCtl =
3685 new wxTextCtrl(ps57Ctl, ID_OPTEXTCTRL, _T(""), wxDefaultPosition,
3686 wxSize(m_fontHeight * 2, m_fontHeight), wxTE_RIGHT);
3687 DepthColumn->Add(m_SafetyCtl, inputFlags);
3688 m_depthUnitsSafe = new wxStaticText(ps57Ctl, wxID_ANY, _("meters"));
3689 DepthColumn->Add(m_depthUnitsSafe, inputFlags);
3690
3691 DepthColumn->Add(new wxStaticText(ps57Ctl, wxID_ANY, _("Deep Depth")),
3692 inputFlags);
3693 m_DeepCtl =
3694 new wxTextCtrl(ps57Ctl, ID_OPTEXTCTRL, _T(""), wxDefaultPosition,
3695 wxSize(m_fontHeight * 2, m_fontHeight), wxTE_CENTER);
3696 DepthColumn->Add(m_DeepCtl, inputFlags);
3697 m_depthUnitsDeep = new wxStaticText(ps57Ctl, wxID_ANY, _("meters"));
3698 DepthColumn->Add(m_depthUnitsDeep, inputFlags);
3699
3700 // spacer
3701 optionsColumn->Add(0, border_size * 4);
3702 optionsColumn->Add(0, border_size * 4);
3703
3704 // Display Category / Mariner's Standard options
3705 wxBoxSizer* dispSizer = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
3706 vectorPanel->Add(dispSizer, 2, wxALL | wxEXPAND, border_size);
3707
3708 wxStaticBox* marinersBox =
3709 new wxStaticBox(ps57Ctl, wxID_ANY, _("User Standard Objects"));
3710 wxStaticBoxSizer* marinersSizer =
3711 new wxStaticBoxSizer(marinersBox, wxVERTICAL);
3712 dispSizer->Add(marinersSizer, 1, wxALL | wxEXPAND, border_size);
3713
3714 wxBoxSizer* btnRow1 = new wxBoxSizer(wxHORIZONTAL);
3715 itemButtonSelectList =
3716 new wxButton(ps57Ctl, ID_SELECTLIST, _("Select All"));
3717 btnRow1->Add(itemButtonSelectList, 1, wxALL | wxEXPAND, group_item_spacing);
3718 itemButtonClearList = new wxButton(ps57Ctl, ID_CLEARLIST, _("Clear All"));
3719 btnRow1->Add(itemButtonClearList, 1, wxALL | wxEXPAND, group_item_spacing);
3720 marinersSizer->Add(btnRow1);
3721
3722 wxBoxSizer* btnRow2 = new wxBoxSizer(wxHORIZONTAL);
3723 itemButtonSetStd =
3724 new wxButton(ps57Ctl, ID_SETSTDLIST, _("Reset to STANDARD"));
3725 btnRow2->Add(itemButtonSetStd, 1, wxALL | wxEXPAND, group_item_spacing);
3726 marinersSizer->Add(btnRow2);
3727
3728 ps57CtlListBox = new OCPNCheckedListCtrl(
3729 ps57Ctl, ID_CHECKLISTBOX, wxDefaultPosition, wxSize(250, 350));
3730
3731 marinersSizer->Add(ps57CtlListBox, 1, wxALL | wxEXPAND, group_item_spacing);
3732 }
3733}
3734
3735void options::CreatePanel_TidesCurrents(size_t parent, int border_size,
3736 int group_item_spacing) {
3737 wxScrolledWindow* tcPanel = AddPage(parent, _("Tides && Currents"));
3738
3739 wxBoxSizer* mainHBoxSizer = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
3740 tcPanel->SetSizer(mainHBoxSizer);
3741
3742 wxStaticBox* tcBox = new wxStaticBox(tcPanel, wxID_ANY, _("Active Datasets"));
3743 wxStaticBoxSizer* tcSizer = new wxStaticBoxSizer(tcBox, wxHORIZONTAL);
3744 mainHBoxSizer->Add(tcSizer, 1, wxALL | wxEXPAND, border_size);
3745
3746 tcDataSelected =
3747 new wxListCtrl(tcPanel, ID_TIDESELECTED, wxDefaultPosition,
3748 wxSize(100, -1), wxLC_REPORT | wxLC_NO_HEADER);
3749
3750 tcSizer->Add(tcDataSelected, 1, wxALL | wxEXPAND, border_size);
3751
3752 // Populate Selection List Control with the contents
3753 // of the Global static array
3754 tcDataSelected->DeleteAllItems();
3755
3756 // Add first column
3757 wxListItem col0;
3758 col0.SetId(0);
3759 col0.SetText(_T(""));
3760 col0.SetWidth(500);
3761 col0.SetAlign(wxLIST_FORMAT_LEFT);
3762
3763 tcDataSelected->InsertColumn(0, col0);
3764
3765 int w = 400, w1, h;
3766 unsigned int id = 0;
3767 for (auto ds : TideCurrentDataSet) {
3768 wxListItem li;
3769 li.SetId(id);
3770 tcDataSelected->InsertItem(li);
3771
3772 wxString setName = ds;
3773 tcDataSelected->SetItem(id, 0, setName);
3774 GetTextExtent(setName, &w1, &h);
3775 w = w1 > w ? w1 : w;
3776 ++id;
3777 }
3778 tcDataSelected->SetColumnWidth(0, 20 + w);
3779
3780 // Add the "Insert/Remove" buttons
3781 wxButton* insertButton =
3782 new wxButton(tcPanel, ID_TCDATAADD, _("Add Dataset..."));
3783 wxButton* removeButton =
3784 new wxButton(tcPanel, ID_TCDATADEL, _("Remove Selected"));
3785
3786 wxBoxSizer* btnSizer = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
3787 tcSizer->Add(btnSizer);
3788
3789 btnSizer->Add(insertButton, 1, wxALL | wxEXPAND, group_item_spacing);
3790 btnSizer->Add(removeButton, 1, wxALL | wxEXPAND, group_item_spacing);
3791}
3792
3793void options::CreatePanel_ChartGroups(size_t parent, int border_size,
3794 int group_item_spacing) {
3795 // Special case for adding the tab here. We know this page has multiple tabs,
3796 // and we have the actual widgets in a separate class (because of its
3797 // complexity)
3798
3799 wxNotebook* chartsPageNotebook = (wxNotebook*)m_pListbook->GetPage(parent);
3800 wxScrolledWindow* sw = new ChartGroupsUI(chartsPageNotebook);
3801 sw->SetScrollRate(m_scrollRate, m_scrollRate);
3802 chartsPageNotebook->AddPage(sw, _("Chart Groups"));
3803 groupsPanel = dynamic_cast<ChartGroupsUI*>(sw);
3804
3805 groupsPanel->CreatePanel(parent, border_size, group_item_spacing);
3806}
3807
3808void ChartGroupsUI::CreatePanel(size_t parent, int border_size,
3809 int group_item_spacing) {
3810 modified = FALSE;
3811 m_border_size = border_size;
3812 m_group_item_spacing = group_item_spacing;
3813
3814 m_UIcomplete = FALSE;
3815
3816 CompletePanel();
3817}
3818
3819void ChartGroupsUI::CompletePanel(void) {
3820 m_panel = this;
3821 m_topSizer = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
3822 m_panel->SetSizer(m_topSizer);
3823
3824 // The chart file/dir tree
3825 wxStaticText* allChartsLabel =
3826 new wxStaticText(m_panel, wxID_ANY, _("All Available Charts"));
3827 m_topSizer->Add(allChartsLabel, 0, wxTOP | wxRIGHT | wxLEFT, m_border_size);
3828
3829 wxBoxSizer* sizerCharts = new wxBoxSizer(wxHORIZONTAL);
3830 m_topSizer->Add(sizerCharts, 1, wxALL | wxEXPAND, 5);
3831
3832 wxBoxSizer* activeListSizer = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
3833 sizerCharts->Add(activeListSizer, 1, wxALL | wxEXPAND, 5);
3834
3835#ifdef __ANDROID__
3836 allAvailableCtl =
3837 new wxGenericDirCtrl(m_panel, ID_GROUPAVAILABLE, _T(""),
3838 wxDefaultPosition, wxDefaultSize, wxVSCROLL);
3839#else
3840 allAvailableCtl =
3841 new wxGenericDirCtrl(m_panel, ID_GROUPAVAILABLE, _T(""),
3842 wxDefaultPosition, wxDefaultSize, wxVSCROLL);
3843#endif
3844 activeListSizer->Add(allAvailableCtl, 1, wxEXPAND);
3845
3846 m_pAddButton = new wxButton(m_panel, ID_GROUPINSERTDIR, _("Add"));
3847 m_pAddButton->Disable();
3848 m_pRemoveButton = new wxButton(m_panel, ID_GROUPREMOVEDIR, _("Remove Chart"));
3849 m_pRemoveButton->Disable();
3850
3851 m_pAddButton->Connect(wxEVT_COMMAND_BUTTON_CLICKED,
3852 wxCommandEventHandler(ChartGroupsUI::OnInsertChartItem),
3853 NULL, this);
3854 m_pRemoveButton->Connect(
3855 wxEVT_COMMAND_BUTTON_CLICKED,
3856 wxCommandEventHandler(ChartGroupsUI::OnRemoveChartItem), NULL, this);
3857
3858 wxBoxSizer* addRemove = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
3859 sizerCharts->Add(addRemove, 0, wxALL | wxEXPAND, m_border_size);
3860 addRemove->Add(m_pAddButton, 0, wxALL | wxEXPAND, m_group_item_spacing);
3861
3862 sizerCharts->AddSpacer(20); // Avoid potential scrollbar
3863
3864 // Add the Groups notebook control
3865 wxStaticText* groupsLabel =
3866 new wxStaticText(m_panel, wxID_ANY, _("Chart Groups"));
3867 m_topSizer->Add(groupsLabel, 0, wxTOP | wxRIGHT | wxLEFT, m_border_size);
3868
3869 wxBoxSizer* sizerGroups = new wxBoxSizer(wxHORIZONTAL);
3870 m_topSizer->Add(sizerGroups, 1, wxALL | wxEXPAND, 5);
3871
3872 wxBoxSizer* nbSizer = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
3873 sizerGroups->Add(nbSizer, 1, wxALL | wxEXPAND, m_border_size);
3874 m_GroupNB = new wxNotebook(m_panel, ID_GROUPNOTEBOOK, wxDefaultPosition,
3875 wxDefaultSize, wxNB_TOP);
3876 nbSizer->Add(m_GroupNB, 1, wxEXPAND);
3877
3878 m_GroupNB->Connect(wxEVT_COMMAND_NOTEBOOK_PAGE_CHANGED,
3879 wxNotebookEventHandler(ChartGroupsUI::OnGroupPageChange),
3880 NULL, this);
3881
3882 // Add default (always present) Default Chart Group
3883 wxPanel* allActiveGroup =
3884 new wxPanel(m_GroupNB, -1, wxDefaultPosition, wxDefaultSize);
3885 m_GroupNB->AddPage(allActiveGroup, _("All Charts"));
3886
3887 wxBoxSizer* page0BoxSizer = new wxBoxSizer(wxHORIZONTAL);
3888 allActiveGroup->SetSizer(page0BoxSizer);
3889
3890 defaultAllCtl = new wxGenericDirCtrl(allActiveGroup, -1, _T(""),
3891 wxDefaultPosition, wxDefaultSize);
3892
3893 // Set the Font for the All Active Chart Group tree to be italic, dimmed
3894 iFont = new wxFont(*dialogFont);
3895 iFont->SetStyle(wxFONTSTYLE_ITALIC);
3896 iFont->SetWeight(wxFONTWEIGHT_LIGHT);
3897
3898 page0BoxSizer->Add(defaultAllCtl, 1, wxALIGN_TOP | wxALL | wxEXPAND);
3899
3900 m_DirCtrlArray.Add(defaultAllCtl);
3901
3902 // Add the Chart Group (page) "New" and "Delete" buttons
3903 m_pNewGroupButton =
3904 new wxButton(m_panel, ID_GROUPNEWGROUP, _("New Group..."));
3905 m_pDeleteGroupButton =
3906 new wxButton(m_panel, ID_GROUPDELETEGROUP, _("Delete Group"));
3907 m_pDeleteGroupButton->Disable(); // for default "all Charts" group
3908
3909 m_pNewGroupButton->Connect(wxEVT_COMMAND_BUTTON_CLICKED,
3910 wxCommandEventHandler(ChartGroupsUI::OnNewGroup),
3911 NULL, this);
3912 m_pDeleteGroupButton->Connect(
3913 wxEVT_COMMAND_BUTTON_CLICKED,
3914 wxCommandEventHandler(ChartGroupsUI::OnDeleteGroup), NULL, this);
3915
3916 wxBoxSizer* newDeleteGrp = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
3917 sizerGroups->Add(newDeleteGrp, 0, wxALL, m_border_size);
3918
3919 newDeleteGrp->AddSpacer(25);
3920 newDeleteGrp->Add(m_pNewGroupButton, 0, wxALL | wxEXPAND,
3921 m_group_item_spacing);
3922 newDeleteGrp->AddSpacer(15);
3923 newDeleteGrp->Add(m_pDeleteGroupButton, 0, wxALL | wxEXPAND,
3924 m_group_item_spacing);
3925 newDeleteGrp->AddSpacer(25);
3926 newDeleteGrp->Add(m_pRemoveButton, 0, wxALL | wxEXPAND, m_group_item_spacing);
3927
3928 sizerGroups->AddSpacer(20); // Avoid potential scrollbar
3929
3930 // Connect this last, otherwise handler is called before all objects are
3931 // initialized.
3932 m_panel->Connect(wxEVT_COMMAND_TREE_SEL_CHANGED,
3933 wxTreeEventHandler(ChartGroupsUI::OnAvailableSelection),
3934 NULL, this);
3935
3936 m_UIcomplete = TRUE;
3937}
3938
3939void options::CreatePanel_Display(size_t parent, int border_size,
3940 int group_item_spacing) {
3941 pDisplayPanel = AddPage(parent, _("General"));
3942
3943 if (!m_bcompact) {
3944 wxFlexGridSizer* generalSizer = new wxFlexGridSizer(2);
3945 generalSizer->SetHGap(border_size);
3946 // generalSizer->AddGrowableCol( 0, 1 );
3947 // generalSizer->AddGrowableCol( 1, 1 );
3948 // pDisplayPanel->SetSizer( generalSizer );
3949
3950 // wxFlexGridSizer grows wrongly in wx2.8, so we need to centre it in
3951 // another sizer instead of letting it grow.
3952 wxBoxSizer* wrapperSizer = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
3953 pDisplayPanel->SetSizer(wrapperSizer);
3954 wrapperSizer->Add(generalSizer, 1, wxALL | wxALIGN_CENTER, border_size);
3955
3956 // spacer
3957 generalSizer->Add(0, border_size * 4);
3958 generalSizer->Add(0, border_size * 4);
3959
3960 if (!g_useMUI) {
3961 // Nav Mode
3962 generalSizer->Add(
3963 new wxStaticText(pDisplayPanel, wxID_ANY, _("Navigation Mode")),
3964 groupLabelFlags);
3965 wxBoxSizer* boxNavMode = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
3966 generalSizer->Add(boxNavMode, groupInputFlags);
3967
3968 wxBoxSizer* rowOrientation = new wxBoxSizer(wxHORIZONTAL);
3969 boxNavMode->Add(rowOrientation);
3970
3971 pCBNorthUp = new wxRadioButton(pDisplayPanel, wxID_ANY, _("North Up"));
3972 rowOrientation->Add(pCBNorthUp, inputFlags);
3973 pCBCourseUp =
3974 new wxRadioButton(pDisplayPanel, ID_COURSEUPCHECKBOX, _("Course Up"));
3975 rowOrientation->Add(pCBCourseUp,
3976 wxSizerFlags(0)
3977 .Align(wxALIGN_CENTRE_VERTICAL)
3978 .Border(wxLEFT, group_item_spacing * 2));
3979
3980 pCBLookAhead = new wxCheckBox(pDisplayPanel, ID_CHECK_LOOKAHEAD,
3981 _("Look Ahead Mode"));
3982 boxNavMode->Add(pCBLookAhead, verticleInputFlags);
3983
3984 // spacer
3985 generalSizer->Add(0, border_size * 4);
3986 generalSizer->Add(0, border_size * 4);
3987
3988 // Control Options
3989 generalSizer->Add(
3990 new wxStaticText(pDisplayPanel, wxID_ANY, _("Chart Display")),
3991 groupLabelFlags);
3992 wxBoxSizer* boxCharts = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
3993 generalSizer->Add(boxCharts, groupInputFlags);
3994
3995 pCDOQuilting = new wxCheckBox(pDisplayPanel, ID_QUILTCHECKBOX1,
3996 _("Enable Chart Quilting"));
3997 boxCharts->Add(pCDOQuilting, verticleInputFlags);
3998
3999 pPreserveScale =
4000 new wxCheckBox(pDisplayPanel, ID_PRESERVECHECKBOX,
4001 _("Preserve scale when switching charts"));
4002 boxCharts->Add(pPreserveScale, verticleInputFlags);
4003
4004 // spacer
4005 generalSizer->Add(0, border_size * 4);
4006 generalSizer->Add(0, border_size * 4);
4007 }
4008
4009 // Control Options
4010 generalSizer->Add(new wxStaticText(pDisplayPanel, wxID_ANY, _("Controls")),
4011 groupLabelFlags);
4012 wxBoxSizer* boxCtrls = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
4013 generalSizer->Add(boxCtrls, groupInputFlags);
4014
4015 pSmoothPanZoom = new wxCheckBox(pDisplayPanel, ID_SMOOTHPANZOOMBOX,
4016 _("Smooth Panning / Zooming"));
4017 boxCtrls->Add(pSmoothPanZoom, verticleInputFlags);
4018
4019 pEnableZoomToCursor =
4020 new wxCheckBox(pDisplayPanel, ID_ZTCCHECKBOX, _("Zoom to Cursor"));
4021 pEnableZoomToCursor->SetValue(FALSE);
4022 boxCtrls->Add(pEnableZoomToCursor, verticleInputFlags);
4023
4024 // spacer
4025 generalSizer->Add(0, border_size * 4);
4026 generalSizer->Add(0, border_size * 4);
4027
4028 if (!g_useMUI) {
4029 // Display Options
4030 generalSizer->Add(
4031 new wxStaticText(pDisplayPanel, wxID_ANY, _("Display Features")),
4032 groupLabelFlags);
4033 wxBoxSizer* boxDisp = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
4034 generalSizer->Add(boxDisp, groupInputFlags);
4035
4036 pSDisplayGrid =
4037 new wxCheckBox(pDisplayPanel, ID_CHECK_DISPLAYGRID, _("Show Grid"));
4038 boxDisp->Add(pSDisplayGrid, verticleInputFlags);
4039
4040 pCDOOutlines = new wxCheckBox(pDisplayPanel, ID_OUTLINECHECKBOX1,
4041 _("Show Chart Outlines"));
4042 boxDisp->Add(pCDOOutlines, verticleInputFlags);
4043
4044 pSDepthUnits = new wxCheckBox(pDisplayPanel, ID_SHOWDEPTHUNITSBOX1,
4045 _("Show Depth Units"));
4046 boxDisp->Add(pSDepthUnits, verticleInputFlags);
4047 }
4048
4049 // CUSTOMIZATION - LIVE ETA OPTION
4050 // -------------------------------
4051 // Add a checkbox to activate live ETA option in status bar, and
4052 // Add a text field to set default boat speed (for calculation when
4053 // no GPS or when the boat is at the harbor).
4054
4055 // Spacer
4056 generalSizer->Add(0, border_size * 4);
4057 generalSizer->Add(0, border_size * 4);
4058
4059 // New menu status bar
4060 generalSizer->Add(
4061 new wxStaticText(pDisplayPanel, wxID_ANY, _("Status Bar Option")),
4062 groupLabelFlags);
4063 wxBoxSizer* boxDispStatusBar = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
4064 generalSizer->Add(boxDispStatusBar, groupInputFlags);
4065
4066 // Add option for live ETA
4067 pSLiveETA = new wxCheckBox(pDisplayPanel, ID_CHECK_LIVEETA,
4068 _("Live ETA at Cursor"));
4069 boxDispStatusBar->Add(pSLiveETA, verticleInputFlags);
4070
4071 // Add text input for default boat speed
4072 // (for calculation, in case GPS speed is null)
4073 wxBoxSizer* defaultBoatSpeedSizer = new wxBoxSizer(wxHORIZONTAL);
4074 boxDispStatusBar->Add(defaultBoatSpeedSizer, wxALL, group_item_spacing);
4075
4076 m_Text_def_boat_speed = new wxStaticText(
4077 pDisplayPanel, wxID_ANY,
4078 _("Default Boat Speed ") + "(" + getUsrSpeedUnit() + ") ");
4079
4080 defaultBoatSpeedSizer->Add(m_Text_def_boat_speed, groupLabelFlagsHoriz);
4081 pSDefaultBoatSpeed =
4082 new wxTextCtrl(pDisplayPanel, ID_DEFAULT_BOAT_SPEED, _T(""),
4083 wxDefaultPosition, wxSize(50, -1), wxTE_RIGHT);
4084 defaultBoatSpeedSizer->Add(pSDefaultBoatSpeed, 0, wxALIGN_CENTER_VERTICAL,
4085 group_item_spacing);
4086
4087 // --------------------------------------
4088 // END OF CUSTOMIZATION - LIVE ETA OPTION
4089
4090#ifndef __ANDROID__
4091 // MultiChart selection panel
4092 if (g_Platform->GetDisplayAreaCM2() > 100) {
4093 wxStaticBox* itemStaticBoxScreenConfig =
4094 new wxStaticBox(pDisplayPanel, wxID_ANY, _("Canvas Layout"));
4095 wxStaticBoxSizer* itemStaticBoxSizerScreenConfig =
4096 new wxStaticBoxSizer(itemStaticBoxScreenConfig, wxHORIZONTAL);
4097 wrapperSizer->Add(itemStaticBoxSizerScreenConfig, 1, wxALL | wxEXPAND, 5);
4098
4099 // The standard screen configs...
4100 wxString iconDir = g_Platform->GetSharedDataDir();
4101 appendOSDirSlash(&iconDir);
4102 iconDir.append(_T("uidata"));
4103 appendOSDirSlash(&iconDir);
4104 iconDir.append(_T("MUI_flat"));
4105 appendOSDirSlash(&iconDir);
4106 int bmpSize = GetCharHeight() * 3;
4107
4108 wxBitmap bmp =
4109 LoadSVG(iconDir + _T("MUI_Sconfig_1.svg"), bmpSize, bmpSize);
4110 m_sconfigSelect_single =
4111 new CanvasConfigSelect(pDisplayPanel, this, ID_SCREENCONFIG1, bmp);
4112 itemStaticBoxSizerScreenConfig->Add(m_sconfigSelect_single, 0,
4113 wxALIGN_LEFT);
4114
4115 itemStaticBoxSizerScreenConfig->AddSpacer(GetCharHeight());
4116
4117 bmp = LoadSVG(iconDir + _T("MUI_Sconfig_2.svg"), bmpSize, bmpSize);
4118 m_sconfigSelect_twovertical =
4119 new CanvasConfigSelect(pDisplayPanel, this, ID_SCREENCONFIG2, bmp);
4120 itemStaticBoxSizerScreenConfig->Add(m_sconfigSelect_twovertical, 0,
4121 wxALIGN_LEFT);
4122
4123 itemStaticBoxSizerScreenConfig->AddSpacer(GetCharHeight());
4124 }
4125#endif
4126
4127 } else { // compact follows
4128 wxFlexGridSizer* generalSizer = new wxFlexGridSizer(2);
4129 generalSizer->SetHGap(border_size);
4130 // generalSizer->AddGrowableCol( 0, 1 );
4131 // generalSizer->AddGrowableCol( 1, 1 );
4132 // pDisplayPanel->SetSizer( generalSizer );
4133
4134 // wxFlexGridSizer grows wrongly in wx2.8, so we need to centre it in
4135 // another sizer instead of letting it grow.
4136 wxBoxSizer* wrapperSizer = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
4137 pDisplayPanel->SetSizer(wrapperSizer);
4138 wrapperSizer->Add(generalSizer, 1, wxALL | wxALIGN_CENTER, border_size);
4139
4140 // spacer
4141 generalSizer->Add(0, border_size * 4);
4142 generalSizer->Add(0, border_size * 4);
4143
4144 if (!g_useMUI) {
4145 // Nav Mode
4146 generalSizer->Add(
4147 new wxStaticText(pDisplayPanel, wxID_ANY, _("Navigation Mode")),
4148 groupLabelFlags);
4149 wxBoxSizer* boxNavMode = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
4150 generalSizer->Add(boxNavMode, groupInputFlags);
4151
4152 wxBoxSizer* rowOrientation = new wxBoxSizer(wxHORIZONTAL);
4153 boxNavMode->Add(rowOrientation);
4154
4155 pCBNorthUp = new wxRadioButton(pDisplayPanel, wxID_ANY, _("North Up"));
4156 rowOrientation->Add(pCBNorthUp, inputFlags);
4157 pCBCourseUp =
4158 new wxRadioButton(pDisplayPanel, ID_COURSEUPCHECKBOX, _("Course Up"));
4159 rowOrientation->Add(pCBCourseUp,
4160 wxSizerFlags(0)
4161 .Align(wxALIGN_CENTRE_VERTICAL)
4162 .Border(wxLEFT, group_item_spacing * 2));
4163
4164 pCBLookAhead = new wxCheckBox(pDisplayPanel, ID_CHECK_LOOKAHEAD,
4165 _("Look Ahead Mode"));
4166 boxNavMode->Add(pCBLookAhead, verticleInputFlags);
4167
4168 // spacer
4169 generalSizer->Add(0, border_size * 4);
4170 generalSizer->Add(0, border_size * 4);
4171
4172 // Control Options
4173 generalSizer->Add(
4174 new wxStaticText(pDisplayPanel, wxID_ANY, _("Chart Display")),
4175 groupLabelFlags);
4176 wxBoxSizer* boxCharts = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
4177 generalSizer->Add(boxCharts, groupInputFlags);
4178
4179 pCDOQuilting = new wxCheckBox(pDisplayPanel, ID_QUILTCHECKBOX1,
4180 _("Enable Chart Quilting"));
4181 boxCharts->Add(pCDOQuilting, verticleInputFlags);
4182
4183 pPreserveScale =
4184 new wxCheckBox(pDisplayPanel, ID_PRESERVECHECKBOX,
4185 _("Preserve scale when switching charts"));
4186 boxCharts->Add(pPreserveScale, verticleInputFlags);
4187
4188 // spacer
4189 generalSizer->Add(0, border_size * 4);
4190 generalSizer->Add(0, border_size * 4);
4191 }
4192
4193 // Control Options
4194 generalSizer->Add(new wxStaticText(pDisplayPanel, wxID_ANY, _("Controls")),
4195 groupLabelFlags);
4196 wxBoxSizer* boxCtrls = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
4197 generalSizer->Add(boxCtrls, groupInputFlags);
4198
4199 pSmoothPanZoom = new wxCheckBox(pDisplayPanel, ID_SMOOTHPANZOOMBOX,
4200 _("Smooth Panning / Zooming"));
4201 boxCtrls->Add(pSmoothPanZoom, verticleInputFlags);
4202 pEnableZoomToCursor =
4203 new wxCheckBox(pDisplayPanel, ID_ZTCCHECKBOX, _("Zoom to Cursor"));
4204 pEnableZoomToCursor->SetValue(FALSE);
4205 boxCtrls->Add(pEnableZoomToCursor, verticleInputFlags);
4206
4207#ifdef __ANDROID__
4208 pSmoothPanZoom->Hide();
4209 pEnableZoomToCursor->Hide();
4210#endif
4211
4212 // spacer
4213 generalSizer->Add(0, border_size * 4);
4214 generalSizer->Add(0, border_size * 4);
4215
4216 if (!g_useMUI) {
4217 // Display Options
4218 generalSizer->Add(
4219 new wxStaticText(pDisplayPanel, wxID_ANY, _("Display Features")),
4220 groupLabelFlags);
4221 wxBoxSizer* boxDisp = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
4222 generalSizer->Add(boxDisp, groupInputFlags);
4223
4224 pSDisplayGrid =
4225 new wxCheckBox(pDisplayPanel, ID_CHECK_DISPLAYGRID, _("Show Grid"));
4226 boxDisp->Add(pSDisplayGrid, verticleInputFlags);
4227
4228 pCDOOutlines = new wxCheckBox(pDisplayPanel, ID_OUTLINECHECKBOX1,
4229 _("Show Chart Outlines"));
4230 boxDisp->Add(pCDOOutlines, verticleInputFlags);
4231
4232 pSDepthUnits = new wxCheckBox(pDisplayPanel, ID_SHOWDEPTHUNITSBOX1,
4233 _("Show Depth Units"));
4234 boxDisp->Add(pSDepthUnits, verticleInputFlags);
4235 }
4236
4237 // CUSTOMIZATION - LIVE ETA OPTION
4238 // -------------------------------
4239 // Add a checkbox to activate live ETA option in status bar, and
4240 // Add a text field to set default boat speed (for calculation when
4241 // no GPS or when the boat is at the harbor).
4242
4243 // Spacer
4244 generalSizer->Add(0, border_size * 4);
4245 generalSizer->Add(0, border_size * 4);
4246
4247 // New menu status bar
4248 generalSizer->Add(
4249 new wxStaticText(pDisplayPanel, wxID_ANY, _("Status Bar")),
4250 groupLabelFlags);
4251 wxBoxSizer* boxDispStatusBar = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
4252 generalSizer->Add(boxDispStatusBar, groupInputFlags);
4253
4254 // Add option for live ETA
4255 pSLiveETA = new wxCheckBox(pDisplayPanel, ID_CHECK_LIVEETA,
4256 _("Live ETA at Cursor"));
4257 boxDispStatusBar->Add(pSLiveETA, verticleInputFlags);
4258
4259 // Add text input for default boat speed
4260 // (for calculation, in case GPS speed is null)
4261 wxBoxSizer* defaultBoatSpeedSizer = new wxBoxSizer(wxHORIZONTAL);
4262 boxDispStatusBar->Add(defaultBoatSpeedSizer, wxALL, group_item_spacing);
4263 m_Text_def_boat_speed = new wxStaticText(
4264 pDisplayPanel, wxID_ANY,
4265 _("Default Boat Speed ") + "(" + getUsrSpeedUnit() + ") ");
4266 defaultBoatSpeedSizer->Add(m_Text_def_boat_speed, groupLabelFlagsHoriz);
4267 pSDefaultBoatSpeed =
4268 new wxTextCtrl(pDisplayPanel, ID_DEFAULT_BOAT_SPEED, _T(""),
4269 wxDefaultPosition, wxSize(50, -1), wxTE_RIGHT);
4270 defaultBoatSpeedSizer->Add(pSDefaultBoatSpeed, 0, wxALIGN_CENTER_VERTICAL,
4271 group_item_spacing);
4272
4273 // --------------------------------------
4274 // END OF CUSTOMIZATION - LIVE ETA OPTION
4275
4276#ifndef __ANDROID__
4277 if (g_Platform->GetDisplayAreaCM2() > 100) {
4278 // MultiChart selection panel
4279 wxStaticBox* itemStaticBoxScreenConfig =
4280 new wxStaticBox(pDisplayPanel, wxID_ANY, _("Canvas Layout"));
4281 wxStaticBoxSizer* itemStaticBoxSizerScreenConfig =
4282 new wxStaticBoxSizer(itemStaticBoxScreenConfig, wxHORIZONTAL);
4283 wrapperSizer->Add(itemStaticBoxSizerScreenConfig, 1, wxALL | wxEXPAND, 5);
4284
4285 // The standard screen configs...
4286 wxString iconDir = g_Platform->GetSharedDataDir();
4287 appendOSDirSlash(&iconDir);
4288 iconDir.append(_T("uidata"));
4289 appendOSDirSlash(&iconDir);
4290 iconDir.append(_T("MUI_flat"));
4291 appendOSDirSlash(&iconDir);
4292 int bmpSize = GetCharHeight() * 3;
4293
4294 wxBitmap bmp =
4295 LoadSVG(iconDir + _T("MUI_Sconfig_1.svg"), bmpSize, bmpSize);
4296 m_sconfigSelect_single =
4297 new CanvasConfigSelect(pDisplayPanel, this, ID_SCREENCONFIG1, bmp);
4298 itemStaticBoxSizerScreenConfig->Add(m_sconfigSelect_single, 0,
4299 wxALIGN_LEFT);
4300
4301 itemStaticBoxSizerScreenConfig->AddSpacer(GetCharHeight());
4302
4303 bmp = LoadSVG(iconDir + _T("MUI_Sconfig_2.svg"), bmpSize, bmpSize);
4304 m_sconfigSelect_twovertical =
4305 new CanvasConfigSelect(pDisplayPanel, this, ID_SCREENCONFIG2, bmp);
4306 itemStaticBoxSizerScreenConfig->Add(m_sconfigSelect_twovertical, 0,
4307 wxALIGN_LEFT);
4308
4309 itemStaticBoxSizerScreenConfig->AddSpacer(GetCharHeight());
4310 }
4311#endif
4312 }
4313}
4314
4315void options::CreatePanel_Units(size_t parent, int border_size,
4316 int group_item_spacing) {
4317 wxScrolledWindow* panelUnits = AddPage(parent, _("Units"));
4318
4319 if (m_bcompact) {
4320 wxFlexGridSizer* unitsSizer = new wxFlexGridSizer(2);
4321 unitsSizer->SetHGap(border_size);
4322
4323 // wxFlexGridSizer grows wrongly in wx2.8, so we need to centre it in
4324 // another sizer instead of letting it grow.
4325 wxBoxSizer* wrapperSizer = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
4326 panelUnits->SetSizer(wrapperSizer);
4327
4328 wrapperSizer->Add(1, border_size * 24);
4329 wrapperSizer->Add(unitsSizer, 1, wxALL | wxALIGN_CENTER, border_size);
4330
4331 // spacer
4332 unitsSizer->Add(0, border_size * 4);
4333 unitsSizer->Add(0, border_size * 4);
4334
4335 // distance units
4336 unitsSizer->Add(new wxStaticText(panelUnits, wxID_ANY, _("Distance")),
4337 labelFlags);
4338 wxString pDistanceFormats[] = {_("Nautical miles"), _("Statute miles"),
4339 _("Kilometers"), _("Meters")};
4340 int m_DistanceFormatsNChoices = sizeof(pDistanceFormats) / sizeof(wxString);
4341 pDistanceFormat =
4342 new wxChoice(panelUnits, ID_DISTANCEUNITSCHOICE, wxDefaultPosition,
4343 wxSize(m_fontHeight * 4, -1), m_DistanceFormatsNChoices,
4344 pDistanceFormats);
4345#ifdef __ANDROID__
4346 setChoiceStyleSheet(pDistanceFormat, m_fontHeight * 8 / 10);
4347#endif
4348 unitsSizer->Add(pDistanceFormat, inputFlags);
4349
4350 // speed units
4351 unitsSizer->Add(new wxStaticText(panelUnits, wxID_ANY, _("Speed")),
4352 labelFlags);
4353 wxString pSpeedFormats[] = {_("Knots"), _("Mph"), _("km/h"), _("m/s")};
4354 int m_SpeedFormatsNChoices = sizeof(pSpeedFormats) / sizeof(wxString);
4355 pSpeedFormat = new wxChoice(panelUnits, ID_SPEEDUNITSCHOICE,
4356 wxDefaultPosition, wxSize(m_fontHeight * 4, -1),
4357 m_SpeedFormatsNChoices, pSpeedFormats);
4358#ifdef __ANDROID__
4359 setChoiceStyleSheet(pSpeedFormat, m_fontHeight * 8 / 10);
4360#endif
4361 unitsSizer->Add(pSpeedFormat, inputFlags);
4362
4363 // wind units
4364 unitsSizer->Add(new wxStaticText(panelUnits, wxID_ANY, _("Wind speed")),
4365 labelFlags);
4366 wxString pWindSpeedFormats[] = {_("Knots"), _("m/s"), _("Mph"), _("km/h")};
4367 int m_WindSpeedFormatsNChoices =
4368 sizeof(pWindSpeedFormats) / sizeof(wxString);
4369 pWindSpeedFormat =
4370 new wxChoice(panelUnits, ID_WINDSPEEDUNITCHOICE, wxDefaultPosition,
4371 wxSize(m_fontHeight * 4, -1), m_WindSpeedFormatsNChoices,
4372 pWindSpeedFormats);
4373#ifdef __ANDROID__
4374 setChoiceStyleSheet(pWindSpeedFormat, m_fontHeight * 8 / 10);
4375#endif
4376 unitsSizer->Add(pWindSpeedFormat, inputFlags);
4377
4378 // depth units
4379 unitsSizer->Add(new wxStaticText(panelUnits, wxID_ANY, _("Depth")),
4380 labelFlags);
4381 wxString pDepthUnitStrings[] = {
4382 _("Feet"),
4383 _("Meters"),
4384 _("Fathoms"),
4385 };
4386 pDepthUnitSelect =
4387 new wxChoice(panelUnits, ID_DEPTHUNITSCHOICE, wxDefaultPosition,
4388 wxSize(m_fontHeight * 4, -1), 3, pDepthUnitStrings);
4389#ifdef __ANDROID__
4390 setChoiceStyleSheet(pDepthUnitSelect, m_fontHeight * 8 / 10);
4391#endif
4392 unitsSizer->Add(pDepthUnitSelect, inputFlags);
4393
4394 // temperature units
4395 unitsSizer->Add(new wxStaticText(panelUnits, wxID_ANY, _("Temperature")),
4396 labelFlags);
4397 wxString pTempUnitStrings[] = {
4398 _("Celsius"),
4399 _("Fahrenheit"),
4400 _("Kelvin"),
4401 };
4402 pTempFormat =
4403 new wxChoice(panelUnits, ID_TEMPUNITSCHOICE, wxDefaultPosition,
4404 wxSize(m_fontHeight * 4, -1), 3, pTempUnitStrings);
4405#ifdef __ANDROID__
4406 setChoiceStyleSheet(pTempFormat, m_fontHeight * 8 / 10);
4407#endif
4408 unitsSizer->Add(pTempFormat, inputFlags);
4409
4410 // spacer
4411 unitsSizer->Add(new wxStaticText(panelUnits, wxID_ANY, _T("")));
4412 unitsSizer->Add(new wxStaticText(panelUnits, wxID_ANY, _T("")));
4413
4414 // lat/long units
4415 unitsSizer->Add(new wxStaticText(panelUnits, wxID_ANY, _("Lat/Long")),
4416 labelFlags);
4417 wxString pSDMMFormats[] = {_("Degrees, Decimal Minutes"),
4418 _("Decimal Degrees"),
4419 _("Degrees, Minutes, Seconds")};
4420 int m_SDMMFormatsNChoices = sizeof(pSDMMFormats) / sizeof(wxString);
4421 pSDMMFormat = new wxChoice(panelUnits, ID_SDMMFORMATCHOICE,
4422 wxDefaultPosition, wxSize(m_fontHeight * 4, -1),
4423 m_SDMMFormatsNChoices, pSDMMFormats);
4424#ifdef __ANDROID__
4425 setChoiceStyleSheet(pSDMMFormat, m_fontHeight * 8 / 10);
4426#endif
4427 unitsSizer->Add(pSDMMFormat, inputFlags);
4428
4429 // spacer
4430 unitsSizer->Add(0, border_size * 4);
4431 unitsSizer->Add(0, border_size * 4);
4432
4433 // bearings (magnetic/true, variation)
4434 unitsSizer->Add(new wxStaticText(panelUnits, wxID_ANY, _("Bearings")),
4435 groupLabelFlags);
4436
4437 // "Mag Heading" checkbox
4438 pCBTrueShow =
4439 new wxCheckBox(panelUnits, ID_TRUESHOWCHECKBOX, _("Show true"));
4440 unitsSizer->Add(pCBTrueShow, 0, wxALL, group_item_spacing);
4441 unitsSizer->Add(new wxStaticText(panelUnits, wxID_ANY, _T("")));
4442
4443 pCBMagShow =
4444 new wxCheckBox(panelUnits, ID_MAGSHOWCHECKBOX, _("Show magnetic"));
4445 unitsSizer->Add(pCBMagShow, 0, wxALL, group_item_spacing);
4446 unitsSizer->Add(new wxStaticText(panelUnits, wxID_ANY, _T("")));
4447
4448 // Mag Heading user variation
4449
4450 wxStaticBox* itemStaticBoxVar =
4451 new wxStaticBox(panelUnits, wxID_ANY, _T(""));
4452
4453 wxStaticBoxSizer* itemStaticBoxSizerVar =
4454 new wxStaticBoxSizer(itemStaticBoxVar, wxVERTICAL);
4455 wrapperSizer->Add(itemStaticBoxSizerVar, 0, wxALL | wxEXPAND, 5);
4456
4457 itemStaticBoxSizerVar->Add(0, border_size * 4);
4458
4459 itemStaticTextUserVar =
4460 new wxStaticText(panelUnits, wxID_ANY, _("Assumed magnetic variation"));
4461 itemStaticBoxSizerVar->Add(itemStaticTextUserVar, 1, wxEXPAND | wxALL,
4462 group_item_spacing);
4463
4464 wxBoxSizer* magVarSizer = new wxBoxSizer(wxHORIZONTAL);
4465 itemStaticBoxSizerVar->Add(magVarSizer, 1, wxEXPAND | wxALL,
4466 group_item_spacing);
4467
4468 pMagVar = new wxTextCtrl(panelUnits, ID_OPTEXTCTRL, _T(""),
4469 wxDefaultPosition, wxSize(150, -1), wxTE_RIGHT);
4470 magVarSizer->AddSpacer(100);
4471
4472 magVarSizer->Add(pMagVar, 0, wxALIGN_CENTRE_VERTICAL, group_item_spacing);
4473
4474 itemStaticTextUserVar2 =
4475 new wxStaticText(panelUnits, wxID_ANY, _("deg (-W, +E)"));
4476
4477 magVarSizer->Add(itemStaticTextUserVar2, 0, wxALL | wxALIGN_CENTRE_VERTICAL,
4478 group_item_spacing);
4479
4480 itemStaticBoxSizerVar->Add(0, border_size * 40);
4481
4482 } else {
4483 wxFlexGridSizer* unitsSizer = new wxFlexGridSizer(2);
4484 unitsSizer->SetHGap(border_size);
4485
4486 // wxFlexGridSizer grows wrongly in wx2.8, so we need to centre it in
4487 // another sizer instead of letting it grow.
4488 wxBoxSizer* wrapperSizer = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
4489 panelUnits->SetSizer(wrapperSizer);
4490 wrapperSizer->Add(unitsSizer, 1, wxALL | wxALIGN_CENTER, border_size);
4491
4492 // spacer
4493 unitsSizer->Add(0, border_size * 4);
4494 unitsSizer->Add(0, border_size * 4);
4495
4496 // distance units
4497 unitsSizer->Add(new wxStaticText(panelUnits, wxID_ANY, _("Distance")),
4498 labelFlags);
4499 wxString pDistanceFormats[] = {_("Nautical miles"), _("Statute miles"),
4500 _("Kilometers"), _("Meters")};
4501 int m_DistanceFormatsNChoices = sizeof(pDistanceFormats) / sizeof(wxString);
4502 pDistanceFormat = new wxChoice(panelUnits, ID_DISTANCEUNITSCHOICE,
4503 wxDefaultPosition, wxDefaultSize,
4504 m_DistanceFormatsNChoices, pDistanceFormats);
4505 unitsSizer->Add(pDistanceFormat, inputFlags);
4506
4507 // speed units
4508 unitsSizer->Add(new wxStaticText(panelUnits, wxID_ANY, _("Speed")),
4509 labelFlags);
4510 wxString pSpeedFormats[] = {_("Knots"), _("Mph"), _("km/h"), _("m/s")};
4511 int m_SpeedFormatsNChoices = sizeof(pSpeedFormats) / sizeof(wxString);
4512 pSpeedFormat =
4513 new wxChoice(panelUnits, ID_SPEEDUNITSCHOICE, wxDefaultPosition,
4514 wxDefaultSize, m_SpeedFormatsNChoices, pSpeedFormats);
4515 unitsSizer->Add(pSpeedFormat, inputFlags);
4516
4517 // windspeed units
4518 unitsSizer->Add(new wxStaticText(panelUnits, wxID_ANY, _("WindSpeed")),
4519 labelFlags);
4520 wxString pWindSpeedFormats[] = {_("Knots"), _("m/s"), _("Mph"), _("km/h")};
4521 int m_WindSpeedFormatsNChoices =
4522 sizeof(pWindSpeedFormats) / sizeof(wxString);
4523 pWindSpeedFormat = new wxChoice(
4524 panelUnits, ID_WINDSPEEDUNITCHOICE, wxDefaultPosition, wxDefaultSize,
4525 m_WindSpeedFormatsNChoices, pWindSpeedFormats);
4526 unitsSizer->Add(pWindSpeedFormat, inputFlags);
4527
4528 // depth units
4529 unitsSizer->Add(new wxStaticText(panelUnits, wxID_ANY, _("Depth")),
4530 labelFlags);
4531 wxString pDepthUnitStrings[] = {
4532 _("Feet"),
4533 _("Meters"),
4534 _("Fathoms"),
4535 };
4536 pDepthUnitSelect =
4537 new wxChoice(panelUnits, ID_DEPTHUNITSCHOICE, wxDefaultPosition,
4538 wxDefaultSize, 3, pDepthUnitStrings);
4539 unitsSizer->Add(pDepthUnitSelect, inputFlags);
4540
4541 // temperature units
4542 unitsSizer->Add(new wxStaticText(panelUnits, wxID_ANY, _("Temperature")),
4543 labelFlags);
4544 wxString pTempUnitStrings[] = {
4545 _("Celsius"),
4546 _("Fahrenheit"),
4547 _("Kelvin"),
4548 };
4549 pTempFormat =
4550 new wxChoice(panelUnits, ID_TEMPUNITSCHOICE, wxDefaultPosition,
4551 wxDefaultSize, 3, pTempUnitStrings);
4552 unitsSizer->Add(pTempFormat, inputFlags);
4553
4554 // spacer
4555 unitsSizer->Add(new wxStaticText(panelUnits, wxID_ANY, _T("")));
4556 unitsSizer->Add(new wxStaticText(panelUnits, wxID_ANY, _T("")));
4557
4558 // lat/long units
4559 unitsSizer->Add(new wxStaticText(panelUnits, wxID_ANY, _("Lat/Long")),
4560 labelFlags);
4561 wxString pSDMMFormats[] = {_("Degrees, Decimal Minutes"),
4562 _("Decimal Degrees"),
4563 _("Degrees, Minutes, Seconds")};
4564 int m_SDMMFormatsNChoices = sizeof(pSDMMFormats) / sizeof(wxString);
4565 pSDMMFormat =
4566 new wxChoice(panelUnits, ID_SDMMFORMATCHOICE, wxDefaultPosition,
4567 wxDefaultSize, m_SDMMFormatsNChoices, pSDMMFormats);
4568 unitsSizer->Add(pSDMMFormat, inputFlags);
4569
4570 // spacer
4571 unitsSizer->Add(0, border_size * 4);
4572 unitsSizer->Add(0, border_size * 4);
4573
4574 // bearings (magnetic/true, variation)
4575 unitsSizer->Add(new wxStaticText(panelUnits, wxID_ANY, _("Bearings")),
4576 groupLabelFlags);
4577
4578 wxBoxSizer* bearingsSizer = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
4579 unitsSizer->Add(bearingsSizer, 0, 0, 0);
4580
4581 // "Mag Heading" checkbox
4582 pCBTrueShow = new wxCheckBox(panelUnits, ID_TRUESHOWCHECKBOX,
4583 _("Show true bearings and headings"));
4584 bearingsSizer->Add(pCBTrueShow, 0, wxALL, group_item_spacing);
4585 pCBMagShow = new wxCheckBox(panelUnits, ID_MAGSHOWCHECKBOX,
4586 _("Show magnetic bearings and headings."));
4587 bearingsSizer->Add(pCBMagShow, 0, wxALL, group_item_spacing);
4588
4589 bearingsSizer->AddSpacer(10);
4590
4591 // Mag Heading user variation
4592 wxBoxSizer* magVarSizer = new wxBoxSizer(wxHORIZONTAL);
4593 bearingsSizer->Add(magVarSizer, 0, wxALL, group_item_spacing);
4594
4595 itemStaticTextUserVar =
4596 new wxStaticText(panelUnits, wxID_ANY, wxEmptyString);
4597 itemStaticTextUserVar->SetLabel(
4598 _("WMM Plugin calculated magnetic variation"));
4599
4600 magVarSizer->Add(itemStaticTextUserVar, 0, wxALL | wxALIGN_CENTRE_VERTICAL,
4601 group_item_spacing);
4602
4603 pMagVar = new wxTextCtrl(panelUnits, ID_OPTEXTCTRL, _T(""),
4604 wxDefaultPosition, wxSize(50, -1), wxTE_RIGHT);
4605 magVarSizer->Add(pMagVar, 0, wxALIGN_CENTRE_VERTICAL, group_item_spacing);
4606
4607 itemStaticTextUserVar2 =
4608 new wxStaticText(panelUnits, wxID_ANY, _("deg (-W, +E)"));
4609 magVarSizer->Add(itemStaticTextUserVar2, 0, wxALL | wxALIGN_CENTRE_VERTICAL,
4610 group_item_spacing);
4611
4612 bearingsSizer->AddSpacer(10);
4613
4614 wxStaticText* varText =
4615 new wxStaticText(panelUnits, wxID_ANY,
4616 _(" To set the magnetic variation manually,\n you "
4617 "must disable the WMM plugin."));
4618 smallFont = *dialogFont;
4619 smallFont.SetPointSize((smallFont.GetPointSize() / 1.2) +
4620 0.5); // + 0.5 to round instead of truncate
4621 varText->SetFont(smallFont);
4622
4623 bearingsSizer->Add(varText);
4624 }
4625#ifdef __WXGTK__
4626 panelUnits->Fit();
4627#endif
4628}
4629
4630class OCPNSoundPanel : public wxPanel {
4631public:
4632 OCPNSoundPanel(wxWindow* parent, wxWindowID id, const wxPoint& pos,
4633 const wxSize& size, wxString title, wxString checkLegend,
4634 wxString selectLegend, wxString* pSoundFile);
4635
4636 ~OCPNSoundPanel() { delete m_sound; }
4637
4638 void OnButtonSelectSound(wxCommandEvent& event);
4639 void OnButtonSPTestSound(wxCommandEvent& event);
4640 wxString SelectSoundFile();
4641 void SetSoundFileLabel(wxString file);
4642 wxCheckBox* GetCheckBox() { return m_pCheck_Sound; }
4643 wxString GetSoundFile() { return m_sound_file; }
4644
4645 wxCheckBox* m_pCheck_Sound;
4646 wxSize m_small_button_size;
4647 wxString m_sound_file;
4648 wxString* m_pSoundFile;
4649 wxStaticText* m_AudioFileNameText;
4650
4651 wxButton* SelSound;
4652 wxButton* TestSound;
4653 OcpnSound* m_sound;
4654
4656 EventVar m_on_sp_sound_done;
4657
4658 ObsListener m_sound_sp_done_listener;
4659 bool m_soundPlaying;
4660
4661 DECLARE_EVENT_TABLE()
4662};
4663
4664#define ID_SELECTSOUND 9341
4665#define ID_TESTSOUND 9342
4666
4667BEGIN_EVENT_TABLE(OCPNSoundPanel, wxPanel)
4668EVT_BUTTON(ID_SELECTSOUND, OCPNSoundPanel::OnButtonSelectSound)
4669EVT_BUTTON(ID_TESTSOUND, OCPNSoundPanel::OnButtonSPTestSound)
4670
4671END_EVENT_TABLE()
4672
4673OCPNSoundPanel::OCPNSoundPanel(wxWindow* parent, wxWindowID id,
4674 const wxPoint& pos, const wxSize& size,
4675 wxString title, wxString checkLegend,
4676 wxString selectLegend, wxString* pSoundFile)
4677 : wxPanel(parent, id, pos, size, wxBORDER_NONE), m_soundPlaying(false) {
4678 wxFont* pif = FontMgr::Get().GetFont(_("Dialog"));
4679 SetFont(*pif);
4680
4681 m_pSoundFile = pSoundFile;
4682 if (pSoundFile) m_sound_file = *pSoundFile;
4683
4684 m_sound = SoundFactory();
4685
4686 int border_size = 4;
4687 int group_item_spacing = 2;
4688
4689 int font_size_y, font_descent, font_lead;
4690 GetTextExtent(_T("0"), NULL, &font_size_y, &font_descent, &font_lead);
4691 m_small_button_size = wxSize(-1, (int)(1.6 * (font_size_y + font_descent)));
4692
4693 wxBoxSizer* wrapperSizer = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
4694 SetSizer(wrapperSizer);
4695
4696 wxStaticBox* StaticBox1 = new wxStaticBox(this, wxID_ANY, title);
4697 wxStaticBoxSizer* StaticBoxSizer1 =
4698 new wxStaticBoxSizer(StaticBox1, wxVERTICAL);
4699 wrapperSizer->Add(StaticBoxSizer1, 0, wxALL | wxEXPAND, border_size);
4700
4701 m_pCheck_Sound = new wxCheckBox(this, ID_ANCHORALERTAUDIO, checkLegend);
4702 StaticBoxSizer1->Add(m_pCheck_Sound, 1, wxALL, group_item_spacing);
4703
4704 // Sound file
4705 wxString LabelWrapped;
4706
4707#ifdef __ANDROID__
4708 // Count the likely number of lines in the wrapped file name
4709 // to set the default wxStaticText size.
4710 ChartDirPanelHardBreakWrapper wrapper(this, m_sound_file,
4711 g_pOptions->GetSize().x * 8 / 10);
4712 wxArrayString LabelWrappedArray = wrapper.GetLineArray();
4713 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < LabelWrappedArray.GetCount(); i++) {
4714 LabelWrapped += "\n";
4715 }
4716 LabelWrapped += "\n";
4717#endif
4718
4719 m_AudioFileNameText = new wxStaticText(this, wxID_ANY, LabelWrapped);
4720 m_AudioFileNameText->Wrap(-1);
4721 StaticBoxSizer1->Add(m_AudioFileNameText, 0, wxALL | wxEXPAND, border_size);
4722
4723 SetSoundFileLabel(m_sound_file);
4724
4725 // Select/Test sound
4726 wxFlexGridSizer* soundSizer1 = new wxFlexGridSizer(3);
4727 soundSizer1->SetHGap(border_size * 2);
4728 StaticBoxSizer1->Add(soundSizer1, 1, wxALL | wxLEFT, border_size);
4729
4730 SelSound = new wxButton(this, ID_SELECTSOUND, selectLegend, wxDefaultPosition,
4731 m_small_button_size, 0);
4732 soundSizer1->Add(SelSound, 0, wxALL | wxALIGN_RIGHT, group_item_spacing);
4733 soundSizer1->AddSpacer(group_item_spacing * 4);
4734 TestSound = new wxButton(this, ID_TESTSOUND, _("Test"), wxDefaultPosition,
4735 m_small_button_size, 0);
4736 soundSizer1->Add(TestSound, 0, wxALL | wxALIGN_RIGHT, group_item_spacing);
4737 auto sound_action = [this](ObservedEvt ev) { m_soundPlaying = false; };
4738 m_sound_sp_done_listener.Init(m_on_sp_sound_done, sound_action);
4739}
4740
4741void OCPNSoundPanel::SetSoundFileLabel(wxString file) {
4742 wxString soundLabel = wxString(" " + _("Audio file name:") + "\n " + file);
4743
4744 ChartDirPanelHardBreakWrapper wrapper(this, soundLabel,
4745 g_pOptions->GetSize().x * 8 / 10);
4746 wxArrayString LabelWrappedArray = wrapper.GetLineArray();
4747 wxString LabelWrapped;
4748 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < LabelWrappedArray.GetCount(); i++) {
4749 if (i == 0)
4750 LabelWrapped += LabelWrappedArray[i].BeforeFirst('/');
4751 else
4752 LabelWrapped += LabelWrappedArray[i];
4753 LabelWrapped += "\n";
4754 }
4755
4756 m_AudioFileNameText->SetLabel(LabelWrapped);
4757 Layout();
4758}
4759
4760wxString OCPNSoundPanel::SelectSoundFile() {
4761 wxString sound_dir = g_Platform->GetSharedDataDir();
4762 sound_dir.Append(_T("sounds"));
4763 wxString sel_file;
4764 int response;
4765
4766#ifndef __ANDROID__
4767 wxFileDialog* popenDialog = new wxFileDialog(
4768 NULL, _("Select Sound File"), sound_dir, wxEmptyString,
4769 _T("WAV files (*.wav)|*.wav|All files (*.*)|*.*"), wxFD_OPEN);
4770 if (g_bresponsive)
4771 popenDialog = g_Platform->AdjustFileDialogFont(this, popenDialog);
4772
4773 response = popenDialog->ShowModal();
4774 sel_file = popenDialog->GetPath();
4775 delete popenDialog;
4776
4777#else
4778 response =
4779 g_Platform->DoFileSelectorDialog(this, &sel_file, _("Select Sound File"),
4780 sound_dir, wxEmptyString, wxT("*.*"));
4781#endif
4782
4783 wxString rv;
4784 if (response == wxID_OK)
4785 return g_Platform->NormalizePath(sel_file);
4786 else
4787 return _T("");
4788}
4789
4790void OCPNSoundPanel::OnButtonSelectSound(wxCommandEvent& event) {
4791 wxString sel_file = SelectSoundFile();
4792
4793 if (!sel_file.IsEmpty()) {
4794 m_sound_file = g_Platform->NormalizePath(sel_file);
4795 if (m_pSoundFile) *m_pSoundFile = m_sound_file; // Update global variable
4796
4797 SetSoundFileLabel(m_sound_file);
4798 // g_anchorwatch_sound->Stop();
4799 }
4800}
4801
4802void OCPNSoundPanel::OnButtonSPTestSound(wxCommandEvent& event) {
4803 if (!m_soundPlaying) {
4804 m_sound->SetFinishedCallback(
4805 [&](void* snd) { m_on_sp_sound_done.Notify(snd); });
4806 if (m_sound->Load(m_sound_file, g_iSoundDeviceIndex)) {
4807 m_soundPlaying = true;
4808 m_sound->Play();
4809 }
4810 }
4811}
4812
4813void options::OnUXAudioEnableButtonClickAIS(wxCommandEvent& event) {
4814 if (event.IsChecked())
4815 m_pCheck_AlertAudio->SetValue(true);
4816 else {
4817 if (!m_soundPanelSART->GetCheckBox()->GetValue() &&
4818 !m_soundPanelDSC->GetCheckBox()->GetValue())
4819 m_pCheck_AlertAudio->SetValue(false);
4820 }
4821}
4822
4823void options::OnUXAudioEnableButtonClickSART(wxCommandEvent& event) {
4824 if (event.IsChecked())
4825 m_pCheck_AlertAudio->SetValue(true);
4826 else {
4827 if (!m_soundPanelAIS->GetCheckBox()->GetValue() &&
4828 !m_soundPanelDSC->GetCheckBox()->GetValue())
4829 m_pCheck_AlertAudio->SetValue(false);
4830 }
4831}
4832
4833void options::OnUXAudioEnableButtonClickDSC(wxCommandEvent& event) {
4834 if (event.IsChecked())
4835 m_pCheck_AlertAudio->SetValue(true);
4836 else {
4837 if (!m_soundPanelAIS->GetCheckBox()->GetValue() &&
4838 !m_soundPanelSART->GetCheckBox()->GetValue())
4839 m_pCheck_AlertAudio->SetValue(false);
4840 }
4841}
4842
4843void options::CreatePanel_Sounds(size_t parent, int border_size,
4844 int group_item_spacing) {
4845 wxScrolledWindow* panelSounds = AddPage(parent, _("Sounds"));
4846
4847 wxBoxSizer* wrapperSizer = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
4848 panelSounds->SetSizer(wrapperSizer);
4849
4850 // Anchor Alarm
4851 m_soundPanelAnchor = new OCPNSoundPanel(
4852 panelSounds, wxID_ANY, wxDefaultPosition, wxDefaultSize,
4853 _("Anchor Alarm"), _("Play Sound on Anchor Alarm."),
4854 _("Select Anchor Alarm Sound"), &g_anchorwatch_sound_file);
4855 wrapperSizer->Add(m_soundPanelAnchor, 1, wxALL | wxEXPAND, border_size);
4856
4857 // AIS Alert
4858 m_soundPanelAIS = new OCPNSoundPanel(
4859 panelSounds, wxID_ANY, wxDefaultPosition, wxDefaultSize, _("AIS Alert"),
4860 _("Play Sound on AIS Alert."), _("Select AIS Alert Sound"),
4861 &g_AIS_sound_file);
4862 wrapperSizer->Add(m_soundPanelAIS, 1, wxALL | wxEXPAND, border_size);
4863
4864 m_soundPanelAIS->GetCheckBox()->Connect(
4865 wxEVT_COMMAND_CHECKBOX_CLICKED,
4866 wxCommandEventHandler(options::OnUXAudioEnableButtonClickAIS), NULL,
4867 this);
4868
4869 // SART Alert
4870 m_soundPanelSART = new OCPNSoundPanel(
4871 panelSounds, wxID_ANY, wxDefaultPosition, wxDefaultSize, _("SART Alert"),
4872 _("Play Sound on AIS SART Alert."), _("Select AIS SART Alert Sound"),
4873 &g_SART_sound_file);
4874 wrapperSizer->Add(m_soundPanelSART, 1, wxALL | wxEXPAND, border_size);
4875
4876 m_soundPanelSART->GetCheckBox()->Connect(
4877 wxEVT_COMMAND_CHECKBOX_CLICKED,
4878 wxCommandEventHandler(options::OnUXAudioEnableButtonClickSART), NULL,
4879 this);
4880
4881 // DSC Call
4882 m_soundPanelDSC = new OCPNSoundPanel(
4883 panelSounds, wxID_ANY, wxDefaultPosition, wxDefaultSize, _("DSC Alert"),
4884 _("Play Sound on DSC notification."), _("Select DSC notification Sound"),
4885 &g_DSC_sound_file);
4886 wrapperSizer->Add(m_soundPanelDSC, 1, wxALL | wxEXPAND, border_size);
4887
4888 m_soundPanelDSC->GetCheckBox()->Connect(
4889 wxEVT_COMMAND_CHECKBOX_CLICKED,
4890 wxCommandEventHandler(options::OnUXAudioEnableButtonClickDSC), NULL,
4891 this);
4892
4893 // Sound Device Configuration
4894 wxStaticBox* StatBoxSoundConfig =
4895 new wxStaticBox(panelSounds, wxID_ANY, _("Sound Device Configuration"));
4896 wxStaticBoxSizer* StatBoxSoundConfigSizer =
4897 new wxStaticBoxSizer(StatBoxSoundConfig, wxVERTICAL);
4898 wrapperSizer->Add(StatBoxSoundConfigSizer, 0, wxALL | wxEXPAND, border_size);
4899
4900 auto sound = std::unique_ptr<OcpnSound>(SoundFactory());
4901 int deviceCount = sound->DeviceCount();
4902 wxLogMessage("options: got device count: %d", deviceCount);
4903 if (deviceCount >= 1) {
4904 wxArrayString labels;
4905 for (int i = 0; i < deviceCount; i += 1) {
4906 wxString label(sound->GetDeviceInfo(i));
4907 if (label == "") {
4908 std::ostringstream stm;
4909 stm << i;
4910 label = _("Unknown device :") + stm.str();
4911 }
4912 if (!sound->IsOutputDevice(i)) {
4913 std::ostringstream stm;
4914 stm << i;
4915 label = _("Input device :") + stm.str();
4916 }
4917 labels.Add(label);
4918 }
4919
4920 // if sound device index is uninitialized, set to "default", if found.
4921 // Otherwise, set to 0
4922 int iDefault = labels.Index("default");
4923
4924 if (g_iSoundDeviceIndex == -1) {
4925 if (iDefault >= 0)
4926 g_iSoundDeviceIndex = iDefault;
4927 else
4928 g_iSoundDeviceIndex = 0;
4929 }
4930
4931 pSoundDeviceIndex = new wxChoice();
4932 if (pSoundDeviceIndex) {
4933 pSoundDeviceIndex->Create(panelSounds, wxID_ANY, wxDefaultPosition,
4934 wxDefaultSize, labels);
4935 pSoundDeviceIndex->SetSelection(g_iSoundDeviceIndex);
4936 pSoundDeviceIndex->Show();
4937 wxFlexGridSizer* pSoundDeviceIndexGrid = new wxFlexGridSizer(2);
4938 StatBoxSoundConfigSizer->Add(pSoundDeviceIndexGrid, 0, wxALL | wxEXPAND,
4939 group_item_spacing);
4940
4941 stSoundDeviceIndex =
4942 new wxStaticText(panelSounds, wxID_STATIC, _("Sound Device"));
4943 pSoundDeviceIndexGrid->Add(stSoundDeviceIndex, 0, wxALL, 5);
4944 pSoundDeviceIndexGrid->Add(pSoundDeviceIndex, 0, wxALL, border_size);
4945 }
4946 }
4947
4948#ifndef __ANDROID__
4949 if ((bool)dynamic_cast<SystemCmdSound*>(SoundFactory())) {
4950 wxBoxSizer* pSoundSizer = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
4951 StatBoxSoundConfigSizer->Add(pSoundSizer, 0, wxALL | wxEXPAND,
4952 group_item_spacing);
4953 pCmdSoundString =
4954 new wxTextCtrl(panelSounds, wxID_ANY, _T( "" ), wxDefaultPosition,
4955 wxSize(450, -1), wxTE_LEFT);
4956 pSoundSizer->Add(
4957 new wxStaticText(panelSounds, wxID_ANY, _("Audio Play command:")), 0,
4958 wxALIGN_LEFT | wxALL);
4959 pSoundSizer->Add(pCmdSoundString, 1, wxEXPAND | wxALIGN_LEFT, border_size);
4960 }
4961#endif
4962
4963 if (!deviceCount) StatBoxSoundConfig->Hide();
4964
4965#ifdef __ANDROID__
4966 stSoundDeviceIndex->Hide();
4967 pSoundDeviceIndex->Hide();
4968#endif
4969}
4970
4971void options::CreatePanel_MMSI(size_t parent, int border_size,
4972 int group_item_spacing) {
4973 wxScrolledWindow* panelMMSI = AddPage(parent, _("MMSI Properties"));
4974
4975 wxBoxSizer* MMSISizer = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
4976 panelMMSI->SetSizer(MMSISizer);
4977
4978 // MMSI list control (panel)
4979 wxStaticBox* itemStaticBoxMMSI =
4980 new wxStaticBox(panelMMSI, wxID_ANY, _("MMSI Properties"));
4981 wxStaticBoxSizer* itemStaticBoxSizerMMSI =
4982 new wxStaticBoxSizer(itemStaticBoxMMSI, wxVERTICAL);
4983 MMSISizer->Add(itemStaticBoxSizerMMSI, 0, wxALL | wxEXPAND, border_size);
4984
4985 MMSI_Props_Panel* pPropsPanel = new MMSI_Props_Panel(panelMMSI);
4986
4987 pPropsPanel->UpdateMMSIList();
4988
4989 itemStaticBoxSizerMMSI->Add(pPropsPanel, 0, wxALL | wxEXPAND, border_size);
4990
4991 panelMMSI->Layout();
4992}
4993
4994void options::CreatePanel_AIS(size_t parent, int border_size,
4995 int group_item_spacing) {
4996 wxScrolledWindow* panelAIS = AddPage(parent, _("AIS Targets"));
4997
4998 wxBoxSizer* aisSizer = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
4999 panelAIS->SetSizer(aisSizer);
5000
5001 // CPA Box
5002 wxStaticBox* itemStaticBoxCPA =
5003 new wxStaticBox(panelAIS, wxID_ANY, _("CPA Calculation"));
5004 wxStaticBoxSizer* itemStaticBoxSizerCPA =
5005 new wxStaticBoxSizer(itemStaticBoxCPA, wxVERTICAL);
5006 aisSizer->Add(itemStaticBoxSizerCPA, 0, wxALL | wxEXPAND, border_size);
5007
5008 wxFlexGridSizer* pCPAGrid = new wxFlexGridSizer(2);
5009 pCPAGrid->AddGrowableCol(1);
5010 itemStaticBoxSizerCPA->Add(pCPAGrid, 0, wxALL | wxEXPAND, border_size);
5011
5012 m_pCheck_CPA_Max = new wxCheckBox(
5013 panelAIS, -1,
5014 _("No (T)CPA Alerts if target range is greater than (NMi)"));
5015 pCPAGrid->Add(m_pCheck_CPA_Max, 0, wxALL, group_item_spacing);
5016
5017 m_pText_CPA_Max = new wxTextCtrl(panelAIS, -1, "TEXT ");
5018 pCPAGrid->Add(m_pText_CPA_Max, 0, wxALL | wxALIGN_RIGHT, group_item_spacing);
5019
5020 m_pCheck_CPA_Warn =
5021 new wxCheckBox(panelAIS, -1, _("Warn if CPA less than (NMi)"));
5022 pCPAGrid->Add(m_pCheck_CPA_Warn, 0, wxALL, group_item_spacing);
5023
5024 m_pText_CPA_Warn =
5025 new wxTextCtrl(panelAIS, -1, "TEXT ", wxDefaultPosition, wxSize(-1, -1));
5026 pCPAGrid->Add(m_pText_CPA_Warn, 0, wxALL | wxALIGN_RIGHT, group_item_spacing);
5027
5028 m_pCheck_CPA_Warn->Connect(wxEVT_COMMAND_CHECKBOX_CLICKED,
5029 wxCommandEventHandler(options::OnCPAWarnClick),
5030 NULL, this);
5031
5032 m_pCheck_CPA_WarnT =
5033 new wxCheckBox(panelAIS, -1, _("...and TCPA is less than (min)"));
5034 pCPAGrid->Add(m_pCheck_CPA_WarnT, 0, wxALL, group_item_spacing);
5035
5036 m_pText_CPA_WarnT = new wxTextCtrl(panelAIS, -1, "TEXT ");
5037 pCPAGrid->Add(m_pText_CPA_WarnT, 0, wxALL | wxALIGN_RIGHT,
5038 group_item_spacing);
5039
5040 // Lost Targets
5041 wxStaticBox* lostBox = new wxStaticBox(panelAIS, wxID_ANY, _("Lost Targets"));
5042 wxStaticBoxSizer* lostSizer = new wxStaticBoxSizer(lostBox, wxVERTICAL);
5043 aisSizer->Add(lostSizer, 0, wxALL | wxEXPAND, 3);
5044
5045 wxFlexGridSizer* pLostGrid = new wxFlexGridSizer(2);
5046 pLostGrid->AddGrowableCol(1);
5047 lostSizer->Add(pLostGrid, 0, wxALL | wxEXPAND, border_size);
5048
5049 m_pCheck_Mark_Lost =
5050 new wxCheckBox(panelAIS, -1, _("Mark targets as lost after (min)"));
5051 pLostGrid->Add(m_pCheck_Mark_Lost, 1, wxALL, group_item_spacing);
5052
5053 m_pText_Mark_Lost = new wxTextCtrl(panelAIS, -1, "TEXT ");
5054 pLostGrid->Add(m_pText_Mark_Lost, 1, wxALL | wxALIGN_RIGHT,
5055 group_item_spacing);
5056
5057 m_pCheck_Remove_Lost =
5058 new wxCheckBox(panelAIS, -1, _("Remove lost targets after (min)"));
5059 pLostGrid->Add(m_pCheck_Remove_Lost, 1, wxALL, group_item_spacing);
5060
5061 m_pText_Remove_Lost = new wxTextCtrl(panelAIS, -1, "TEXT ");
5062 pLostGrid->Add(m_pText_Remove_Lost, 1, wxALL | wxALIGN_RIGHT,
5063 group_item_spacing);
5064
5065 if (g_bInlandEcdis) lostSizer->Hide(pLostGrid, true);
5066
5067 // Display
5068 wxStaticBox* displBox = new wxStaticBox(panelAIS, wxID_ANY, _("Display"));
5069 wxStaticBoxSizer* displSizer = new wxStaticBoxSizer(displBox, wxHORIZONTAL);
5070 aisSizer->Add(displSizer, 0, wxALL | wxEXPAND, border_size);
5071
5072 wxFlexGridSizer* pDisplayGrid = new wxFlexGridSizer(2);
5073 pDisplayGrid->AddGrowableCol(1);
5074 displSizer->Add(pDisplayGrid, 1, wxALL | wxEXPAND, border_size);
5075
5076 m_pCheck_Show_COG = new wxCheckBox(
5077 panelAIS, -1, _("Show target COG predictor arrow, length (min)"));
5078 pDisplayGrid->Add(m_pCheck_Show_COG, 1, wxALL | wxEXPAND, group_item_spacing);
5079
5080 m_pText_COG_Predictor = new wxTextCtrl(panelAIS, -1, "TEXT ");
5081 pDisplayGrid->Add(m_pText_COG_Predictor, 1, wxALL | wxALIGN_RIGHT,
5082 group_item_spacing);
5083
5084 m_pCheck_Sync_OCOG_ACOG = new wxCheckBox(
5085 panelAIS, -1, _("Sync AIS arrow length with own ship's COG predictor"));
5086 pDisplayGrid->Add(m_pCheck_Sync_OCOG_ACOG, 1, wxALL, group_item_spacing);
5087 m_pCheck_Sync_OCOG_ACOG->Connect(
5088 wxEVT_COMMAND_CHECKBOX_CLICKED,
5089 wxCommandEventHandler(options::OnSyncCogPredClick), NULL, this);
5090
5091 wxStaticText* pStatic_Dummy4a = new wxStaticText(panelAIS, -1, _T(""));
5092 pDisplayGrid->Add(pStatic_Dummy4a, 1, wxALL, group_item_spacing);
5093
5094 m_pCheck_Show_Tracks =
5095 new wxCheckBox(panelAIS, -1, _("Show target tracks, length (min)"));
5096 pDisplayGrid->Add(m_pCheck_Show_Tracks, 1, wxALL, group_item_spacing);
5097
5098 m_pText_Track_Length = new wxTextCtrl(panelAIS, -1, "TEXT ");
5099 pDisplayGrid->Add(m_pText_Track_Length, 1, wxALL | wxALIGN_RIGHT,
5100 group_item_spacing);
5101
5102 m_pCheck_Hide_Moored = new wxCheckBox(
5103 panelAIS, -1, _("Suppress anchored/moored targets, speed max (kn)"));
5104 pDisplayGrid->Add(m_pCheck_Hide_Moored, 1, wxALL, group_item_spacing);
5105
5106 m_pText_Moored_Speed = new wxTextCtrl(panelAIS, -1, "TEXT ");
5107 pDisplayGrid->Add(m_pText_Moored_Speed, 1, wxALL | wxALIGN_RIGHT,
5108 group_item_spacing);
5109
5110 m_pCheck_Draw_Realtime_Prediction = new wxCheckBox(
5111 panelAIS, -1, _("Draw AIS realtime prediction, target speed min (kn)"));
5112 pDisplayGrid->Add(m_pCheck_Draw_Realtime_Prediction, 1, wxALL,
5113 group_item_spacing);
5114
5115 m_pText_RealtPred_Speed = new wxTextCtrl(panelAIS, -1, "TEXT ");
5116 pDisplayGrid->Add(m_pText_RealtPred_Speed, 1, wxALL | wxALIGN_RIGHT,
5117 group_item_spacing);
5118
5119 m_pCheck_Scale_Priority = new wxCheckBox(
5120 panelAIS, -1,
5121 _("Allow attenuation of less critical targets if more than ... targets"));
5122 pDisplayGrid->Add(m_pCheck_Scale_Priority, 1, wxALL, group_item_spacing);
5123

5126 group_item_spacing);

5130 pDisplayGrid->Add(m_pCheck_Show_Area_Notices, 1, wxALL, group_item_spacing);

5140 pDisplayGrid->Add(pStatic_Dummy6, 1, wxALL, group_item_spacing);

5143 panelAIS, -1, _("Show names with AIS targets at scale greater than 1:"));
5144 pDisplayGrid->Add(m_pCheck_Show_Target_Name, 1, wxALL, group_item_spacing);

5147 pDisplayGrid->Add(m_pText_Show_Target_Name_Scale, 1, wxALL | wxALIGN_RIGHT,
5148 group_item_spacing);
5149
5150 m_pCheck_use_Wpl = new wxCheckBox(
5151 panelAIS, -1, _("Use WPL position messages. Action when received:"));
5152 pDisplayGrid->Add(m_pCheck_use_Wpl, 1, wxALL, group_item_spacing);
5153

5155 m_pWplAction = new wxChoice(panelAIS, wxID_ANY, wxDefaultPosition,
5156 wxDefaultSize, 2, Wpl_Action);
5157 pDisplayGrid->Add(m_pWplAction, 1, wxALIGN_RIGHT | wxALL, group_item_spacing);
5158
5159 // Rollover
5160 wxStaticBox* rolloverBox = new wxStaticBox(panelAIS, wxID_ANY, _("Rollover"));
5161 wxStaticBoxSizer* rolloverSizer =
5162 new wxStaticBoxSizer(rolloverBox, wxVERTICAL);
5163 aisSizer->Add(rolloverSizer, 0, wxALL | wxEXPAND, border_size);
5164
5165 pRollover = new wxCheckBox(panelAIS, ID_ROLLOVERBOX,
5166 _("Enable route/AIS info block"));
5167 rolloverSizer->Add(pRollover, 1, wxALL, 2 * group_item_spacing);
5168
5169 pRollover->Connect(wxEVT_COMMAND_CHECKBOX_CLICKED,
5170 wxCommandEventHandler(options::OnAISRolloverClick), NULL,
5171 this);
5172
5173 pStatic_CallSign =
5174 new wxStaticText(panelAIS, -1, _("\"Ship Name\" MMSI (Call Sign)"));
5175 rolloverSizer->Add(pStatic_CallSign, 1, wxALL, 2 * group_item_spacing);
5176

5178 new wxCheckBox(panelAIS, -1, _("[Class] Type (Status)"));
5179 rolloverSizer->Add(m_pCheck_Rollover_Class, 1, wxALL, 2 * group_item_spacing);
5180

5182 rolloverSizer->Add(m_pCheck_Rollover_COG, 1, wxALL, 2 * group_item_spacing);

5185 rolloverSizer->Add(m_pCheck_Rollover_CPA, 1, wxALL, 2 * group_item_spacing);
5186

5191 aisSizer->Add(alertSizer, 0, wxALL | wxEXPAND, group_item_spacing);

5196

5200
5201 m_pCheck_AlertDialog->Connect(
5202 wxEVT_COMMAND_CHECKBOX_CLICKED,
5203 wxCommandEventHandler(options::OnAlertEnableButtonClick), NULL, this);
5204

5207 // Sound"),
5208 // wxDefaultPosition, m_small_button_size, 0);
5209 // pAlertGrid->Add(m_SelSound, 0, wxALL | wxALIGN_RIGHT,
5210 // group_item_spacing);
5211

5213 pAlertGrid->Add(pStatic_Dummy5a, 1, wxALL, group_item_spacing);

5216 panelAIS, ID_AISALERTAUDIO,
5217 _("Play Sound on CPA/TCPA Alerts and DSC/SART emergencies."));
5218 pAlertGrid->Add(m_pCheck_AlertAudio, 0, wxALL, group_item_spacing);

5220 m_pCheck_AlertAudio->Connect(
5221 wxEVT_COMMAND_CHECKBOX_CLICKED,
5222 wxCommandEventHandler(options::OnAlertAudioEnableButtonClick), NULL,
5223 this);
5224

5226 new wxButton(panelAIS, -1, _("Test AIS Alert Sound"), wxDefaultPosition,
5227 m_small_button_size, 0);
5228 pAlertGrid->Add(m_pPlay_Sound, 0, wxALL | wxALIGN_RIGHT, group_item_spacing);
5229
5230 m_pPlay_Sound->Connect(wxEVT_COMMAND_BUTTON_CLICKED,
5231 wxCommandEventHandler(options::OnButtonTestSound),
5232 NULL, this);
5233

5235 // pAlertGrid->Add(pStatic_Dummy5b, 1, wxALL, group_item_spacing);
5236
5237 m_pCheck_Alert_Moored = new wxCheckBox(
5238 panelAIS, -1, _("Suppress Alerts for anchored/moored targets"));
5239 pAlertGrid->Add(m_pCheck_Alert_Moored, 1, wxALL, group_item_spacing);

5242 pAlertGrid->Add(pStatic_Dummy2, 1, wxALL, group_item_spacing);
