5245 panelAIS, -1, _("Enable Target Alert Acknowledge timeout (min)"));
5246 pAlertGrid->Add(m_pCheck_Ack_Timout, 1, wxALL, group_item_spacing);
5247
5248 m_pText_ACK_Timeout = new wxTextCtrl(panelAIS, -1, "TEXT ");
5249 pAlertGrid->Add(m_pText_ACK_Timeout, 1, wxALL | wxALIGN_RIGHT,
5250 group_item_spacing);
5251
5252 panelAIS->Layout();
5253}
5254
5255class MouseZoomSlider : public wxSlider {
5256public:
5257 MouseZoomSlider(wxWindow* parent, wxSize size)
5258 : wxSlider(parent, wxID_ANY, 10, 1, 100, wxDefaultPosition, size,
5259 SLIDER_STYLE) {
5260 Show();
5261#ifdef __ANDROID__
5262 GetHandle()->setStyleSheet(getQtStyleSheet());
5263#endif
5264 }
5265};
5266
5267void options::CreatePanel_UI(size_t parent, int border_size,
5268 int group_item_spacing) {
5269 wxScrolledWindow* itemPanelFont = AddPage(parent, _("General Options"));
5270
5271 m_itemBoxSizerFontPanel = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
5272 itemPanelFont->SetSizer(m_itemBoxSizerFontPanel);
5273
5274 wxBoxSizer* langStyleBox = new wxBoxSizer(wxHORIZONTAL);
5275 m_itemBoxSizerFontPanel->Add(langStyleBox, 0, wxEXPAND | wxALL, border_size);
5276
5277 wxStaticBox* itemLangStaticBox =
5278 new wxStaticBox(itemPanelFont, wxID_ANY, _("Language"));
5279 wxStaticBoxSizer* itemLangStaticBoxSizer =
5280 new wxStaticBoxSizer(itemLangStaticBox, wxVERTICAL);
5281
5282 langStyleBox->Add(itemLangStaticBoxSizer, 1, wxEXPAND | wxALL, border_size);
5283
5284 m_itemLangListBox = new wxChoice(itemPanelFont, ID_CHOICE_LANG);
5285
5286 itemLangStaticBoxSizer->Add(m_itemLangListBox, 0, wxEXPAND | wxALL,
5287 border_size);
5288#ifdef __ANDROID__
5289 m_itemLangListBox->Disable();
5290#endif
5291
5292 wxStaticBox* itemFontStaticBox =
5293 new wxStaticBox(itemPanelFont, wxID_ANY, _("Fonts"));
5294
5295 wxSize fontChoiceSize = wxSize(-1, -1);
5296
5297 int fLayout = wxHORIZONTAL;
5298#ifdef __ANDROID__
5299 // Compensate for very narrow displays on Android
5300 if (m_nCharWidthMax < 40) fLayout = wxVERTICAL;
5301
5302 // Need to set wxChoice vertical size explicitely in Android
5303 fontChoiceSize = wxSize(-1, m_fontHeight * 3 / 4);
5304#endif
5305
5306 wxStaticBoxSizer* itemFontStaticBoxSizer =
5307 new wxStaticBoxSizer(itemFontStaticBox, fLayout);
5308 m_itemBoxSizerFontPanel->Add(itemFontStaticBoxSizer, 0, wxEXPAND | wxALL,
5309 border_size);
5310
5311 m_itemFontElementListBox =
5312 new wxChoice(itemPanelFont, ID_CHOICE_FONTELEMENT, wxDefaultPosition,
5313 fontChoiceSize, 0, NULL, wxCB_SORT);
5314
5315 wxArrayString uniqueStrings = FontMgr::Get().GetDialogStrings(g_locale);
5316 for (size_t i = 0; i < uniqueStrings.GetCount(); i++) {
5317 m_itemFontElementListBox->Append(uniqueStrings[i]);
5318 }
5319
5320 if (uniqueStrings.GetCount()) m_itemFontElementListBox->SetSelection(0);
5321
5322 itemFontStaticBoxSizer->Add(m_itemFontElementListBox, 0, wxALL, border_size);
5323
5324 wxButton* itemFontChooseButton =
5325 new wxButton(itemPanelFont, ID_BUTTONFONTCHOOSE, _("Choose Font..."),
5326 wxDefaultPosition, wxDefaultSize, 0);
5327 itemFontStaticBoxSizer->Add(itemFontChooseButton, 0, wxALL, border_size);
5328#if defined(__WXGTK__) || defined(__WXQT__)
5329 wxButton* itemFontColorButton =
5330 new wxButton(itemPanelFont, ID_BUTTONFONTCOLOR, _("Choose Font Color..."),
5331 wxDefaultPosition, wxDefaultSize, 0);
5332 itemFontStaticBoxSizer->Add(itemFontColorButton, 0, wxALL, border_size);
5333#endif
5334 wxButton* itemFontResetButton =
5335 new wxButton(itemPanelFont, ID_BUTTONFONT_RESET, _("Reset to Default"),
5336 wxDefaultPosition, wxDefaultSize, 0);
5337 itemFontStaticBoxSizer->Add(itemFontResetButton, 0, wxALL, border_size);
5338
5339 m_textSample = new wxStaticText(itemPanelFont, wxID_ANY, _("Sample"),
5340 wxDefaultPosition, wxDefaultSize, 0);
5341 itemFontStaticBoxSizer->Add(m_textSample, 0, wxALL, border_size);
5342 wxCommandEvent e;
5343 OnFontChoice(e);
5344
5345#if 0
5346 wxStaticBox* itemStyleStaticBox =
5347 new wxStaticBox(itemPanelFont, wxID_ANY, _("Toolbar and Window Style"));
5348 wxStaticBoxSizer* itemStyleStaticBoxSizer =
5349 new wxStaticBoxSizer(itemStyleStaticBox, wxVERTICAL);
5350 langStyleBox->Add(itemStyleStaticBoxSizer, 1, wxEXPAND | wxALL, border_size);
5351
5352 m_itemStyleListBox = new wxChoice(itemPanelFont, ID_STYLESCOMBOBOX);
5353
5354 wxArrayPtrVoid styles = g_StyleManager->GetArrayOfStyles();
5355 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < styles.Count(); i++) {
5356 ocpnStyle::Style* style = (ocpnStyle::Style*)(styles[i]);
5357 m_itemStyleListBox->Append(style->name);
5358 }
5359 m_itemStyleListBox->SetStringSelection(
5360 g_StyleManager->GetCurrentStyle()->name);
5361 itemStyleStaticBoxSizer->Add(m_itemStyleListBox, 1, wxEXPAND | wxALL,
5362 border_size);
5363#endif
5364 wxStaticBox* miscOptionsBox =
5365 new wxStaticBox(itemPanelFont, wxID_ANY, _("Interface Options"));
5366 wxStaticBoxSizer* miscOptions =
5367 new wxStaticBoxSizer(miscOptionsBox, wxVERTICAL);
5368 m_itemBoxSizerFontPanel->Add(miscOptions, 0, wxALL | wxEXPAND, border_size);
5369
5370 pShowStatusBar =
5371 new wxCheckBox(itemPanelFont, ID_DEBUGCHECKBOX1, _("Show Status Bar"));
5372 pShowStatusBar->SetValue(FALSE);
5373 miscOptions->Add(pShowStatusBar, 0, wxALL, border_size);
5374
5375#ifndef __WXOSX__
5376 pShowMenuBar = new wxCheckBox(itemPanelFont, wxID_ANY, _("Show Menu Bar"));
5377 pShowMenuBar->SetValue(FALSE);
5378 miscOptions->Add(pShowMenuBar, 0, wxALL, border_size);
5379#endif
5380
5381#ifdef __ANDROID__
5382 pShowMenuBar->Hide();
5383#endif
5384
5385 pShowChartBar = new wxCheckBox(itemPanelFont, wxID_ANY, _("Show Chart Bar"));
5386 pShowChartBar->SetValue(g_bShowChartBar);
5387 miscOptions->Add(pShowChartBar, 0, wxALL, border_size);
5388
5389 pShowCompassWin = new wxCheckBox(itemPanelFont, wxID_ANY,
5390 _("Show Compass/GPS Status Window"));
5391 pShowCompassWin->SetValue(FALSE);
5392 miscOptions->Add(pShowCompassWin, 0, wxALL, border_size);
5393
5394 wxBoxSizer* pToolbarAutoHide = new wxBoxSizer(wxHORIZONTAL);
5395 miscOptions->Add(pToolbarAutoHide, 0, wxALL | wxEXPAND, group_item_spacing);
5396
5397 pToolbarAutoHideCB =
5398 new wxCheckBox(itemPanelFont, wxID_ANY, _("Enable Toolbar auto-hide"));
5399 pToolbarAutoHide->Add(pToolbarAutoHideCB, 0, wxALL, group_item_spacing);
5400 pToolbarHideSecs =
5401 new wxTextCtrl(itemPanelFont, ID_OPTEXTCTRL, _T(""), wxDefaultPosition,
5402 wxSize(50, -1), wxTE_RIGHT);
5403 pToolbarAutoHide->Add(pToolbarHideSecs, 0, wxALL, group_item_spacing);
5404
5405 pToolbarAutoHide->Add(new wxStaticText(itemPanelFont, wxID_ANY, _("seconds")),
5406 group_item_spacing);
5407
5408 auto enable_debug_cb = new wxCheckBox(itemPanelFont, wxID_ANY,
5409 _("Enable Debug in root context menu"));
5410 enable_debug_cb->Bind(wxEVT_CHECKBOX, [enable_debug_cb](wxCommandEvent&) {
5411 g_enable_root_menu_debug = enable_debug_cb->IsChecked();
5412 });
5413 enable_debug_cb->SetValue(g_enable_root_menu_debug);
5414 miscOptions->Add(enable_debug_cb, 0, wxALL, group_item_spacing);
5415
5416 wxBoxSizer* pShipsBellsSizer = new wxBoxSizer(wxHORIZONTAL);
5417 miscOptions->Add(pShipsBellsSizer, 0, wxALL, group_item_spacing);
5418 // Sound options
5419 pPlayShipsBells =
5420 new wxCheckBox(itemPanelFont, ID_BELLSCHECKBOX, _("Play Ships Bells"));
5421 pShipsBellsSizer->Add(pPlayShipsBells, 0, wxALL | wxEXPAND, border_size);
5422
5423 // Mobile/Touchscreen checkboxes
5424 pMobile = new wxCheckBox(itemPanelFont, ID_MOBILEBOX,
5425 _("Enable Touchscreen interface"));
5426 miscOptions->Add(pMobile, 0, wxALL, border_size);
5427
5428 pResponsive = new wxCheckBox(itemPanelFont, ID_REPONSIVEBOX,
5429 _("Enable Scaled Graphics interface"));
5430 miscOptions->Add(pResponsive, 0, wxALL, border_size);
5431
5432 // These two options are always needed ON for Android
5433#ifdef __ANDROID__
5434 pMobile->Hide();
5435 pResponsive->Hide();
5436#endif
5437
5438 // "Responsive graphics" option deprecated in O58+
5439 pResponsive->Hide();
5440
5441 pZoomButtons =
5442 new wxCheckBox(itemPanelFont, ID_ZOOMBUTTONS, _("Show Zoom buttons"));
5443 miscOptions->Add(pZoomButtons, 0, wxALL, border_size);
5444#ifndef __ANDROID__
5445 pZoomButtons->Hide();
5446#endif
5447
5448 pInlandEcdis =
5449 new wxCheckBox(itemPanelFont, ID_INLANDECDISBOX, _("Use Inland ECDIS"));
5450 miscOptions->Add(pInlandEcdis, 0, wxALL, border_size);
5451
5452 wxButton* itemEcdisHelp =
5453 new wxButton(itemPanelFont, ID_BUTTONECDISHELP, _("Inland ECDIS Manual"),
5454 wxDefaultPosition, wxDefaultSize, 0);
5455 miscOptions->Add(itemEcdisHelp, 0, wxALL, border_size);
5456
5457#ifdef __ANDROID__
5458 pInlandEcdis->Hide();
5459 itemEcdisHelp->Hide();
5460#endif
5461
5462 miscOptions->AddSpacer(10);
5463
5464 wxFlexGridSizer* sliderSizer;
5465 sliderSizer = new wxFlexGridSizer(0, 2, 0, 0);
5466 sliderSizer->AddGrowableCol(1);
5467 sliderSizer->SetFlexibleDirection(wxBOTH);
5468 sliderSizer->SetNonFlexibleGrowMode(wxFLEX_GROWMODE_SPECIFIED);
5469
5470 m_pSlider_GUI_Factor =
5471 new wxSlider(itemPanelFont, wxID_ANY, 0, -5, 5, wxDefaultPosition,
5472 m_sliderSize, SLIDER_STYLE);
5473 m_pSlider_GUI_Factor->Hide();
5474 sliderSizer->Add(new wxStaticText(itemPanelFont, wxID_ANY,
5475 _("User Interface scale factor")),
5476 inputFlags);
5477 sliderSizer->Add(m_pSlider_GUI_Factor, 0, wxALL, border_size);
5478 m_pSlider_GUI_Factor->Show();
5479
5480#ifdef __ANDROID__
5481 prepareSlider(m_pSlider_GUI_Factor);
5482#endif
5483
5484 m_pSlider_Chart_Factor =
5485 new wxSlider(itemPanelFont, wxID_ANY, 0, -5, 5, wxDefaultPosition,
5486 m_sliderSize, SLIDER_STYLE);
5487 m_pSlider_Chart_Factor->Hide();
5488 sliderSizer->Add(
5489 new wxStaticText(itemPanelFont, wxID_ANY, _("Chart Object scale factor")),
5490 inputFlags);
5491 sliderSizer->Add(m_pSlider_Chart_Factor, 0, wxALL, border_size);
5492 m_pSlider_Chart_Factor->Show();
5493
5494#ifdef __ANDROID__
5495 prepareSlider(m_pSlider_Chart_Factor);
5496#endif
5497
5498 m_pSlider_Ship_Factor =
5499 new wxSlider(itemPanelFont, wxID_ANY, 0, -5, 5, wxDefaultPosition,
5500 m_sliderSize, SLIDER_STYLE);
5501 m_pSlider_Ship_Factor->Hide();
5502 sliderSizer->Add(
5503 new wxStaticText(itemPanelFont, wxID_ANY, _("Ship scale factor")),
5504 inputFlags);
5505 sliderSizer->Add(m_pSlider_Ship_Factor, 0, wxALL, border_size);
5506 m_pSlider_Ship_Factor->Show();
5507
5508#ifdef __ANDROID__
5509 m_pSlider_Ship_Factor->GetHandle()->setStyleSheet(getQtStyleSheet());
5510#endif
5511
5512 m_pSlider_Text_Factor =
5513 new wxSlider(itemPanelFont, wxID_ANY, 0, -5, 5, wxDefaultPosition,
5514 m_sliderSize, SLIDER_STYLE);
5515 m_pSlider_Text_Factor->Hide();
5516 sliderSizer->Add(
5517 new wxStaticText(itemPanelFont, wxID_ANY, _("ENC Sounding factor")),
5518 inputFlags);
5519 sliderSizer->Add(m_pSlider_Text_Factor, 0, wxALL, border_size);
5520 m_pSlider_Text_Factor->Show();
5521
5522#ifdef __ANDROID__
5523 m_pSlider_Text_Factor->GetHandle()->setStyleSheet(getQtStyleSheet());
5524#endif
5525
5526 m_pSlider_ENCText_Factor =
5527 new wxSlider(itemPanelFont, wxID_ANY, 0, -5, 5, wxDefaultPosition,
5528 m_sliderSize, SLIDER_STYLE);
5529 m_pSlider_ENCText_Factor->Hide();
5530 sliderSizer->Add(
5531 new wxStaticText(itemPanelFont, wxID_ANY, _("ENC Text Scale")),
5532 inputFlags);
5533 sliderSizer->Add(m_pSlider_ENCText_Factor, 0, wxALL, border_size);
5534 m_pSlider_ENCText_Factor->Show();
5535
5536#ifdef __ANDROID__
5537 m_pSlider_ENCText_Factor->GetHandle()->setStyleSheet(getQtStyleSheet());
5538#endif
5539
5540 sliderSizer->Add(new wxStaticText(itemPanelFont, wxID_ANY,
5541 _("Mouse wheel zoom sensitivity")),
5542 inputFlags);
5543 m_pMouse_Zoom_Slider = new MouseZoomSlider(itemPanelFont, m_sliderSize);
5544 sliderSizer->Add(m_pMouse_Zoom_Slider, 0, wxALL, border_size);
5545
5546 miscOptions->Add(sliderSizer, 0, wxEXPAND, 5);
5547 miscOptions->AddSpacer(20);
5548}
5549
5550void options::OnResetFont(wxCommandEvent& event) {
5551 wxString itemElement;
5552 int i = m_itemFontElementListBox->GetSelection();
5553 if (i >= 0) {
5554 itemElement = m_itemFontElementListBox->GetString(i);
5555
5556 if (FontMgr::Get().ResetFontToDefault(itemElement)) {
5557 // Update the sample text with new default font
5558 wxFont* pFont = FontMgr::Get().GetFont(itemElement);
5559 wxColour colour = FontMgr::Get().GetFontColor(itemElement);
5560
5561 if (pFont) {
5562 m_textSample->SetFont(*pFont);
5563 m_textSample->SetForegroundColour(colour);
5564 m_textSample->Refresh();
5565 }
5566 // Force immediate update of UI elements
5567 gFrame->UpdateAllFonts();
5568 m_bfontChanged = true;
5569 OnFontChoice(event);
5570 }
5571 }
5572}
5573
5574void options::OnAlertEnableButtonClick(wxCommandEvent& event) {
5575 m_pCheck_AlertAudio->Enable(event.IsChecked());
5576 if (!event.IsChecked()) m_pCheck_AlertAudio->SetValue(false);
5577}
5578
5579void options::OnAlertAudioEnableButtonClick(wxCommandEvent& event) {
5580 if (event.IsChecked()) {
5581 m_soundPanelAIS->GetCheckBox()->SetValue(true);
5582 m_soundPanelSART->GetCheckBox()->SetValue(true);
5583 m_soundPanelDSC->GetCheckBox()->SetValue(true);
5584 }
5585}
5586
5587void options::CreateListbookIcons() {
5588 ocpnStyle::Style* style = g_StyleManager->GetCurrentStyle();
5589
5590 if (!g_bresponsive) {
5591 int sx = 40;
5592 int sy = 40;
5593 m_topImgList = new wxImageList(sx, sy, TRUE, 0);
5594
5595#if wxCHECK_VERSION(2, 8, 12)
5596 m_topImgList->Add(style->GetIcon(_T("Display"), sx, sy));
5597 m_topImgList->Add(style->GetIcon(_T("Charts"), sx, sy));
5598 m_topImgList->Add(style->GetIcon(_T("Connections"), sx, sy));
5599 m_topImgList->Add(style->GetIcon(_T("Ship"), sx, sy));
5600 m_topImgList->Add(style->GetIcon(_T("UI"), sx, sy));
5601 m_topImgList->Add(style->GetIcon(_T("Plugins"), sx, sy));
5602#else
5603 wxBitmap bmp;
5604 wxImage img;
5605 bmp = style->GetIcon(_T("Display"));
5606 img = bmp.ConvertToImage();
5607 img.ConvertAlphaToMask(128);
5608 bmp = wxBitmap(img);
5609 m_topImgList->Add(bmp);
5610 bmp = style->GetIcon(_T("Charts"));
5611 img = bmp.ConvertToImage();
5612 img.ConvertAlphaToMask(128);
5613 bmp = wxBitmap(img);
5614 m_topImgList->Add(bmp);
5615 bmp = style->GetIcon(_T("Connections"));
5616 img = bmp.ConvertToImage();
5617 img.ConvertAlphaToMask(128);
5618 bmp = wxBitmap(img);
5619 m_topImgList->Add(bmp);
5620 bmp = style->GetIcon(_T("Ship"));
5621 img = bmp.ConvertToImage();
5622 img.ConvertAlphaToMask(128);
5623 bmp = wxBitmap(img);
5624 m_topImgList->Add(bmp);
5625 bmp = style->GetIcon(_T("UI"));
5626 img = bmp.ConvertToImage();
5627 img.ConvertAlphaToMask(128);
5628 bmp = wxBitmap(img);
5629 m_topImgList->Add(bmp);
5630 bmp = style->GetIcon(_T("Plugins"));
5631 img = bmp.ConvertToImage();
5632 img.ConvertAlphaToMask(128);
5633 bmp = wxBitmap(img);
5634 m_topImgList->Add(bmp);
5635#endif
5636 } else {
5637 wxBitmap bmps;
5638 bmps = style->GetIcon(_T("Display"));
5639 int base_size = bmps.GetWidth();
5640 double tool_size = base_size;
5641
5642 double premult = 1.0;
5643
5644 // unless overridden by user, we declare the "best" size
5645 // to be roughly 6 mm square.
5646 double target_size = 6.0; // mm
5647
5648 double basic_tool_size_mm = tool_size / g_Platform->GetDisplayDPmm();
5649 premult = target_size / basic_tool_size_mm;
5650
5651 // Adjust the scale factor using the global GUI scale parameter
5652 double postmult = exp(g_GUIScaleFactor * (0.693 / 5.0)); // exp(2)
5653 postmult = wxMin(postmult, 3.0);
5654 postmult = wxMax(postmult, 1.0);
5655
5656 int sizeTab = base_size * postmult * premult;
5657
5658 m_topImgList = new wxImageList(sizeTab, sizeTab, TRUE, 1);
5659
5660 wxBitmap bmp;
5661 wxImage img, simg;
5662 bmp = style->GetIcon(_T("Display"));
5663 img = bmp.ConvertToImage();
5664 simg = img.Scale(sizeTab, sizeTab);
5665 bmp = wxBitmap(simg);
5666 m_topImgList->Add(bmp);
5667 bmp = style->GetIcon(_T("Charts"));
5668 img = bmp.ConvertToImage();
5669 simg = img.Scale(sizeTab, sizeTab);
5670 bmp = wxBitmap(simg);
5671 m_topImgList->Add(bmp);
5672 bmp = style->GetIcon(_T("Connections"));
5673 img = bmp.ConvertToImage();
5674 simg = img.Scale(sizeTab, sizeTab);
5675 bmp = wxBitmap(simg);
5676 m_topImgList->Add(bmp);
5677 bmp = style->GetIcon(_T("Ship"));
5678 img = bmp.ConvertToImage();
5679 simg = img.Scale(sizeTab, sizeTab);
5680 bmp = wxBitmap(simg);
5681 m_topImgList->Add(bmp);
5682 bmp = style->GetIcon(_T("UI"));
5683 img = bmp.ConvertToImage();
5684 simg = img.Scale(sizeTab, sizeTab);
5685 bmp = wxBitmap(simg);
5686 m_topImgList->Add(bmp);
5687 bmp = style->GetIcon(_T("Plugins"));
5688 img = bmp.ConvertToImage();
5689 simg = img.Scale(sizeTab, sizeTab);
5690 bmp = wxBitmap(simg);
5691 m_topImgList->Add(bmp);
5692 }
5693}
5694
5695void options::CreateControls(void) {
5696 int border_size = 4;
5697 // use for items within one group, with Add(...wxALL)
5698 int group_item_spacing = 2;
5699
5700 int font_size_y, font_descent, font_lead;
5701 GetTextExtent(_T("0"), NULL, &font_size_y, &font_descent, &font_lead);
5702 m_fontHeight = font_size_y + font_descent + font_lead;
5703
5704#ifdef __ANDROID__
5705 m_sliderSize =
5706 wxSize(wxMin(m_fontHeight * 8, g_Platform->getDisplaySize().x / 2),
5707 m_fontHeight * 8 / 10);
5708#else
5709 m_sliderSize =
5710 wxSize(wxMin(m_fontHeight * 8, g_Platform->getDisplaySize().x / 2),
5711 m_fontHeight * 2);
5712#endif
5713
5714 m_small_button_size =
5715 wxSize(-1, (int)(1.2 * (font_size_y + font_descent /*+ font_lead*/)));
5716
5717 m_nCharWidthMax = GetSize().x / GetCharWidth();
5718
5719 // Some members (pointers to controls) need to initialized
5720 pEnableZoomToCursor = NULL;
5721 pSmoothPanZoom = NULL;
5722
5723 // Check the display size.
5724 // If "small", adjust some factors to squish out some more white space
5725 int width, height;
5726 width = g_monitor_info[g_current_monitor].width;
5727 height = g_monitor_info[g_current_monitor].height;
5728
5729 if (!g_bresponsive && height <= 800) {
5730 border_size = 2;
5731 group_item_spacing = 1;
5732 }
5733
5734 labelFlags =
5735 wxSizerFlags(0).Align(wxALIGN_RIGHT).Border(wxALL, group_item_spacing);
5736 inputFlags = wxSizerFlags(0)
5737 .Align(wxALIGN_LEFT | wxALIGN_CENTRE_VERTICAL)
5738 .Border(wxALL, group_item_spacing);
5739 verticleInputFlags =
5740 wxSizerFlags(0).Align(wxALIGN_LEFT).Border(wxALL, group_item_spacing);
5741 groupLabelFlags = wxSizerFlags(0)
5742 .Align(wxALIGN_RIGHT | wxALIGN_TOP)
5743 .Border(wxALL, group_item_spacing);
5744 groupLabelFlagsHoriz =
5745 wxSizerFlags(0).Align(wxALIGN_TOP).Border(wxALL, group_item_spacing);
5746 groupInputFlags = wxSizerFlags(0)
5747 .Align(wxALIGN_LEFT | wxALIGN_TOP)
5748 .Border(wxBOTTOM, group_item_spacing * 2)
5749 .Expand();
5750
5751#ifdef __WXGTK__
5752 groupLabelFlags.Border(wxTOP, group_item_spacing + 3);
5753#endif
5754
5755 options* itemDialog1 = this;
5756
5757 wxBoxSizer* itemBoxSizer2 = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
5758 itemDialog1->SetSizer(itemBoxSizer2);
5759
5760#ifdef __ANDROID__
5761 // Set Dialog Font by custom crafted Qt Stylesheet.
5762 wxFont* qFont = dialogFont;
5763
5764 wxString wqs = getFontQtStylesheet(qFont);
5765 wxCharBuffer sbuf = wqs.ToUTF8();
5766 QString qsb = QString(sbuf.data());
5767
5768 QString qsbq = getQtStyleSheet(); // basic scrollbars, etc
5769
5770 itemDialog1->GetHandle()->setStyleSheet(qsb +
5771 qsbq); // Concatenated style sheets
5772
5773#endif
5774
5775 int flags = 0;
5776
5777#ifdef __OCPN__OPTIONS_USE_LISTBOOK__
5778 flags = wxLB_TOP;
5779 m_pListbook = new wxListbook(itemDialog1, ID_NOTEBOOK, wxDefaultPosition,
5780 wxSize(-1, -1), flags);
5781 m_pListbook->Connect(wxEVT_COMMAND_LISTBOOK_PAGE_CHANGED,
5782 wxListbookEventHandler(options::OnPageChange), NULL,
5783 this);
5784#else
5785 flags = wxNB_TOP;
5786 m_pListbook = new wxNotebook(itemDialog1, ID_NOTEBOOK, wxDefaultPosition,
5787 wxSize(-1, -1), flags);
5788 m_pListbook->Connect(wxEVT_COMMAND_NOTEBOOK_PAGE_CHANGED,
5789 wxNotebookEventHandler(options::OnTopNBPageChange), NULL,
5790 this);
5791#endif
5792
5793#ifdef __ANDROID__
5794 // In wxQT, we can dynamically style the little scroll buttons on a small
5795 // display, to make them bigger
5796 m_pListbook->GetHandle()->setStyleSheet(getListBookStyleSheet());
5797
5798#endif
5799
5800 CreateListbookIcons();
5801
5802 m_pListbook->SetImageList(m_topImgList);
5803 itemBoxSizer2->Add(m_pListbook, 1, wxALL | wxEXPAND, border_size);
5804
5805 wxBoxSizer* buttons = new wxBoxSizer(wxHORIZONTAL);
5806 itemBoxSizer2->Add(buttons, 0, wxALIGN_RIGHT | wxALL, border_size);
5807
5808 m_OKButton = new wxButton(itemDialog1, xID_OK, _("Ok"));
5809 m_OKButton->SetDefault();
5810 buttons->Add(m_OKButton, 0, wxALIGN_CENTER_VERTICAL | wxALL, border_size);
5811
5812 m_CancelButton = new wxButton(itemDialog1, wxID_CANCEL, _("Cancel"));
5813 buttons->Add(m_CancelButton, 0, wxALIGN_CENTER_VERTICAL | wxALL, border_size);
5814
5815 m_ApplyButton = new wxButton(itemDialog1, ID_APPLY, _("Apply"));
5816 buttons->Add(m_ApplyButton, 0, wxALIGN_CENTER_VERTICAL | wxALL, border_size);
5817
5818 m_pageDisplay = CreatePanel(_("Display"));
5819 CreatePanel_Display(m_pageDisplay, border_size, group_item_spacing);
5820 CreatePanel_Units(m_pageDisplay, border_size, group_item_spacing);
5821 CreatePanel_Advanced(m_pageDisplay, border_size, group_item_spacing);
5822 CreatePanel_Configs(m_pageDisplay, border_size, group_item_spacing);
5823
5824 m_pageCharts = CreatePanel(_("Charts"));
5825 CreatePanel_ChartsLoad(m_pageCharts, border_size, group_item_spacing);
5826 CreatePanel_VectorCharts(m_pageCharts, border_size, group_item_spacing);
5827
5828 // ChartGroups must be created after ChartsLoad and must be at least third
5829 CreatePanel_ChartGroups(m_pageCharts, border_size, group_item_spacing);
5830 CreatePanel_TidesCurrents(m_pageCharts, border_size, group_item_spacing);
5831
5832 wxNotebook* nb =
5833 dynamic_cast<wxNotebook*>(m_pListbook->GetPage(m_pageCharts));
5834 if (nb) {
5835#ifdef __OCPN__OPTIONS_USE_LISTBOOK__
5836 nb->Connect(wxEVT_COMMAND_NOTEBOOK_PAGE_CHANGED,
5837 wxListbookEventHandler(options::OnChartsPageChange), NULL,
5838 this);
5839#else
5840 nb->Connect(wxEVT_COMMAND_NOTEBOOK_PAGE_CHANGED,
5841 wxNotebookEventHandler(options::OnChartsPageChange), NULL,
5842 this);
5843
5844#endif
5845 }
5846
5847 wxString ConnTab = _("Connections");
5848 if (g_Platform->GetDisplayDIPMult(gFrame) < 1) ConnTab = _("Connect");
5849
5850 m_pageConnections = CreatePanel(ConnTab);
5851#ifndef __ANDROID__
5852 CreatePanel_NMEA(m_pageConnections, border_size, group_item_spacing);
5853#else
5854 CreatePanel_NMEA(m_pageConnections, border_size, group_item_spacing);
5855// CreatePanel_NMEA_Compact(m_pageConnections, border_size, group_item_spacing);
5856#endif
5857
5858 // SetDefaultConnectionParams();
5859
5860 m_pageShips = CreatePanel(_("Ships"));
5861 CreatePanel_Ownship(m_pageShips, border_size, group_item_spacing);
5862 CreatePanel_AIS(m_pageShips, border_size, group_item_spacing);
5863#ifndef __ANDROID__
5864 CreatePanel_MMSI(m_pageShips, border_size, group_item_spacing);
5865#endif
5866
5867 CreatePanel_Routes(m_pageShips, border_size, group_item_spacing);
5868
5869 wxString UITab = _("User Interface");
5870 if (g_Platform->GetDisplayDIPMult(gFrame) < 1) UITab = _("User");
5871
5872 m_pageUI = CreatePanel(UITab);
5873 CreatePanel_UI(m_pageUI, border_size, group_item_spacing);
5874 CreatePanel_Sounds(m_pageUI, border_size, group_item_spacing);
5875
5876 m_pagePlugins = CreatePanel(_("Plugins"));
5877 itemPanelPlugins = AddPage(m_pagePlugins, _("Plugins"));
5878
5879 itemBoxSizerPanelPlugins = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
5880 itemPanelPlugins->SetSizer(itemBoxSizerPanelPlugins);
5881
5882 // PlugIns can add panels, too
5883 if (g_pi_manager) g_pi_manager->NotifySetupOptions();
5884
5885 SetColorScheme(static_cast<ColorScheme>(0));
5886
5887 // Set the maximum size of the entire settings dialog
5888 // leaving a slightly larger border for larger displays.
5889 int marginx = 10;
5890 int marginy = 40;
5891 if (width > 800) {
5892 marginx = 100;
5893 marginy = 100;
5894 }
5895
5896 SetSizeHints(-1, -1, width - marginx, height - marginy);
5897
5898#ifndef __WXGTK__
5899 // The s57 chart panel is the one which controls the minimum width required
5900 // to avoid horizontal scroll bars
5901 // vectorPanel->SetSizeHints(ps57Ctl);
5902#endif
5903}
5904
5905void options::SetInitialPage(int page_sel, int sub_page) {
5906 if (page_sel < (int)m_pListbook->GetPageCount())
5907 m_pListbook->SetSelection(page_sel);
5908 else
5909 m_pListbook->SetSelection(0);
5910
5911 if (sub_page >= 0) {
5912 for (size_t i = 0; i < m_pListbook->GetPageCount(); i++) {
5913 wxNotebookPage* pg = m_pListbook->GetPage(i);
5914 wxNotebook* nb = dynamic_cast<wxNotebook*>(pg);
5915 if (nb) {
5916 if (i == (size_t)page_sel) {
5917 if (sub_page < (int)nb->GetPageCount())
5918 nb->SetSelection(sub_page);
5919 else
5920 nb->SetSelection(0);
5921 } else
5922 nb->ChangeSelection(0);
5923 }
5924 }
5925 }
5926}
5927
5928void options::SetColorScheme(ColorScheme cs) {
5929 DimeControl(this);
5930
5931#ifdef __OCPN__OPTIONS_USE_LISTBOOK__
5932 wxListView* lv = m_pListbook->GetListView();
5933 lv->SetBackgroundColour(GetBackgroundColour());
5934
5935 if (m_cs != cs) {
5936 delete m_topImgList;
5937 CreateListbookIcons();
5938 m_pListbook->SetImageList(m_topImgList);
5939
5940 m_cs = cs;
5941 }
5942
5943#endif
5944}
5945
5946void options::OnAISRolloverClick(wxCommandEvent& event) {
5947 m_pCheck_Rollover_Class->Enable(event.IsChecked());
5948 m_pCheck_Rollover_COG->Enable(event.IsChecked());
5949 m_pCheck_Rollover_CPA->Enable(event.IsChecked());
5950 pStatic_CallSign->Enable(event.IsChecked());
5951}
5952
5953void options::OnCanvasConfigSelectClick(int ID, bool selected) {
5954 switch (ID) {
5955 case ID_SCREENCONFIG1:
5956 if (m_sconfigSelect_twovertical)
5957 m_sconfigSelect_twovertical->SetSelected(false);
5958 m_screenConfig = 0;
5959 break;
5960
5961 case ID_SCREENCONFIG2:
5962 if (m_sconfigSelect_single) m_sconfigSelect_single->SetSelected(false);
5963 m_screenConfig = 1;
5964 break;
5965 }
5966}
5967
5968void options::SetInitialSettings(void) {
5969 wxString s;
5970
5971 m_returnChanges = 0; // reset the flags
5972 m_bfontChanged = false;
5973 m_font_element_array.Clear();
5974
5975 b_oldhaveWMM = b_haveWMM;
5976 auto loader = PluginLoader::getInstance();
5977 b_haveWMM = loader && loader->IsPlugInAvailable(_T("WMM"));
5978
5979 // Canvas configuration
5980 switch (g_canvasConfig) {
5981 case 0:
5982 default:
5983 if (m_sconfigSelect_single) m_sconfigSelect_single->SetSelected(true);
5984 if (m_sconfigSelect_twovertical)
5985 m_sconfigSelect_twovertical->SetSelected(false);
5986 break;
5987 case 1:
5988 if (m_sconfigSelect_single) m_sconfigSelect_single->SetSelected(false);
5989 if (m_sconfigSelect_twovertical)
5990 m_sconfigSelect_twovertical->SetSelected(true);
5991 break;
5992 }
5993 m_screenConfig = g_canvasConfig;
5994
5995 // Initial Charts Load
5996
5997 ActiveChartArray.Clear();
5998 for (size_t i = 0; i < m_CurrentDirList.GetCount(); i++) {
5999 ActiveChartArray.Add(m_CurrentDirList[i]);
6000 }
6001
6002 // ChartGroups
6003 if (m_pWorkDirList) {
6004 UpdateWorkArrayFromDisplayPanel();
6005 groupsPanel->SetDBDirs(*m_pWorkDirList);
6006
6007 // Make a deep copy of the current global Group Array
6008 groupsPanel->EmptyChartGroupArray(m_pGroupArray);
6009 delete m_pGroupArray;
6010 m_pGroupArray = groupsPanel->CloneChartGroupArray(g_pGroupArray);
6011 groupsPanel->SetGroupArray(m_pGroupArray);
6012 groupsPanel->SetInitialSettings();
6013 }
6014
6015 if (m_pConfig) {
6016 pShowStatusBar->SetValue(g_bShowStatusBar);
6017#ifndef __WXOSX__
6018 pShowMenuBar->SetValue(g_bShowMenuBar);
6019#endif
6020 pShowCompassWin->SetValue(g_bShowCompassWin);
6021 }
6022
6023 s.Printf(_T("%d"), g_COGAvgSec);
6024 pCOGUPUpdateSecs->SetValue(s);
6025
6026 if (pCDOOutlines) pCDOOutlines->SetValue(g_bShowOutlines);
6027 if (pCDOQuilting) pCDOQuilting->SetValue(g_bQuiltEnable);
6028 // if(pFullScreenQuilt) pFullScreenQuilt->SetValue(!g_bFullScreenQuilt);
6029 if (pSDepthUnits) pSDepthUnits->SetValue(g_bShowDepthUnits);
6030 if (pSkewComp) pSkewComp->SetValue(g_bskew_comp);
6031 pMobile->SetValue(g_btouch);
6032 pResponsive->SetValue(g_bresponsive);
6033 pRollover->SetValue(g_bRollover);
6034 m_pCheck_Rollover_Class->Enable(g_bRollover);
6035 m_pCheck_Rollover_COG->Enable(g_bRollover);
6036 m_pCheck_Rollover_CPA->Enable(g_bRollover);
6037 pStatic_CallSign->Enable(g_bRollover);
6038
6039 pZoomButtons->SetValue(g_bShowMuiZoomButtons);
6040
6041 // pOverzoomEmphasis->SetValue(!g_fog_overzoom);
6042 // pOZScaleVector->SetValue(!g_oz_vector_scale);
6043 pInlandEcdis->SetValue(g_bInlandEcdis);
6044#ifdef ocpnUSE_GL
6045 pOpenGL->SetValue(g_bopengl);
6046#endif
6047 if (pSmoothPanZoom) pSmoothPanZoom->SetValue(g_bsmoothpanzoom);
6048 pCBTrueShow->SetValue(g_bShowTrue);
6049 pCBMagShow->SetValue(g_bShowMag);
6050
6051 int oldLength = itemStaticTextUserVar->GetLabel().Length();
6052
6053 // disable input for variation if WMM is available
6054 if (b_haveWMM) {
6055 itemStaticTextUserVar->SetLabel(
6056 _("WMM Plugin calculated magnetic variation"));
6057 wxString s;
6058 s.Printf(_T("%4.1f"), gVar);
6059 pMagVar->SetValue(s);
6060 } else {
6061 itemStaticTextUserVar->SetLabel(_("User set magnetic variation"));
6062 wxString s;
6063 s.Printf(_T("%4.1f"), g_UserVar);
6064 pMagVar->SetValue(s);
6065 }
6066
6067 int newLength = itemStaticTextUserVar->GetLabel().Length();
6068
6069 // size hack to adjust change in static text size
6070 if ((newLength != oldLength) || (b_oldhaveWMM != b_haveWMM)) {
6071 wxSize sz = GetSize();
6072 SetSize(sz.x + 1, sz.y);
6073 SetSize(sz);
6074 }
6075
6076 itemStaticTextUserVar2->Enable(!b_haveWMM);
6077 pMagVar->Enable(!b_haveWMM);
6078
6079 if (pSDisplayGrid) pSDisplayGrid->SetValue(g_bDisplayGrid);
6080
6081 // LIVE ETA OPTION
6082
6083 // Checkbox
6084 if (pSLiveETA) pSLiveETA->SetValue(g_bShowLiveETA);
6085
6086 // Defaut boat speed text input field
6087 // Speed always in knots, and converted to user speed unit
6088 wxString stringDefaultBoatSpeed;
6089 if (!g_defaultBoatSpeed || !g_defaultBoatSpeedUserUnit) {
6090 g_defaultBoatSpeed = 6.0;
6091 g_defaultBoatSpeedUserUnit = toUsrSpeed(g_defaultBoatSpeed, -1);
6092 }
6093 stringDefaultBoatSpeed.Printf(_T("%d"), (int)g_defaultBoatSpeedUserUnit);
6094 if (pSDefaultBoatSpeed) pSDefaultBoatSpeed->SetValue(stringDefaultBoatSpeed);
6095
6096 // END LIVE ETA OPTION
6097
6098 if (pCBCourseUp) pCBCourseUp->SetValue(g_bCourseUp);
6099 if (pCBNorthUp) pCBNorthUp->SetValue(!g_bCourseUp);
6100 if (pCBLookAhead) pCBLookAhead->SetValue(g_bLookAhead);
6101
6102 if (fabs(wxRound(g_ownship_predictor_minutes) - g_ownship_predictor_minutes) >
6103 1e-4)
6104 s.Printf(_T("%6.2f"), g_ownship_predictor_minutes);
6105 else
6106 s.Printf(_T("%4.0f"), g_ownship_predictor_minutes);
6107 m_pText_OSCOG_Predictor->SetValue(s);
6108
6109 if (fabs(wxRound(g_ownship_HDTpredictor_miles) -
6110 g_ownship_HDTpredictor_miles) > 1e-4)
6111 s.Printf(_T("%6.2f"), g_ownship_HDTpredictor_miles);
6112 else
6113 s.Printf(_T("%4.0f"), g_ownship_HDTpredictor_miles);
6114 m_pText_OSHDT_Predictor->SetValue(s);
6115
6116 m_pShipIconType->SetSelection(g_OwnShipIconType);
6117 wxCommandEvent eDummy;
6118 OnShipTypeSelect(eDummy);
6119 m_pOSLength->SetValue(
6120 wxString::Format(_T("%.1f"), g_n_ownship_length_meters));
6121 m_pOSWidth->SetValue(wxString::Format(_T("%.1f"), g_n_ownship_beam_meters));
6122 m_pOSGPSOffsetX->SetValue(
6123 wxString::Format(_T("%.1f"), g_n_gps_antenna_offset_x));
6124 m_pOSGPSOffsetY->SetValue(
6125 wxString::Format(_T("%.1f"), g_n_gps_antenna_offset_y));
6126 m_pOSMinSize->SetValue(wxString::Format(_T("%d"), g_n_ownship_min_mm));
6127 m_pText_ACRadius->SetValue(
6128 wxString::Format(_T("%.3f"), g_n_arrival_circle_radius));
6129
6130 wxString buf;
6131 if (g_iNavAidRadarRingsNumberVisible > 10)
6132 g_iNavAidRadarRingsNumberVisible = 10;
6133 pNavAidRadarRingsNumberVisible->SetSelection(
6134 g_iNavAidRadarRingsNumberVisible);
6135 buf.Printf(_T("%.3f"), g_fNavAidRadarRingsStep);
6136 pNavAidRadarRingsStep->SetValue(buf);
6137 m_itemRadarRingsUnits->SetSelection(g_pNavAidRadarRingsStepUnits);
6138 m_colourOwnshipRangeRingColour->SetColour(g_colourOwnshipRangeRingsColour);
6139
6140 pScaMinChckB->SetValue(g_bUseWptScaMin);
6141 m_pText_ScaMin->SetValue(wxString::Format(_T("%i"), g_iWpt_ScaMin));
6142 pScaMinOverruleChckB->SetValue(g_bOverruleScaMin);
6143
6144 OnRadarringSelect(eDummy);
6145
6146 if (g_iWaypointRangeRingsNumber > 10) g_iWaypointRangeRingsNumber = 10;
6147 pWaypointRangeRingsNumber->SetSelection(g_iWaypointRangeRingsNumber);
6148 buf.Printf(_T("%.3f"), g_fWaypointRangeRingsStep);
6149 pWaypointRangeRingsStep->SetValue(buf);
6150 m_itemWaypointRangeRingsUnits->SetSelection(g_iWaypointRangeRingsStepUnits);
6151 m_colourWaypointRangeRingsColour->SetColour(g_colourWaypointRangeRingsColour);
6152 OnWaypointRangeRingSelect(eDummy);
6153 pShowshipToActive->SetValue(g_bShowShipToActive);
6154 m_shipToActiveStyle->SetSelection(g_shipToActiveStyle);
6155 m_shipToActiveColor->SetSelection(g_shipToActiveColor);
6156
6157 pWayPointPreventDragging->SetValue(g_bWayPointPreventDragging);
6158 pConfirmObjectDeletion->SetValue(g_bConfirmObjectDelete);
6159
6160 pSogCogFromLLCheckBox->SetValue(g_own_ship_sog_cog_calc);
6161 pSogCogFromLLDampInterval->SetValue(g_own_ship_sog_cog_calc_damp_sec);
6162
6163 if (pEnableZoomToCursor) pEnableZoomToCursor->SetValue(g_bEnableZoomToCursor);
6164
6165 if (pPreserveScale) pPreserveScale->SetValue(g_bPreserveScaleOnX);
6166 pPlayShipsBells->SetValue(g_bPlayShipsBells);
6167
6168 if (pCmdSoundString) pCmdSoundString->SetValue(g_CmdSoundString);
6169
6170 if (pSoundDeviceIndex) pSoundDeviceIndex->SetSelection(g_iSoundDeviceIndex);
6171 // pFullScreenToolbar->SetValue( g_bFullscreenToolbar );
6172 // pTransparentToolbar->SetValue(g_bTransparentToolbar);
6173 pSDMMFormat->Select(g_iSDMMFormat);
6174 pDistanceFormat->Select(g_iDistanceFormat);
6175 pSpeedFormat->Select(g_iSpeedFormat);
6176 pWindSpeedFormat->Select(g_iWindSpeedFormat);
6177 pTempFormat->Select(g_iTempFormat);
6178
6179 pAdvanceRouteWaypointOnArrivalOnly->SetValue(
6180 g_bAdvanceRouteWaypointOnArrivalOnly);
6181
6182 pTrackDaily->SetValue(g_bTrackDaily);
6183 pTrackRotateLMT->SetValue(g_track_rotate_time_type == TIME_TYPE_LMT);
6184 pTrackRotateUTC->SetValue(g_track_rotate_time_type == TIME_TYPE_UTC);
6185 pTrackRotateComputerTime->SetValue(g_track_rotate_time_type ==
6186 TIME_TYPE_COMPUTER);
6187 pTrackHighlite->SetValue(g_bHighliteTracks);
6188 m_colourTrackLineColour->SetColour(g_colourTrackLineColour);
6189 pTrackPrecision->SetSelection(g_nTrackPrecision);
6190
6191 m_soundPanelAnchor->GetCheckBox()->SetValue(g_bAnchor_Alert_Audio);
6192
6193 // AIS Parameters
6194 // CPA Box
6195 m_pCheck_CPA_Max->SetValue(g_bCPAMax);
6196
6197 s.Printf(_T("%4.1f"), g_CPAMax_NM);
6198 m_pText_CPA_Max->SetValue(s);
6199
6200 m_pCheck_CPA_Warn->SetValue(g_bCPAWarn);
6201
6202 s.Printf(_T("%4.1f"), g_CPAWarn_NM);
6203 m_pText_CPA_Warn->SetValue(s);
6204
6205 if (m_pCheck_CPA_Warn->GetValue()) {
6206 m_pCheck_CPA_WarnT->Enable();
6207 m_pCheck_CPA_WarnT->SetValue(g_bTCPA_Max);
6208 } else
6209 m_pCheck_CPA_WarnT->Disable();
6210
6211 s.Printf(_T("%4.0f"), g_TCPA_Max);
6212 m_pText_CPA_WarnT->SetValue(s);
6213
6214 // Lost Targets
6215 m_pCheck_Mark_Lost->SetValue(g_bMarkLost);
6216
6217 s.Printf(_T("%4.0f"), g_MarkLost_Mins);
6218 m_pText_Mark_Lost->SetValue(s);
6219
6220 m_pCheck_Remove_Lost->SetValue(g_bRemoveLost);
6221
6222 s.Printf(_T("%4.0f"), g_RemoveLost_Mins);
6223 m_pText_Remove_Lost->SetValue(s);
6224
6225 // Display
6226 m_pCheck_Show_COG->SetValue(g_bShowCOG);
6227
6228 s.Printf(_T("%4.0f"), g_ShowCOG_Mins);
6229 m_pText_COG_Predictor->SetValue(s);
6230

6232 if (g_bSyncCogPredictors) m_pText_COG_Predictor->Disable();
6233

6245
6246 s.Printf(_T("%4.1f"), g_AIS_RealtPred_Kts);
6247 m_pText_RealtPred_Speed->SetValue(s);
6248
6249 m_pCheck_Scale_Priority->SetValue(g_bAllowShowScaled);
6250
6251 s.Printf(_T("%i"), g_ShowScaled_Num);
6252 m_pText_Scale_Priority->SetValue(s);
6253
6254 m_pCheck_Show_Area_Notices->SetValue(g_bShowAreaNotices);
6255
6256 m_pCheck_Draw_Target_Size->SetValue(g_bDrawAISSize);
6257 m_pCheck_Draw_Realtime_Prediction->SetValue(g_bDrawAISRealtime);
6258
6259 m_pCheck_Show_Target_Name->SetValue(g_bShowAISName);
6260
6261 s.Printf(_T("%d"), g_Show_Target_Name_Scale);
6262 m_pText_Show_Target_Name_Scale->SetValue(s);
6263
6264 m_pCheck_use_Wpl->SetValue(g_bWplUsePosition);
6265 m_pWplAction->SetSelection(g_WplAction);
6266
6267 // Alerts
6268 m_pCheck_AlertDialog->SetValue(g_bAIS_CPA_Alert);
6269 if (g_bAIS_CPA_Alert) {
6270 m_pCheck_AlertAudio->Enable();
6271 m_pCheck_AlertAudio->SetValue(g_bAIS_CPA_Alert_Audio);
6272 } else {
6273 m_pCheck_AlertAudio->Disable();
6274 m_pCheck_AlertAudio->SetValue(false);
6275 }
6276
6277 m_pCheck_Alert_Moored->SetValue(g_bAIS_CPA_Alert_Suppress_Moored);
6278
6279 m_pCheck_Ack_Timout->SetValue(g_bAIS_ACK_Timeout);
6280 s.Printf(_T("%4.0f"), g_AckTimeout_Mins);
6281 m_pText_ACK_Timeout->SetValue(s);
6282
6283 // Sounds
6284 m_soundPanelAIS->GetCheckBox()->SetValue(g_bAIS_GCPA_Alert_Audio);
6285 m_soundPanelSART->GetCheckBox()->SetValue(g_bAIS_SART_Alert_Audio);
6286 m_soundPanelDSC->GetCheckBox()->SetValue(g_bAIS_DSC_Alert_Audio);
6287
6288 // Rollover
6289 m_pCheck_Rollover_Class->SetValue(g_bAISRolloverShowClass);
6290 m_pCheck_Rollover_COG->SetValue(g_bAISRolloverShowCOG);
6291 m_pCheck_Rollover_CPA->SetValue(g_bAISRolloverShowCPA);
6292

6294 m_pSlider_Zoom_Vector->SetValue(g_chart_zoom_modifier_vector);
6295
6296 m_pSlider_GUI_Factor->SetValue(g_GUIScaleFactor);
6297 m_pSlider_Chart_Factor->SetValue(g_ChartScaleFactor);
6298 m_pSlider_Ship_Factor->SetValue(g_ShipScaleFactor);
6299 m_pSlider_Text_Factor->SetValue(g_ENCSoundingScaleFactor);
6300 m_pSlider_ENCText_Factor->SetValue(g_ENCTextScaleFactor);
6301 m_pMouse_Zoom_Slider->SetValue(g_mouse_zoom_sensitivity_ui);
6302 wxString screenmm;
6303 if (!g_config_display_size_manual) {
6304 pRBSizeAuto->SetValue(TRUE);
6305 for (const auto& mm : g_monitor_info) {
6306 screenmm.Append(wxString::Format("%zu,", mm.width_mm));
6307 }
6308 screenmm.RemoveLast(); // Strip last comma
6309 pScreenMM->Disable();
6310 } else {
6311 for (const auto& mm : g_config_display_size_mm) {
6312 screenmm.Append(wxString::Format("%zu,", mm));
6313 }
6314 screenmm.RemoveLast(); // Strip last comma
6315 pRBSizeManual->SetValue(TRUE);
6316 }
6317
6318 pScreenMM->SetValue(screenmm);
6319
6320 pDepthUnitSelect->SetSelection(g_nDepthUnitDisplay);
6321 UpdateOptionsUnits(); // sets depth values using the user's unit preference
6322
6323 SetInitialVectorSettings();
6324
6325 pToolbarAutoHideCB->SetValue(g_bAutoHideToolbar);
6326
6327 s.Printf(_T("%d"), g_nAutoHideToolbar);
6328 pToolbarHideSecs->SetValue(s);
6329
6330 // Serial ports
6331
6332 delete m_pSerialArray;
6333 m_pSerialArray = NULL;
6334 m_pSerialArray = EnumerateSerialPorts();
6335 m_bForceNewToolbaronCancel = false;
6336}
6337
6338void options::resetMarStdList(bool bsetConfig, bool bsetStd) {
6339 if (ps57CtlListBox) {
6340 // S52 Primary Filters
6341 ps57CtlListBox->Clear();
6342 marinersStdXref.clear();
6343
6344 for (unsigned int iPtr = 0; iPtr < ps52plib->pOBJLArray->GetCount();
6345 iPtr++) {
6346 OBJLElement* pOLE = (OBJLElement*)(ps52plib->pOBJLArray->Item(iPtr));
6347
6348 wxString item;
6349 if (iPtr < ps52plib->OBJLDescriptions.size()) {
6350 item = ps52plib->OBJLDescriptions[iPtr];
6351 } else {
6352 item = wxString(pOLE->OBJLName, wxConvUTF8);
6353 }
6354
6355 // Find the most conservative Category, among Point, Area, and Line LUPs
6356 DisCat cat = OTHER;
6357
6358 DisCat catp = ps52plib->findLUPDisCat(pOLE->OBJLName, SIMPLIFIED);
6359 DisCat cata = ps52plib->findLUPDisCat(pOLE->OBJLName, PLAIN_BOUNDARIES);
6360 DisCat catl = ps52plib->findLUPDisCat(pOLE->OBJLName, LINES);
6361
6362 if ((catp == DISPLAYBASE) || (cata == DISPLAYBASE) ||
6363 (catl == DISPLAYBASE))
6364 cat = DISPLAYBASE;
6365 else if ((catp == STANDARD) || (cata == STANDARD) || (catl == STANDARD))
6366 cat = STANDARD;
6367
6368 bool benable = true;
6369 if (cat > 0) benable = cat != DISPLAYBASE;
6370
6371 // The ListBox control will insert entries in sorted order, which means
6372 // we need to
6373 // keep track of already inserted items that gets pushed down the line.
6374 int newpos = ps57CtlListBox->Append(item, benable);
6375 marinersStdXref.push_back(newpos);
6376 for (size_t i = 0; i < iPtr; i++) {
6377 if (marinersStdXref[i] >= newpos) marinersStdXref[i]++;
6378 }
6379
6380 bool bviz = 0;
6381 if (bsetConfig) bviz = !(pOLE->nViz == 0);
6382
6383 if (cat == DISPLAYBASE) bviz = true;
6384
6385 if (bsetStd) {
6386 if (cat == STANDARD) {
6387 bviz = true;
6388 }
6389 }
6390
6391 ps57CtlListBox->Check(newpos, bviz);
6392 }
6393 // Force the wxScrolledWindow to recalculate its scroll bars
6394 wxSize s = ps57CtlListBox->GetSize();
6395 ps57CtlListBox->SetSize(s.x, s.y - 1);
6396 }
6397}
6398
6399void options::SetInitialVectorSettings(void) {
6400 m_pSlider_CM93_Zoom->SetValue(g_cm93_zoom_factor);
6401
6402 // Diplay Category
6403 if (ps52plib) {
6404 m_bVectorInit = true;
6405 resetMarStdList(true, false);
6406
6407#ifdef __ANDROID__
6408 ps57CtlListBox->GetHandle()->setStyleSheet(getAdjustedDialogStyleSheet());
6409#endif
6410
6411 int nset = 2; // default OTHER
6412 switch (ps52plib->GetDisplayCategory()) {
6413 case (DISPLAYBASE):
6414 nset = 0;
6415 break;
6416 case (STANDARD):
6417 nset = 1;
6418 break;
6419 case (OTHER):
6420 nset = 2;
6421 break;
6422 case (MARINERS_STANDARD):
6423 nset = 3;
6424 break;
6425 default:
6426 nset = 3;
6427 break;
6428 }
6429
6430 if (pDispCat) pDispCat->SetSelection(nset);
6431
6432 // Enable the UserStandard object list if either canvas is in
6433 // MARINERS_STANDARD display category
6434 bool benableMarStd = false;
6435 // .. for each canvas...
6436 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < g_canvasArray.GetCount(); i++) {
6437 ChartCanvas* cc = g_canvasArray.Item(i);
6438 if (cc) {
6439 if (cc->GetENCDisplayCategory() == MARINERS_STANDARD)
6440 benableMarStd = true;
6441 }
6442 }
6443
6444 // if(g_useMUI)
6445 // benableMarStd = true;
6446
6447 if (ps57CtlListBox) ps57CtlListBox->Enable(benableMarStd);
6448 itemButtonClearList->Enable(benableMarStd);
6449 itemButtonSelectList->Enable(benableMarStd);
6450 itemButtonSetStd->Enable(benableMarStd);
6451
6452 // Other Display Filters
6453 if (pCheck_SOUNDG) pCheck_SOUNDG->SetValue(ps52plib->m_bShowSoundg);
6454 if (pCheck_ATONTEXT) pCheck_ATONTEXT->SetValue(ps52plib->m_bShowAtonText);
6455 if (pCheck_LDISTEXT) pCheck_LDISTEXT->SetValue(ps52plib->m_bShowLdisText);
6456 if (pCheck_XLSECTTEXT)
6457 pCheck_XLSECTTEXT->SetValue(ps52plib->m_bExtendLightSectors);
6458
6459 pCheck_META->SetValue(ps52plib->m_bShowMeta);
6460 pCheck_SHOWIMPTEXT->SetValue(ps52plib->m_bShowS57ImportantTextOnly);
6461 pCheck_SCAMIN->SetValue(ps52plib->m_bUseSCAMIN);
6462 pCheck_SuperSCAMIN->SetValue(ps52plib->m_bUseSUPER_SCAMIN);
6463
6464 pCheck_DECLTEXT->SetValue(ps52plib->m_bDeClutterText);
6465 pCheck_NATIONALTEXT->SetValue(ps52plib->m_bShowNationalTexts);
6466
6467 // Chart Display Style
6468 if (ps52plib->m_nSymbolStyle == PAPER_CHART)
6469 pPointStyle->SetSelection(0);
6470 else
6471 pPointStyle->SetSelection(1);
6472
6473 if (ps52plib->m_nBoundaryStyle == PLAIN_BOUNDARIES)
6474 pBoundStyle->SetSelection(0);
6475 else
6476 pBoundStyle->SetSelection(1);
6477
6478 if (S52_getMarinerParam(S52_MAR_TWO_SHADES) == 1.0)
6479 p24Color->SetSelection(0);
6480 else
6481 p24Color->SetSelection(1);
6482
6483 UpdateOptionsUnits(); // sets depth values using the user's unit preference
6484 }
6485}
6486
6487void options::UpdateOptionsUnits(void) {
6488 int depthUnit = pDepthUnitSelect->GetSelection();
6489
6490 depthUnit = wxMax(depthUnit, 0);
6491 depthUnit = wxMin(depthUnit, 2);
6492
6493 // depth unit conversion factor
6494 float conv = 1;
6495 if (depthUnit == 0) // feet
6496 conv = 0.3048f; // international definiton of 1 foot is 0.3048 metres
6497 else if (depthUnit == 2) // fathoms
6498 conv = 0.3048f * 6; // 1 fathom is 6 feet
6499
6500 // set depth input values
6501
6502 // set depth unit labels
6503 wxString depthUnitStrings[] = {_("feet"), _("meters"), _("fathoms")};
6504 wxString depthUnitString = depthUnitStrings[depthUnit];
6505 m_depthUnitsShal->SetLabel(depthUnitString);
6506 m_depthUnitsSafe->SetLabel(depthUnitString);
6507 m_depthUnitsDeep->SetLabel(depthUnitString);
6508
6509 wxString s;
6510 s.Printf(_T( "%6.2f" ), S52_getMarinerParam(S52_MAR_SHALLOW_CONTOUR) / conv);
6511 s.Trim(FALSE);
6512 m_ShallowCtl->SetValue(s);
6513
6514 s.Printf(_T( "%6.2f" ), S52_getMarinerParam(S52_MAR_SAFETY_CONTOUR) / conv);
6515 s.Trim(FALSE);
6516 m_SafetyCtl->SetValue(s);
6517
6518 s.Printf(_T( "%6.2f" ), S52_getMarinerParam(S52_MAR_DEEP_CONTOUR) / conv);
6519 s.Trim(FALSE);
6520 m_DeepCtl->SetValue(s);
6521 /*
6522 int oldLength = itemStaticTextUserVar->GetLabel().Length();
6523
6524 //disable input for variation if WMM is available
6525 if(b_haveWMM){
6526 itemStaticTextUserVar->SetLabel(_("WMM Plugin calculated magnetic
6527 variation")); wxString s; s.Printf(_T("%4.1f"), gVar); pMagVar->SetValue(s);
6528 }
6529 else{
6530 itemStaticTextUserVar->SetLabel(_("User set magnetic variation"));
6531 wxString s;
6532 s.Printf(_T("%4.1f"), g_UserVar);
6533 pMagVar->SetValue(s);
6534 }
6535
6536 int newLength = itemStaticTextUserVar->GetLabel().Length();
6537
6538 // size hack to adjust change in static text size
6539 if( (newLength != oldLength) || (b_oldhaveWMM != b_haveWMM) ){
6540 wxSize sz = GetSize();
6541 SetSize(sz.x+1, sz.y);
6542 SetSize(sz);
6543 }
6544
6545 itemStaticTextUserVar2->Enable(!b_haveWMM);
6546 pMagVar->Enable(!b_haveWMM);
6547 */
6548}
6549
6550void options::OnSizeAutoButton(wxCommandEvent& event) {
6551 wxString screenmm;
6552 for (const auto& mm : g_monitor_info) {
6553 screenmm.Append(wxString::Format("%zu,", mm.width_mm));
6554 }
6555 screenmm.RemoveLast(); // Strip last comma
6556 pScreenMM->SetValue(screenmm);
6557 pScreenMM->Disable();
6558 g_config_display_size_manual = FALSE;
6559}
6560
6561void options::OnSizeManualButton(wxCommandEvent& event) {
6562 wxString screenmm;
6563 if (g_config_display_size_mm.size() > 0 && g_config_display_size_mm[0] > 0) {
6564 for (const auto& mm : g_config_display_size_mm) {
6565 screenmm.Append(wxString::Format("%zu,", mm));
6566 }
6567 } else {
6568 for (const auto& mm : g_monitor_info) {
6569 screenmm.Append(wxString::Format("%zu,", mm.width_mm));
6570 }
6571 }
6572 screenmm.RemoveLast(); // Strip last comma
6573 pScreenMM->SetValue(screenmm);
6574 pScreenMM->Enable();
6575 g_config_display_size_manual = TRUE;
6576}
6577
6578void options::OnUnitsChoice(wxCommandEvent& event) { UpdateOptionsUnits(); }
6579
6580void options::OnCPAWarnClick(wxCommandEvent& event) {
6581 if (m_pCheck_CPA_Warn->GetValue()) {
6582 m_pCheck_CPA_WarnT->Enable();
6583 } else {
6584 m_pCheck_CPA_WarnT->SetValue(FALSE);
6585 m_pCheck_CPA_WarnT->Disable();
6586 }
6587}
6588
6589void options::OnSyncCogPredClick(wxCommandEvent& event) {
6590 if (m_pCheck_Sync_OCOG_ACOG->GetValue()) {
6591 m_pText_COG_Predictor->SetValue(m_pText_OSCOG_Predictor->GetValue());
6592 m_pText_COG_Predictor->Disable();
6593 } else {
6594 wxString s;
6595 s.Printf(_T("%4.0f"), g_ShowCOG_Mins);
6596 m_pText_COG_Predictor->SetValue(s);
6597 m_pText_COG_Predictor->Enable();
6598 }
6599}
6600
6601void options::OnShipTypeSelect(wxCommandEvent& event) {
6602 realSizes->ShowItems(m_pShipIconType->GetSelection() != 0);
6603 dispOptions->Layout();
6604 ownShip->Layout();
6605 itemPanelShip->Layout();
6606 itemPanelShip->Refresh();
6607 event.Skip();
6608}
6609
6610void options::OnRadarringSelect(wxCommandEvent& event) {
6611 radarGrid->ShowItems(pNavAidRadarRingsNumberVisible->GetSelection() != 0);
6612 dispOptions->Layout();
6613 ownShip->Layout();
6614 itemPanelShip->Layout();
6615 itemPanelShip->Refresh();
6616 event.Skip();
6617}
6618
6619void options::OnWaypointRangeRingSelect(wxCommandEvent& event) {
6620 waypointradarGrid->ShowItems(pWaypointRangeRingsNumber->GetSelection() != 0);
6621 dispOptions->Layout();
6622 Routes->Layout();
6623 itemPanelRoutes->Layout();
6624 itemPanelRoutes->Refresh();
6625 event.Skip();
6626}
6627
6628void options::OnGLClicked(wxCommandEvent& event) {
6629 // if (!g_bTransparentToolbarInOpenGLOK)
6630 // pTransparentToolbar->Enable(!pOpenGL->GetValue());
6631}
6632
6633void options::OnOpenGLOptions(wxCommandEvent& event) {
6634#ifdef ocpnUSE_GL
6635 OpenGLOptionsDlg dlg(this);
6636
6637 if (dlg.ShowModal() == wxID_OK) {
6638 if (gFrame->GetPrimaryCanvas()->GetglCanvas()) {
6639 g_GLOptions.m_bUseAcceleratedPanning = g_bGLexpert
6640 ? dlg.GetAcceleratedPanning()
6641 : gFrame->GetPrimaryCanvas()
6642 ->GetglCanvas()
6643 ->CanAcceleratePanning();
6644 }
6645
6646 g_bSoftwareGL = dlg.GetSoftwareGL();
6647
6648 g_GLOptions.m_GLPolygonSmoothing = dlg.GetPolygonSmoothing();
6649 g_GLOptions.m_GLLineSmoothing = dlg.GetLineSmoothing();
6650
6651 if (g_bGLexpert) {
6652 // user defined
6653 g_GLOptions.m_bTextureCompressionCaching =
6654 dlg.GetTextureCompressionCaching();
6655 g_GLOptions.m_iTextureMemorySize = dlg.GetTextureMemorySize();
6656 } else {
6657 // caching is on if textures are compressed
6658 g_GLOptions.m_bTextureCompressionCaching = dlg.GetTextureCompression();
6659 }
6660
6661 if (g_bopengl && g_glTextureManager &&
6662 g_GLOptions.m_bTextureCompression != dlg.GetTextureCompression()) {
6663 // new g_GLoptions setting is needed in callees
6664 g_GLOptions.m_bTextureCompression = dlg.GetTextureCompression();
6665
6666 if (gFrame->GetPrimaryCanvas()->GetglCanvas()) {
6667 ::wxBeginBusyCursor();
6668 gFrame->GetPrimaryCanvas()->GetglCanvas()->SetupCompression();
6669 g_glTextureManager->ClearAllRasterTextures();
6670 ::wxEndBusyCursor();
6671 }
6672 } else
6673 g_GLOptions.m_bTextureCompression = dlg.GetTextureCompression();
6674 }
6675
6676 if (dlg.GetRebuildCache()) {
6677 m_returnChanges = REBUILD_RASTER_CACHE;
6678 Finish();
6679 }
6680#endif
6681}
6682
6683void options::OnChartDirListSelect(wxCommandEvent& event) {
6684#if 0
6685 bool selected = (pActiveChartsList->GetSelectedItemCount() > 0);
6686 m_removeBtn->Enable(selected);
6687 if (m_compressBtn) m_compressBtn->Enable(selected);
6688#endif
6689}
6690
6691void options::OnDisplayCategoryRadioButton(wxCommandEvent& event) {
6692 if (!g_useMUI) {
6693 if (pDispCat) {
6694 const bool select = pDispCat->GetSelection() == 3;
6695 ps57CtlListBox->Enable(select);
6696 itemButtonClearList->Enable(select);
6697 itemButtonSelectList->Enable(select);
6698 itemButtonSetStd->Enable(select);
6699 }
6700 }
6701 event.Skip();
6702}
6703
6704void options::OnButtonClearClick(wxCommandEvent& event) {
6705 resetMarStdList(false, false);
6706
6707 // int nOBJL = ps57CtlListBox->GetCount();
6708 // for (int iPtr = 0; iPtr < nOBJL; iPtr++){
6709 // ps57CtlListBox->Check(iPtr, FALSE);
6710 // }
6711 event.Skip();
6712}
6713
6714void options::OnButtonSelectClick(wxCommandEvent& event) {
6715 int nOBJL = ps57CtlListBox->GetCount();
6716 for (int iPtr = 0; iPtr < nOBJL; iPtr++) ps57CtlListBox->Check(iPtr, TRUE);
6717
6718 event.Skip();
6719}
6720
6721void options::OnButtonSetStd(wxCommandEvent& event) {
6722 resetMarStdList(false, true);
6723
6724 event.Skip();
6725}
6726
6727bool options::ShowToolTips(void) { return TRUE; }
6728
6729void options::OnCharHook(wxKeyEvent& event) {
6730 if (event.GetKeyCode() == WXK_RETURN &&
6731 event.GetModifiers() == wxMOD_CONTROL) {
6732 wxCommandEvent okEvent;
6733 okEvent.SetId(xID_OK);
6734 okEvent.SetEventType(wxEVT_COMMAND_BUTTON_CLICKED);
6735 GetEventHandler()->AddPendingEvent(okEvent);
6736 }
6737 event.Skip();
6738}
6739
6740void options::OnButtonaddClick(wxCommandEvent& event) {
6741 wxString selDir;
6742 int dresult = g_Platform->DoDirSelectorDialog(
6743 this, &selDir, _("Add a directory containing chart files"),
6744 *pInit_Chart_Dir, false); // no add files allowed
6745
6746 if (dresult != wxID_CANCEL) AddChartDir(selDir);
6747
6748 event.Skip();
6749}
6750
6751void options::AddChartDir(const wxString& dir) {
6752 wxFileName dirname = wxFileName(dir);
6753 pInit_Chart_Dir->Empty();
6754
6755 wxString dirAdd;
6756 if (g_bportable) {
6757 wxFileName f(dir);
6758 f.MakeRelativeTo(g_Platform->GetHomeDir());
6759 dirAdd = f.GetFullPath();
6760 } else {
6761 pInit_Chart_Dir->Append(dirname.GetPath());
6762 dirAdd = dir;
6763 }
6764
6765 ChartDirInfo cdi;
6766 cdi.fullpath = dirAdd;
6767 ActiveChartArray.Add(cdi);
6768
6769 UpdateChartDirList();
6770
6771 k_charts |= CHANGE_CHARTS;
6772
6773 pScanCheckBox->Disable();
6774}
6775
6776void options::UpdateDisplayedChartDirList(ArrayOfCDI p) {
6777 // Called by pluginmanager after adding single chart to database
6778
6779 ActiveChartArray.Clear();
6780 for (size_t i = 0; i < p.GetCount(); i++) {
6781 ActiveChartArray.Add(p[i]);
6782 }
6783
6784 UpdateChartDirList();
6785}
6786
6787void options::UpdateWorkArrayFromDisplayPanel(void) {
6788 wxString dirname;
6789 int n = ActiveChartArray.GetCount();
6790 if (m_pWorkDirList) {
6791 m_pWorkDirList->Clear();
6792 for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
6793 dirname = ActiveChartArray[i].fullpath;
6794 if (!dirname.IsEmpty()) {
6795 // This is a fix for OSX, which appends EOL to results of
6796 // GetLineText()
6797 while ((dirname.Last() == wxChar(_T('\n'))) ||
6798 (dirname.Last() == wxChar(_T('\r'))))
6799 dirname.RemoveLast();
6800
6801 // scan the current array to find a match
6802 // if found, add the info to the work list, preserving the magic
6803 // number
6804 // If not found, make a new ChartDirInfo, and add it
6805 bool b_added = FALSE;
6806 // if(m_pCurrentDirList)
6807 {
6808 int nDir = m_CurrentDirList.GetCount();
6809
6810 for (int i = 0; i < nDir; i++) {
6811 if (m_CurrentDirList[i].fullpath == dirname) {
6812 ChartDirInfo cdi = m_CurrentDirList[i];
6813 m_pWorkDirList->Add(cdi);
6814 b_added = TRUE;
6815 break;
6816 }
6817 }
6818 }
6819 if (!b_added) {
6820 ChartDirInfo cdin;
6821 cdin.fullpath = dirname;
6822 m_pWorkDirList->Add(cdin);
6823 }
6824 }
6825 }
6826 }
6827}
6828
6829void options::OnApplyClick(wxCommandEvent& event) {
6830 ApplyChanges(event);
6831
6832 // Complete processing
6833 // Force reload of options dialog to pick up font changes, locale changes,
6834 // or other major layout changes
6835 if ((m_returnChanges & FONT_CHANGED) ||
6836 (m_returnChanges & NEED_NEW_OPTIONS)) {
6837 gFrame->PrepareOptionsClose(this, m_returnChanges);
6838 if (!(m_returnChanges & FONT_CHANGED_SAFE))
6839 gFrame->ScheduleReconfigAndSettingsReload(true, true);
6840 } else {
6841 // If we had a config change,
6842 // then schedule a re-entry to the settings dialog
6843 if ((m_returnChanges & CONFIG_CHANGED)) {
6844 gFrame->ScheduleReconfigAndSettingsReload(true, false);
6845 }
6846 }
6847}
6848
6849void options::ApplyChanges(wxCommandEvent& event) {
6850 //::wxBeginBusyCursor();
6851 // FIXME This function is in ConnectionsDialog StopBTScan();
6852
6853 // Start with the stuff that requires intelligent validation.
6854
6855 if (m_pShipIconType->GetSelection() > 0) {
6856 double n_ownship_length_meters;
6857 double n_ownship_beam_meters;
6858 double n_gps_antenna_offset_y;
6859 double n_gps_antenna_offset_x;
6860 long n_ownship_min_mm;
6861 m_pOSLength->GetValue().ToDouble(&n_ownship_length_meters);
6862 m_pOSWidth->GetValue().ToDouble(&n_ownship_beam_meters);
6863 m_pOSGPSOffsetX->GetValue().ToDouble(&n_gps_antenna_offset_x);
6864 m_pOSGPSOffsetY->GetValue().ToDouble(&n_gps_antenna_offset_y);
6865 m_pOSMinSize->GetValue().ToLong(&n_ownship_min_mm);
6866 wxString msg;
6867 if (n_ownship_length_meters <= 0)
6868 msg += _("\n - your ship's length must be > 0");
6869 if (n_ownship_beam_meters <= 0)
6870 msg += _("\n - your ship's beam must be > 0");
6871 if (fabs(n_gps_antenna_offset_x) > n_ownship_beam_meters / 2.0)
6872 msg += _(
6873 "\n - your GPS offset from midship must be within your ship's beam");
6874 if (n_gps_antenna_offset_y < 0 ||
6875 n_gps_antenna_offset_y > n_ownship_length_meters)
6876 msg +=
6877 _("\n - your GPS offset from bow must be within your ship's length");
6878 if (n_ownship_min_mm <= 0 || n_ownship_min_mm > 100)
6879 msg += _("\n - your minimum ship icon size must be between 1 and 100 mm");
6880 if (!msg.IsEmpty()) {
6881 msg.Prepend(_("The settings for own ship real size are not correct:"));
6882 OCPNMessageBox(this, msg, _("OpenCPN info"), wxICON_ERROR | wxOK);
6883 ::wxEndBusyCursor();
6884 event.SetInt(wxID_STOP);
6885 return;
6886 }
6887 g_n_ownship_length_meters = n_ownship_length_meters;
6888 g_n_ownship_beam_meters = n_ownship_beam_meters;
6889 g_n_gps_antenna_offset_y = n_gps_antenna_offset_y;
6890 g_n_gps_antenna_offset_x = n_gps_antenna_offset_x;
6891 g_n_ownship_min_mm = static_cast<int>(n_ownship_min_mm);
6892 }
6893 g_OwnShipIconType = m_pShipIconType->GetSelection();
6894 g_bShowShipToActive = pShowshipToActive->GetValue();
6895 g_shipToActiveStyle = m_shipToActiveStyle->GetSelection();
6896 g_shipToActiveColor = m_shipToActiveColor->GetSelection();
6897
6898 m_pText_ACRadius->GetValue().ToDouble(&g_n_arrival_circle_radius);
6899 g_n_arrival_circle_radius =
6900 wxClip(g_n_arrival_circle_radius, 0.001, 0.6); // Correct abnormally
6901
6902 wxString* icon_name =
6903 pWayPointMan->GetIconKey(pWaypointDefaultIconChoice->GetSelection());
6904 if (icon_name && icon_name->Length()) g_default_wp_icon = *icon_name;
6905
6906 icon_name =
6907 pWayPointMan->GetIconKey(pRoutepointDefaultIconChoice->GetSelection());
6908 if (icon_name && icon_name->Length()) g_default_routepoint_icon = *icon_name;
6909
6910 g_bUseWptScaMin = pScaMinChckB->GetValue();
6911 g_iWpt_ScaMin = wxAtoi(m_pText_ScaMin->GetValue());
6912 g_bOverruleScaMin = pScaMinOverruleChckB->GetValue();
6913
6914 // Any Font changes?
6915 if (m_bfontChanged) {
6916#ifdef ocpnUSE_GL
6917 if (gFrame->GetPrimaryCanvas()->GetglCanvas()) {
6918 gFrame->GetPrimaryCanvas()->GetglCanvas()->ResetGridFont();
6919 }
6920#endif
6921
6922 m_returnChanges |= FONT_CHANGED;
6923
6924 // If the font element changed was not "Dialog", then we don't need a full
6925 // reload
6926 if (m_font_element_array.Index("Dialog") == wxNOT_FOUND)
6927 m_returnChanges |= FONT_CHANGED_SAFE;
6928 }
6929
6930 // Handle Chart Tab
6931 UpdateWorkArrayFromDisplayPanel();
6932
6933 groupsPanel->SetDBDirs(*m_pWorkDirList); // update the Groups tab
6934 groupsPanel->m_treespopulated = FALSE;
6935
6936 int k_force = FORCE_UPDATE;
6937 if (pUpdateCheckBox) {
6938 if (!pUpdateCheckBox->GetValue()) k_force = 0;
6939 pUpdateCheckBox->Enable();
6940 pUpdateCheckBox->SetValue(FALSE);
6941 } else {
6942 k_force = 0;
6943 }
6944
6945 m_returnChanges |= k_force;
6946
6947 int k_scan = SCAN_UPDATE;
6948 if (pScanCheckBox) {
6949 if (!pScanCheckBox->GetValue()) k_scan = 0;
6950 pScanCheckBox->Enable();
6951 pScanCheckBox->SetValue(FALSE);
6952 } else {
6953 k_scan = 0;
6954 }
6955
6956 m_returnChanges |= k_scan;
6957
6958 // Chart Groups
6959
6960 if (groupsPanel->modified) {
6961 groupsPanel->EmptyChartGroupArray(g_pGroupArray);
6962 delete g_pGroupArray;
6963 g_pGroupArray = groupsPanel->CloneChartGroupArray(m_pGroupArray);
6964 m_returnChanges |= GROUPS_CHANGED;
6965 }
6966
6967 // Handle Settings Tab
6968 if (m_pConfig) {
6969 g_bShowStatusBar = pShowStatusBar->GetValue();
6970#ifndef __WXOSX__
6971 g_bShowMenuBar = pShowMenuBar->GetValue();
6972#endif
6973 g_bShowCompassWin = pShowCompassWin->GetValue();
6974 }
6975
6976 g_bShowChartBar = pShowChartBar->GetValue();
6977
6978 wxString screenmm = pScreenMM->GetValue();
6979 wxStringTokenizer tkz(screenmm, _T( "," ));
6980 g_config_display_size_mm.clear();
6981 while (tkz.HasMoreTokens()) {
6982 wxString token = tkz.GetNextToken();
6983 long mm = -1;
6984 if (token.ToLong(&mm) && mm > 0) {
6985 g_config_display_size_mm.push_back(mm);
6986 } else {
6987 g_config_display_size_mm.push_back(0);
6988 }
6989 }
6990 g_config_display_size_manual = pRBSizeManual->GetValue();
6991
6992 // Connections page.
6993 comm_dialog->ApplySettings();
6994
6995 if (pCDOOutlines) g_bShowOutlines = pCDOOutlines->GetValue();
6996 if (pSDisplayGrid) g_bDisplayGrid = pSDisplayGrid->GetValue();
6997
6998 if (pCDOQuilting) {
6999 bool temp_bquilting = pCDOQuilting->GetValue();
7000 // if (!g_bQuiltEnable && temp_bquilting)
7001 // cc1->ReloadVP(); /* compose the quilt */
7002 g_bQuiltEnable = temp_bquilting;
7003 }
7004 // g_bFullScreenQuilt = !pFullScreenQuilt->GetValue();
7005
7006 if (pSDepthUnits) g_bShowDepthUnits = pSDepthUnits->GetValue();
7007 g_bskew_comp = pSkewComp->GetValue();
7008 g_btouch = pMobile->GetValue();
7009 g_bresponsive = pResponsive->GetValue();
7010 g_bRollover = pRollover->GetValue();
7011 g_bShowMuiZoomButtons = pZoomButtons->GetValue();
7012
7013 g_bAutoHideToolbar = pToolbarAutoHideCB->GetValue();
7014
7015 long hide_val = 10;
7016 pToolbarHideSecs->GetValue().ToLong(&hide_val);
7017 g_nAutoHideToolbar = wxMin(static_cast<int>(hide_val), 100);
7018 g_nAutoHideToolbar = wxMax(g_nAutoHideToolbar, 2);
7019
7020 // g_fog_overzoom = !pOverzoomEmphasis->GetValue();
7021 // g_oz_vector_scale = !pOZScaleVector->GetValue();
7022
7023 g_bsmoothpanzoom = pSmoothPanZoom->GetValue();
7024#ifdef __ANDROID__
7025 g_bsmoothpanzoom = false;
7026#endif
7027 if (pSmoothPanZoom) g_bsmoothpanzoom = pSmoothPanZoom->GetValue();
7028#ifdef __ANDROID__
7029 g_bsmoothpanzoom = false;
7030#endif
7031
7032 long update_val = 1;
7033 pCOGUPUpdateSecs->GetValue().ToLong(&update_val);
7034 g_COGAvgSec = wxMin(static_cast<int>(update_val), MAX_COG_AVERAGE_SECONDS);
7035
7036 // TODO if (g_bCourseUp != pCBCourseUp->GetValue()) gFrame->ToggleCourseUp();
7037
7038 if (pCBLookAhead) g_bLookAhead = pCBLookAhead->GetValue();
7039
7040 g_bShowTrue = pCBTrueShow->GetValue();
7041 g_bShowMag = pCBMagShow->GetValue();
7042
7043 auto loader = PluginLoader::getInstance();
7044 b_haveWMM = loader && loader->IsPlugInAvailable(_T("WMM"));
7045 if (!b_haveWMM && !b_oldhaveWMM) {
7046 pMagVar->GetValue().ToDouble(&g_UserVar);
7047 gVar = g_UserVar;
7048 }
7049
7050 m_pText_OSCOG_Predictor->GetValue().ToDouble(&g_ownship_predictor_minutes);
7051 m_pText_OSHDT_Predictor->GetValue().ToDouble(&g_ownship_HDTpredictor_miles);
7052
7053 double temp_dbl;
7054 g_iNavAidRadarRingsNumberVisible =
7055 pNavAidRadarRingsNumberVisible->GetSelection();
7056 g_bNavAidRadarRingsShown = g_iNavAidRadarRingsNumberVisible > 0;
7057 if (pNavAidRadarRingsStep->GetValue().ToDouble(&temp_dbl))
7058 g_fNavAidRadarRingsStep = temp_dbl;
7059 g_pNavAidRadarRingsStepUnits = m_itemRadarRingsUnits->GetSelection();
7060 g_iWaypointRangeRingsNumber = pWaypointRangeRingsNumber->GetSelection();
7061 if (pWaypointRangeRingsStep->GetValue().ToDouble(&temp_dbl))
7062 g_fWaypointRangeRingsStep = temp_dbl;
7063 g_iWaypointRangeRingsStepUnits =
7064 m_itemWaypointRangeRingsUnits->GetSelection();
7065 g_colourWaypointRangeRingsColour =
7066 m_colourWaypointRangeRingsColour->GetColour();
7067 g_colourWaypointRangeRingsColour =
7068 wxColour(g_colourWaypointRangeRingsColour.Red(),
7069 g_colourWaypointRangeRingsColour.Green(),
7070 g_colourWaypointRangeRingsColour.Blue());
7071 g_bWayPointPreventDragging = pWayPointPreventDragging->GetValue();
7072 g_own_ship_sog_cog_calc = pSogCogFromLLCheckBox->GetValue();
7073 g_own_ship_sog_cog_calc_damp_sec = pSogCogFromLLDampInterval->GetValue();
7074
7075 g_bConfirmObjectDelete = pConfirmObjectDeletion->GetValue();
7076
7077 if (pPreserveScale) g_bPreserveScaleOnX = pPreserveScale->GetValue();
7078
7079 if (pCmdSoundString) {
7080 g_CmdSoundString = pCmdSoundString->GetValue();
7081 if (wxIsEmpty(g_CmdSoundString)) {
7082 g_CmdSoundString = wxString(OCPN_SOUND_CMD);
7083 pCmdSoundString->SetValue(g_CmdSoundString);
7084 }
7085 }
7086
7087 g_bPlayShipsBells = pPlayShipsBells->GetValue();
7088 if (pSoundDeviceIndex)
7089 g_iSoundDeviceIndex = pSoundDeviceIndex->GetSelection();
7090 // g_bTransparentToolbar = pTransparentToolbar->GetValue();
7091 g_iSDMMFormat = pSDMMFormat->GetSelection();
7092 g_iDistanceFormat = pDistanceFormat->GetSelection();
7093 g_iSpeedFormat = pSpeedFormat->GetSelection();
7094 g_iWindSpeedFormat = pWindSpeedFormat->GetSelection();
7095 g_iTempFormat = pTempFormat->GetSelection();
7096
7097 // LIVE ETA OPTION
7098 if (pSLiveETA) g_bShowLiveETA = pSLiveETA->GetValue();
7099 if (pSDefaultBoatSpeed)
7100 pSDefaultBoatSpeed->GetValue().ToDouble(&g_defaultBoatSpeedUserUnit);
7101 g_defaultBoatSpeed = fromUsrSpeed(g_defaultBoatSpeedUserUnit);
7102 m_Text_def_boat_speed->SetLabel(_("Default Boat Speed ") + "(" +
7103 getUsrSpeedUnit() + ")");
7104
7105 g_bAdvanceRouteWaypointOnArrivalOnly =
7106 pAdvanceRouteWaypointOnArrivalOnly->GetValue();
7107
7108 g_colourTrackLineColour = m_colourTrackLineColour->GetColour();
7109 g_colourTrackLineColour =
7110 wxColour(g_colourTrackLineColour.Red(), g_colourTrackLineColour.Green(),
7111 g_colourTrackLineColour.Blue());
7112 g_nTrackPrecision = pTrackPrecision->GetSelection();
7113
7114 g_bTrackDaily = pTrackDaily->GetValue();
7115
7116 g_track_rotate_time = 0;
7117#if wxUSE_TIMEPICKCTRL
7118 int h, m, s;
7119 if (pTrackRotateTime && pTrackRotateTime->GetTime(&h, &m, &s))
7120 g_track_rotate_time = h * 3600 + m * 60 + s;
7121#endif
7122
7123 if (pTrackRotateUTC->GetValue())
7124 g_track_rotate_time_type = TIME_TYPE_UTC;
7125 else if (pTrackRotateLMT->GetValue())
7126 g_track_rotate_time_type = TIME_TYPE_LMT;
7127 else
7128 g_track_rotate_time_type = TIME_TYPE_COMPUTER;
7129
7130 g_bHighliteTracks = pTrackHighlite->GetValue();
7131
7132 if (pEnableZoomToCursor)
7133 g_bEnableZoomToCursor = pEnableZoomToCursor->GetValue();
7134#ifdef __ANDROID__
7135 g_bEnableZoomToCursor = false;
7136#endif
7137
7138 g_colourOwnshipRangeRingsColour = m_colourOwnshipRangeRingColour->GetColour();
7139 g_colourOwnshipRangeRingsColour =
7140 wxColour(g_colourOwnshipRangeRingsColour.Red(),
7141 g_colourOwnshipRangeRingsColour.Green(),
7142 g_colourOwnshipRangeRingsColour.Blue());
7143
7144 // Sounds
7145 g_bAIS_GCPA_Alert_Audio = m_soundPanelAIS->GetCheckBox()->GetValue();
7146 g_bAIS_SART_Alert_Audio = m_soundPanelSART->GetCheckBox()->GetValue();
7147 g_bAIS_DSC_Alert_Audio = m_soundPanelDSC->GetCheckBox()->GetValue();
7148 g_bAnchor_Alert_Audio = m_soundPanelAnchor->GetCheckBox()->GetValue();
7149
7150 // AIS Parameters
7151 // CPA Box
7152 g_bCPAMax = m_pCheck_CPA_Max->GetValue();
7153 m_pText_CPA_Max->GetValue().ToDouble(&g_CPAMax_NM);
7154 g_bCPAWarn = m_pCheck_CPA_Warn->GetValue();
7155 m_pText_CPA_Warn->GetValue().ToDouble(&g_CPAWarn_NM);
7156 g_bTCPA_Max = m_pCheck_CPA_WarnT->GetValue();
7157 m_pText_CPA_WarnT->GetValue().ToDouble(&g_TCPA_Max);
7158
7159 // Lost Targets
7160 g_bMarkLost = m_pCheck_Mark_Lost->GetValue();
7161 m_pText_Mark_Lost->GetValue().ToDouble(&g_MarkLost_Mins);
7162 g_bRemoveLost = m_pCheck_Remove_Lost->GetValue();
7163 m_pText_Remove_Lost->GetValue().ToDouble(&g_RemoveLost_Mins);
7164
7165 // Display
7166 g_bShowCOG = m_pCheck_Show_COG->GetValue();
7167 // If synchronized with own ship predictor
7168 g_bSyncCogPredictors = m_pCheck_Sync_OCOG_ACOG->GetValue();
7169 if (g_bSyncCogPredictors) {
7170 m_pText_COG_Predictor->SetValue(m_pText_OSCOG_Predictor->GetValue());
7171 }
7172 m_pText_COG_Predictor->GetValue().ToDouble(&g_ShowCOG_Mins);
7173
7174 g_bAISShowTracks = m_pCheck_Show_Tracks->GetValue();
7175 m_pText_Track_Length->GetValue().ToDouble(&g_AISShowTracks_Mins);
7176
7177 // Update all the current targets
7178 if (g_pAIS) {
7179 for (const auto& it : g_pAIS->GetTargetList()) {
7180 auto pAISTarget = it.second;
7181 if (NULL != pAISTarget) {
7182 pAISTarget->b_show_track = g_bAISShowTracks;
7183 // Check for exceptions in MMSI properties
7184 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < g_MMSI_Props_Array.GetCount(); i++) {
7185 if (pAISTarget->MMSI == g_MMSI_Props_Array[i]->MMSI) {
7186 MmsiProperties* props = g_MMSI_Props_Array[i];
7187 if (TRACKTYPE_NEVER == props->TrackType) {
7188 pAISTarget->b_show_track = false;
7189 break;
7190 } else if (TRACKTYPE_ALWAYS == props->TrackType) {
7191 pAISTarget->b_show_track = true;
7192 break;
7193 } else
7194 break;
7195 }
7196 }
7197 // Check for any persistently tracked target, force b_show_track ON
7198 std::map<int, Track*>::iterator it;
7199 it = g_pAIS->m_persistent_tracks.find(pAISTarget->MMSI);
7200 if (it != g_pAIS->m_persistent_tracks.end())
7201 pAISTarget->b_show_track = true;
7202 }
7203 }
7204 }
7205
7206 g_bHideMoored = m_pCheck_Hide_Moored->GetValue();
7207 m_pText_Moored_Speed->GetValue().ToDouble(&g_ShowMoored_Kts);
7208
7209 g_bDrawAISRealtime = m_pCheck_Draw_Realtime_Prediction->GetValue();
7210 m_pText_RealtPred_Speed->GetValue().ToDouble(&g_AIS_RealtPred_Kts);
7211
7212 g_bAllowShowScaled = m_pCheck_Scale_Priority->GetValue();
7213 long l;
7214 m_pText_Scale_Priority->GetValue().ToLong(&l);
7215 g_ShowScaled_Num = (int)l;
7216
7217 g_bShowAreaNotices = m_pCheck_Show_Area_Notices->GetValue();
7218 g_bDrawAISSize = m_pCheck_Draw_Target_Size->GetValue();
7219 g_bShowAISName = m_pCheck_Show_Target_Name->GetValue();
7220 long ais_name_scale = 5000;
7221 m_pText_Show_Target_Name_Scale->GetValue().ToLong(&ais_name_scale);
7222 g_Show_Target_Name_Scale = (int)wxMax(5000, ais_name_scale);
7223 g_bWplUsePosition = m_pCheck_use_Wpl->GetValue();
7224 g_WplAction = m_pWplAction->GetSelection();
7225
7226 // Alert
7227 g_bAIS_CPA_Alert = m_pCheck_AlertDialog->GetValue();
7228 g_bAIS_CPA_Alert_Audio = m_pCheck_AlertAudio->GetValue();
7229 g_bAIS_CPA_Alert_Suppress_Moored = m_pCheck_Alert_Moored->GetValue();
7230
7231 g_bAIS_ACK_Timeout = m_pCheck_Ack_Timout->GetValue();
7232 m_pText_ACK_Timeout->GetValue().ToDouble(&g_AckTimeout_Mins);
7233
7234 // Rollover
7235 g_bAISRolloverShowClass = m_pCheck_Rollover_Class->GetValue();
7236 g_bAISRolloverShowCOG = m_pCheck_Rollover_COG->GetValue();
7237 g_bAISRolloverShowCPA = m_pCheck_Rollover_CPA->GetValue();
7238
7239 g_chart_zoom_modifier_raster = m_pSlider_Zoom_Raster->GetValue();
7240 g_chart_zoom_modifier_vector = m_pSlider_Zoom_Vector->GetValue();
7241 g_cm93_zoom_factor = m_pSlider_CM93_Zoom->GetValue();
7242 g_GUIScaleFactor = m_pSlider_GUI_Factor->GetValue();
7243
7244 bool bchange_scale = false;
7245 if (g_ChartScaleFactor != m_pSlider_Chart_Factor->GetValue())
7246 bchange_scale = true;
7247 g_ChartScaleFactor = m_pSlider_Chart_Factor->GetValue();
7248
7249 g_ChartScaleFactorExp =
7250 g_Platform->GetChartScaleFactorExp(g_ChartScaleFactor);
7251 g_MarkScaleFactorExp = g_Platform->GetMarkScaleFactorExp(g_ChartScaleFactor);
7252 g_ShipScaleFactor = m_pSlider_Ship_Factor->GetValue();
7253 g_ShipScaleFactorExp = g_Platform->GetChartScaleFactorExp(g_ShipScaleFactor);
7254 g_ENCSoundingScaleFactor = m_pSlider_Text_Factor->GetValue();
7255 g_ENCTextScaleFactor = m_pSlider_ENCText_Factor->GetValue();
7256
7257 g_mouse_zoom_sensitivity_ui = m_pMouse_Zoom_Slider->GetValue();
7258 g_mouse_zoom_sensitivity =
7259 MouseZoom::ui_to_config(g_mouse_zoom_sensitivity_ui);
7260
7261 // Only reload the icons if user has actually visted the UI page
7262 if (m_bVisitLang) {
7263 if (pWayPointMan) WayPointmanGui(*pWayPointMan).ReloadRoutepointIcons();
7264 }
7265
7266 // FIXME Move these two
7267 // g_NMEAAPBPrecision = m_choicePrecision->GetCurrentSelection();
7268 // g_TalkerIdText = m_TalkerIdText->GetValue().MakeUpper();
7269
7270#ifdef ocpnUSE_GL
7271 if (g_bopengl != pOpenGL->GetValue()) m_returnChanges |= GL_CHANGED;
7272 g_bopengl = pOpenGL->GetValue();
7273#endif
7274
7275 g_bChartBarEx = pChartBarEX->GetValue();
7276
7277 // Handle Vector Charts Tab
7278 int depthUnit = pDepthUnitSelect->GetSelection();
7279 g_nDepthUnitDisplay = depthUnit;
7280
7281 // Process the UserStandard display list, noting if any changes were made
7282 bool bUserStdChange = false;
7283
7284 int nOBJL = ps57CtlListBox->GetCount();
7285
7286 for (int iPtr = 0; iPtr < nOBJL; iPtr++) {
7287 int itemIndex = -1;
7288 for (size_t i = 0; i < marinersStdXref.size(); i++) {
7289 if (marinersStdXref[i] == iPtr) {
7290 itemIndex = i;
7291 break;
7292 }
7293 }
7294 assert(itemIndex >= 0);
7295 OBJLElement* pOLE = (OBJLElement*)(ps52plib->pOBJLArray->Item(itemIndex));
7296 if (pOLE->nViz != (int)(ps57CtlListBox->IsChecked(iPtr)))
7297 bUserStdChange = true;
7298 pOLE->nViz = ps57CtlListBox->IsChecked(iPtr);
7299 }
7300
7301 if (ps52plib) {
7302 // Take a snapshot of the S52 config right now,
7303 // for later comparison
7304 ps52plib->GenerateStateHash();
7305 long stateHash = ps52plib->GetStateHash();
7306
7307 if (m_returnChanges & GL_CHANGED) {
7308 // Do this now to handle the screen refresh that is automatically
7309 // generated on Windows at closure of the options dialog...
7310 ps52plib->FlushSymbolCaches(ChartCtxFactory());
7311 // some CNSY depends on renderer (e.g. CARC)
7312 ps52plib->ClearCNSYLUPArray();
7313 ps52plib->GenerateStateHash();
7314 }
7315
7316 if (pDispCat) {
7317 enum _DisCat nset = OTHER;
7318 switch (pDispCat->GetSelection()) {
7319 case 0:
7320 nset = DISPLAYBASE;
7321 break;
7322 case 1:
7323 nset = STANDARD;
7324 break;
7325 case 2:
7326 nset = OTHER;
7327 break;
7328 case 3:
7329 nset = MARINERS_STANDARD;
7330 break;
7331 }
7332 ps52plib->SetDisplayCategory(nset);
7333 }
7334
7335 if (pCheck_SOUNDG) ps52plib->m_bShowSoundg = pCheck_SOUNDG->GetValue();
7336 if (pCheck_ATONTEXT)
7337 ps52plib->m_bShowAtonText = pCheck_ATONTEXT->GetValue();
7338 if (pCheck_LDISTEXT)
7339 ps52plib->m_bShowLdisText = pCheck_LDISTEXT->GetValue();
7340 if (pCheck_XLSECTTEXT)
7341 ps52plib->m_bExtendLightSectors = pCheck_XLSECTTEXT->GetValue();
7342
7343 ps52plib->m_bShowMeta = pCheck_META->GetValue();
7344 ps52plib->m_bDeClutterText = pCheck_DECLTEXT->GetValue();
7345 ps52plib->m_bShowNationalTexts = pCheck_NATIONALTEXT->GetValue();
7346 ps52plib->m_bShowS57ImportantTextOnly = pCheck_SHOWIMPTEXT->GetValue();
7347 ps52plib->m_bUseSCAMIN = pCheck_SCAMIN->GetValue();
7348 ps52plib->m_bUseSUPER_SCAMIN = pCheck_SuperSCAMIN->GetValue();
7349
7350 ps52plib->m_nSymbolStyle =
7351 pPointStyle->GetSelection() == 0 ? PAPER_CHART : SIMPLIFIED;
7352
7353 ps52plib->m_nBoundaryStyle = pBoundStyle->GetSelection() == 0
7354 ? PLAIN_BOUNDARIES
7355 : SYMBOLIZED_BOUNDARIES;
7356 ps52plib->m_nSoundingFactor = m_pSlider_Text_Factor->GetValue();
7357 ps52plib->m_nTextFactor = m_pSlider_ENCText_Factor->GetValue();
7358
7359 S52_setMarinerParam(S52_MAR_TWO_SHADES,
7360 (p24Color->GetSelection() == 0) ? 1.0 : 0.0);
7361
7362 // Depths
7363 double dval;
7364 float conv = 1;
7365
7366 if (depthUnit == 0) // feet
7367 conv = 0.3048f; // international definiton of 1 foot is 0.3048 metres
7368 else if (depthUnit == 2) // fathoms
7369 conv = 0.3048f * 6; // 1 fathom is 6 feet
7370
7371 if (m_SafetyCtl->GetValue().ToDouble(&dval)) {
7372 S52_setMarinerParam(S52_MAR_SAFETY_DEPTH,
7373 dval * conv); // controls sounding display
7374 S52_setMarinerParam(S52_MAR_SAFETY_CONTOUR,
7375 dval * conv); // controls colour
7376 }
7377
7378 if (m_ShallowCtl->GetValue().ToDouble(&dval))
7379 S52_setMarinerParam(S52_MAR_SHALLOW_CONTOUR, dval * conv);
7380
7381 if (m_DeepCtl->GetValue().ToDouble(&dval))
7382 S52_setMarinerParam(S52_MAR_DEEP_CONTOUR, dval * conv);
7383
7384 ps52plib->UpdateMarinerParams();
7385 ps52plib->m_nDepthUnitDisplay = depthUnit;
7386
7387 ps52plib->GenerateStateHash();
7388
7389 // Detect a change to S52 library config
7390 if ((stateHash != ps52plib->GetStateHash()) || bUserStdChange)
7391 m_returnChanges |= S52_CHANGED;
7392
7393 if (bchange_scale) m_returnChanges |= S52_CHANGED;
7394 }
7395
7396// User Interface Panel
7397#if wxUSE_XLOCALE || !wxCHECK_VERSION(3, 0, 0)
7398 if (m_bVisitLang) {
7399 wxString new_canon = _T("en_US");
7400 wxString lang_sel = m_itemLangListBox->GetStringSelection();
7401
7402 int nLang = sizeof(lang_list) / sizeof(int);
7403 for (int it = 0; it < nLang; it++) {
7404 const wxLanguageInfo* pli = wxLocale::GetLanguageInfo(lang_list[it]);
7405 if (pli) {
7406 wxString lang_canonical = pli->CanonicalName;
7407 wxString test_string = GetOCPNKnownLanguage(lang_canonical);
7408 if (lang_sel == test_string) {
7409 new_canon = lang_canonical;
7410 break;
7411 }
7412 }
7413 }
7414
7415 wxString locale_old = g_locale;
7416 g_locale = new_canon;
7417
7418 if (g_locale != locale_old) m_returnChanges |= LOCALE_CHANGED;
7419
7420 wxString oldStyle = g_StyleManager->GetCurrentStyle()->name;
7421 // g_StyleManager->SetStyleNextInvocation(
7422 // m_itemStyleListBox->GetStringSelection());
7423 if (g_StyleManager->GetStyleNextInvocation() != oldStyle) {
7424 m_returnChanges |= STYLE_CHANGED;
7425 }
7426 wxSizeEvent nullEvent;
7427 gFrame->OnSize(nullEvent);
7428 }
7429#endif
7430 if (g_bInlandEcdis != pInlandEcdis->GetValue()) { // InlandEcdis changed
7431 g_bInlandEcdis = pInlandEcdis->GetValue();
7432 SwitchInlandEcdisMode(g_bInlandEcdis);
7433 m_returnChanges |= TOOLBAR_CHANGED;
7434 }
7435 // PlugIn Manager Panel
7436
7437 // Pick up any changes to selections
7438 if (PluginLoader::getInstance()->UpdatePlugIns())
7439 m_returnChanges |= TOOLBAR_CHANGED;
7440
7441 // And keep config in sync
7442 // if (m_pPlugInCtrl) m_pPlugInCtrl->UpdatePluginsOrder(); FIXME(leamas)
7443 g_pi_manager->UpdateConfig();
7444
7445 // PlugIns may have added panels
7446 if (g_pi_manager) g_pi_manager->CloseAllPlugInPanels((int)wxOK);
7447
7448 m_returnChanges |= GENERIC_CHANGED | k_vectorcharts | k_charts |
7449 m_groups_changed | k_plugins | k_tides;
7450
7451 // Pick up all the entries in the Tide/current DataSelected control
7452 // and update the global static array
7453 TideCurrentDataSet.clear();
7454 int nEntry = tcDataSelected->GetItemCount();
7455 for (int i = 0; i < nEntry; i++) {
7456 wxString setName = tcDataSelected->GetItemText(i);
7457 TideCurrentDataSet.push_back(setName.ToStdString());
7458 }
7459
7460 if (g_canvasConfig != m_screenConfig) m_returnChanges |= CONFIG_CHANGED;
7461 g_canvasConfig = m_screenConfig;
7462
7463 // if (event.GetId() == ID_APPLY)
7464 {
7465 gFrame->ProcessOptionsDialog(m_returnChanges, m_pWorkDirList);
7466 m_CurrentDirList =
7467 *m_pWorkDirList; // Perform a deep copy back to main database.
7468
7469 // We can clear a few flag bits on "Apply", so they won't be recognised at
7470 // the "Close" click. Their actions have already been accomplished once...
7471 // m_returnChanges &= ~(CHANGE_CHARTS | FORCE_UPDATE | SCAN_UPDATE);
7472 // k_charts = 0;
7473
7474 gFrame->RefreshAllCanvas();
7475 }
7476
7477 // Some layout changes requiring a new options instance?
7478 if (m_bneedNew) m_returnChanges |= NEED_NEW_OPTIONS;
7479
7480 // Record notice of any changes to last applied template
7481 UpdateTemplateTitleText();
7482
7483 if (::wxIsBusy()) // FIXME: Not sure why this is needed here
7484 ::wxEndBusyCursor();
7485}
7486
7487void options::OnXidOkClick(wxCommandEvent& event) {
7488 // When closing the form with Ctrl-Enter sometimes we get double events, the
7489 // second is empty??
7490 if (event.GetEventObject() == NULL) return;
7491
7492 ApplyChanges(event);
7493
7494 // Complete processing
7495 gFrame->PrepareOptionsClose(this, m_returnChanges);
7496
7497 // If we had a config change, then do it now
7498 if ((m_returnChanges & CONFIG_CHANGED))
7499 gFrame->ScheduleReconfigAndSettingsReload(false, false);
7500
7501 // Special case for "Dialog" font edit
7502 if ((m_returnChanges & FONT_CHANGED) &&
7503 !(m_returnChanges & FONT_CHANGED_SAFE))
7504 gFrame->ScheduleDeleteSettingsDialog();
7505
7506 Finish();
7507 Hide();
7508}
7509
7510void options::Finish(void) {
7511 // Required to avoid intermittent crash on wxGTK
7512 m_pListbook->ChangeSelection(0);
7513 for (size_t i = 0; i < m_pListbook->GetPageCount(); i++) {
7514 wxNotebookPage* pg = m_pListbook->GetPage(i);
7515 wxNotebook* nb = dynamic_cast<wxNotebook*>(pg);
7516 if (nb) nb->ChangeSelection(0);
7517 }
7518
7519 lastWindowPos = GetPosition();
7520 lastWindowSize = GetSize();
7521
7522 pConfig->SetPath("/Settings");
