7523 pConfig->Write("OptionsSizeX", lastWindowSize.x);
7524 pConfig->Write("OptionsSizeY", lastWindowSize.y);
7525}
7526
7527ArrayOfCDI options::GetSelectedChartDirs() {
7528 ArrayOfCDI rv;
7529 for (size_t i = 0; i < panelVector.size(); i++) {
7530 if (panelVector[i]->IsSelected()) {
7531 rv.Add(panelVector[i]->GetCDI());
7532 }
7533 }
7534
7535 return rv;
7536}
7537
7538ArrayOfCDI options::GetUnSelectedChartDirs() {
7539 ArrayOfCDI rv;
7540 for (size_t i = 0; i < panelVector.size(); i++) {
7541 if (!panelVector[i]->IsSelected()) {
7542 rv.Add(panelVector[i]->GetCDI());
7543 }
7544 }
7545
7546 return rv;
7547}
7548
7549void options::SetDirActionButtons() {
7550 ArrayOfCDI selArray = GetSelectedChartDirs();
7551 if (selArray.GetCount())
7552 m_removeBtn->Enable();
7553 else
7554 m_removeBtn->Disable();
7555}
7556
7557void options::OnButtondeleteClick(wxCommandEvent& event) {
7558 ArrayOfCDI unselArray = GetUnSelectedChartDirs();
7559 ActiveChartArray.Clear();
7560 for (size_t i = 0; i < unselArray.GetCount(); i++) {
7561 ActiveChartArray.Add(unselArray[i]);
7562 }
7563
7564 UpdateChartDirList();
7565
7566 UpdateWorkArrayFromDisplayPanel();
7567
7568#if 0
7569 if (m_pWorkDirList) {
7570 pActiveChartsList->DeleteAllItems();
7571 for (size_t id = 0; id < m_pWorkDirList->GetCount(); id++) {
7572 wxString dirname = m_pWorkDirList->Item(id).fullpath;
7573 wxListItem li;
7574 li.SetId(id);
7575 li.SetAlign(wxLIST_FORMAT_LEFT);
7576 li.SetText(dirname);
7577 li.SetColumn(0);
7578 long idx = pActiveChartsList->InsertItem(li);
7579 }
7580 }
7581#endif
7582
7583 k_charts |= CHANGE_CHARTS;
7584
7585 pScanCheckBox->Disable();
7586
7587 event.Skip();
7588}
7589
7590void options::OnButtonParseENC(wxCommandEvent& event) {
7591 gFrame->GetPrimaryCanvas()->EnablePaint(false);
7592
7593 extern void ParseAllENC(wxWindow * parent);
7594
7595 ParseAllENC(g_pOptions);
7596
7597 ViewPort vp;
7598 gFrame->ChartsRefresh();
7599
7600 gFrame->GetPrimaryCanvas()->EnablePaint(true);
7601}
7602
7603#ifdef OCPN_USE_LZMA
7604#include <lzma.h>
7605
7606static bool compress(lzma_stream* strm, FILE* infile, FILE* outfile) {
7607 // This will be LZMA_RUN until the end of the input file is reached.
7608 // This tells lzma_code() when there will be no more input.
7609 lzma_action action = LZMA_RUN;
7610
7611 // Buffers to temporarily hold uncompressed input
7612 // and compressed output.
7613 uint8_t inbuf[BUFSIZ];
7614 uint8_t outbuf[BUFSIZ];
7615
7616 // Initialize the input and output pointers. Initializing next_in
7617 // and avail_in isn't really necessary when we are going to encode
7618 // just one file since LZMA_STREAM_INIT takes care of initializing
7619 // those already. But it doesn't hurt much and it will be needed
7620 // if encoding more than one file like we will in 02_decompress.c.
7621 //
7622 // While we don't care about strm->total_in or strm->total_out in this
7623 // example, it is worth noting that initializing the encoder will
7624 // always reset total_in and total_out to zero. But the encoder
7625 // initialization doesn't touch next_in, avail_in, next_out, or
7626 // avail_out.
7627 strm->next_in = NULL;
7628 strm->avail_in = 0;
7629 strm->next_out = outbuf;
7630 strm->avail_out = sizeof(outbuf);
7631
7632 // Loop until the file has been successfully compressed or until
7633 // an error occurs.
7634 while (true) {
7635 // Fill the input buffer if it is empty.
7636 if (strm->avail_in == 0 && !feof(infile)) {
7637 strm->next_in = inbuf;
7638 strm->avail_in = fread(inbuf, 1, sizeof(inbuf), infile);
7639
7640 if (ferror(infile)) {
7641 fprintf(stderr, "Read error: %s\n", strerror(errno));
7642 return false;
7643 }
7644
7645 // Once the end of the input file has been reached,
7646 // we need to tell lzma_code() that no more input
7647 // will be coming and that it should finish the
7648 // encoding.
7649 if (feof(infile)) action = LZMA_FINISH;
7650 }
7651
7652 // Tell liblzma do the actual encoding.
7653 //
7654 // This reads up to strm->avail_in bytes of input starting
7655 // from strm->next_in. avail_in will be decremented and
7656 // next_in incremented by an equal amount to match the
7657 // number of input bytes consumed.
7658 //
7659 // Up to strm->avail_out bytes of compressed output will be
7660 // written starting from strm->next_out. avail_out and next_out
7661 // will be incremented by an equal amount to match the number
7662 // of output bytes written.
7663 //
7664 // The encoder has to do internal buffering, which means that
7665 // it may take quite a bit of input before the same data is
7666 // available in compressed form in the output buffer.
7667 lzma_ret ret = lzma_code(strm, action);
7668
7669 // If the output buffer is full or if the compression finished
7670 // successfully, write the data from the output bufffer to
7671 // the output file.
7672 if (strm->avail_out == 0 || ret == LZMA_STREAM_END) {
7673 // When lzma_code() has returned LZMA_STREAM_END,
7674 // the output buffer is likely to be only partially
7675 // full. Calculate how much new data there is to
7676 // be written to the output file.
7677 size_t write_size = sizeof(outbuf) - strm->avail_out;
7678
7679 if (fwrite(outbuf, 1, write_size, outfile) != write_size) {
7680 fprintf(stderr, "Write error: %s\n", strerror(errno));
7681 return false;
7682 }
7683
7684 // Reset next_out and avail_out.
7685 strm->next_out = outbuf;
7686 strm->avail_out = sizeof(outbuf);
7687 }
7688
7689 // Normally the return value of lzma_code() will be LZMA_OK
7690 // until everything has been encoded.
7691 if (ret != LZMA_OK) {
7692 // Once everything has been encoded successfully, the
7693 // return value of lzma_code() will be LZMA_STREAM_END.
7694 //
7695 // It is important to check for LZMA_STREAM_END. Do not
7696 // assume that getting ret != LZMA_OK would mean that
7697 // everything has gone well.
7698 if (ret == LZMA_STREAM_END) return true;
7699
7700 // It's not LZMA_OK nor LZMA_STREAM_END,
7701 // so it must be an error code. See lzma/base.h
7702 // (src/liblzma/api/lzma/base.h in the source package
7703 // or e.g. /usr/include/lzma/base.h depending on the
7704 // install prefix) for the list and documentation of
7705 // possible values. Most values listen in lzma_ret
7706 // enumeration aren't possible in this example.
7707 const char* msg;
7708 switch (ret) {
7709 case LZMA_MEM_ERROR:
7710 msg = "Memory allocation failed";
7711 break;
7712
7713 case LZMA_DATA_ERROR:
7714 // This error is returned if the compressed
7715 // or uncompressed size get near 8 EiB
7716 // (2^63 bytes) because that's where the .xz
7717 // file format size limits currently are.
7718 // That is, the possibility of this error
7719 // is mostly theoretical unless you are doing
7720 // something very unusual.
7721 //
7722 // Note that strm->total_in and strm->total_out
7723 // have nothing to do with this error. Changing
7724 // those variables won't increase or decrease
7725 // the chance of getting this error.
7726 msg = "File size limits exceeded";
7727 break;
7728
7729 default:
7730 // This is most likely LZMA_PROG_ERROR, but
7731 // if this program is buggy (or liblzma has
7732 // a bug), it may be e.g. LZMA_BUF_ERROR or
7733 // LZMA_OPTIONS_ERROR too.
7734 //
7735 // It is inconvenient to have a separate
7736 // error message for errors that should be
7737 // impossible to occur, but knowing the error
7738 // code is important for debugging. That's why
7739 // it is good to print the error code at least
7740 // when there is no good error message to show.
7741 msg = "Unknown error, possibly a bug";
7742 break;
7743 }
7744
7745 wxLogMessage(_T("LZMA Encoder error: %s (error code %u)\n"), msg, ret);
7746 return false;
7747 }
7748 }
7749}
7750#endif
7751
7752static bool CompressChart(wxString in, wxString out) {
7753#ifdef OCPN_USE_LZMA
7754 FILE* infile = fopen(in.mb_str(), "rb");
7755 if (!infile) return false;
7756
7757 FILE* outfile = fopen(out.mb_str(), "wb");
7758 if (!outfile) {
7759 fclose(infile);
7760 return false;
7761 }
7762
7763 lzma_stream strm = LZMA_STREAM_INIT;
7764 bool success = false;
7765 if (lzma_easy_encoder(&strm, LZMA_PRESET_DEFAULT, LZMA_CHECK_CRC64) ==
7766 LZMA_OK)
7767 success = compress(&strm, infile, outfile);
7768
7769 lzma_end(&strm);
7770 fclose(infile);
7771 fclose(outfile);
7772
7773 return success;
7774#endif
7775 return false;
7776}
7777
7778void options::OnButtonmigrateClick(wxCommandEvent& event) {
7779#ifdef __ANDROID__
7780
7781 // Run the chart migration assistant
7782 g_migrateDialog =
7783 new MigrateAssistantDialog(gFrame, true); // skip Folder scan
7784 g_migrateDialog->SetSize(gFrame->GetSize());
7785 g_migrateDialog->Centre();
7786 g_migrateDialog->Raise();
7787 g_migrateDialog->ShowModal();
7788#endif
7789}
7790
7791void options::OnButtonEcdisHelp(wxCommandEvent& event) {
7792 wxString testFile = "/doc/iECDIS/index.html";
7793
7794 if (!::wxFileExists(testFile)) {
7795 wxString msg = _("The Inland ECDIS Manual is not available locally.");
7796 msg += "\n";
7797 msg +=
7798 _("Would you like to visit the iECDIS Manual website for more "
7799 "information?");
7800
7801 if (wxID_YES == OCPNMessageBox(NULL, msg, _("Inland ECDIS Manual"),
7802 wxYES_NO | wxCENTER, 60)) {
7803 wxLaunchDefaultBrowser("https://opencpn-manuals.github.io/inland-ecdis");
7804 }
7805 } else {
7806#ifdef __WXMSW__
7807 wxLaunchDefaultBrowser("file:///" + *GetpSharedDataLocation() + testFile);
7808#else
7809 wxLaunchDefaultBrowser("file://" + *GetpSharedDataLocation() + testFile);
7810#endif
7811 }
7812}
7813
7814void options::OnButtoncompressClick(wxCommandEvent& event) {
7815#if 0
7816 wxArrayInt pListBoxSelections;
7817 long item = -1;
7818 for (;;) {
7819 item = pActiveChartsList->GetNextItem(item, wxLIST_NEXT_ALL,
7820 wxLIST_STATE_SELECTED);
7821 if (item == -1) break;
7822 //pListBoxSelections.Add((int)item);
7823 item = -1; // Restart
7824 }
7825
7826 if (OCPNMessageBox(this, _("Compression will alter chart files on disk.\n\
7827This may make them incompatible with other programs or older versions of OpenCPN.\n\
7828Compressed charts may take slightly longer to load and display on some systems.\n\
7829They can be decompressed again using unxz or 7 zip programs."),
7830 _("OpenCPN Warning"),
7831 wxYES | wxCANCEL | wxCANCEL_DEFAULT | wxICON_WARNING) !=
7832 wxID_YES)
7833 return;
7834
7835 wxArrayString filespecs;
7836 filespecs.Add("*.kap");
7837 filespecs.Add("*.KAP");
7838 filespecs.Add("*.000");
7839
7840 // should we verify we are in a cm93 directory for these?
7841 filespecs.Add("*.A"), filespecs.Add("*.B"), filespecs.Add("*.C"),
7842 filespecs.Add("*.D");
7843 filespecs.Add("*.E"), filespecs.Add("*.F"), filespecs.Add("*.G"),
7844 filespecs.Add("*.Z");
7845
7846 wxGenericProgressDialog prog1(
7847 _("OpenCPN Compress Charts"), wxEmptyString,
7848 filespecs.GetCount() * pListBoxSelections.GetCount() + 1, this,
7849 wxPD_SMOOTH | wxPD_ELAPSED_TIME | wxPD_ESTIMATED_TIME |
7850 wxPD_REMAINING_TIME | wxPD_CAN_SKIP);
7851
7852 // Make sure the dialog is big enough to be readable
7853 wxSize sz = prog1.GetSize();
7854 sz.x = gFrame->GetClientSize().x * 8 / 10;
7855 prog1.SetSize(sz);
7856
7857 wxArrayString charts;
7858 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < pListBoxSelections.GetCount(); i++) {
7859 wxString dirname = pActiveChartsList->GetItemText(pListBoxSelections[i]);
7860 if (dirname.IsEmpty()) continue;
7861 // This is a fix for OSX, which appends EOL to results of
7862 // GetLineText()
7863 while ((dirname.Last() == wxChar(_T('\n'))) ||
7864 (dirname.Last() == wxChar(_T('\r'))))
7865 dirname.RemoveLast();
7866
7867 if (!wxDir::Exists(dirname)) continue;
7868
7869 wxDir dir(dirname);
7870 wxArrayString FileList;
7871 for (unsigned int j = 0; j < filespecs.GetCount(); j++) {
7872 dir.GetAllFiles(dirname, &FileList, filespecs[j]);
7873 bool skip = false;
7874 prog1.Update(i * filespecs.GetCount() + j, dirname + filespecs[j], &skip);
7875 if (skip) return;
7876 }
7877
7878 for (unsigned int j = 0; j < FileList.GetCount(); j++)
7879 charts.Add(FileList[j]);
7880 }
7881 prog1.Hide();
7882
7883 if (charts.GetCount() == 0) {
7884 OCPNMessageBox(this, _("No charts found to compress."), _("OpenCPN Info"));
7885 return;
7886 }
7887
7888 // TODO: make this use threads
7889 unsigned long total_size = 0, total_compressed_size = 0, count = 0;
7890 wxGenericProgressDialog prog(
7891 _("OpenCPN Compress Charts"), wxEmptyString, charts.GetCount() + 1, this,
7892 wxPD_SMOOTH | wxPD_ELAPSED_TIME | wxPD_ESTIMATED_TIME |
7893 wxPD_REMAINING_TIME | wxPD_CAN_SKIP);
7894
7895 prog.SetSize(sz);
7896
7897 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < charts.GetCount(); i++) {
7898 bool skip = false;
7899 prog.Update(i, charts[i], &skip);
7900 if (skip) break;
7901
7902 wxString compchart = charts[i] + _T(".xz");
7903 if (CompressChart(charts[i], compchart)) {
7904 total_size += wxFileName::GetSize(charts[i]).ToULong();
7905 total_compressed_size += wxFileName::GetSize(compchart).ToULong();
7906 wxRemoveFile(charts[i]);
7907 count++;
7908 }
7909 }
7910
7911 // report statistics
7912 double total_size_mb = total_size / 1024.0 / 1024.0;
7913 double total_compressed_size_mb = total_compressed_size / 1024.0 / 1024.0;
7914 OCPNMessageBox(
7915 this,
7916 wxString::Format(_("compressed %ld charts\nfrom %.1fMB to %.1fMB\nsaved "
7917 "%.1fMB (%.1f%%)"),
7918 count, total_size_mb, total_compressed_size_mb,
7919 total_size_mb - total_compressed_size_mb,
7920 (1 - total_compressed_size_mb / total_size_mb) * 100.0),
7921 _("OpenCPN Info"));
7922
7923 UpdateWorkArrayFromTextCtl();
7924
7925 if (m_pWorkDirList) {
7926 pActiveChartsList->DeleteAllItems();
7927 for (size_t id = 0; id < m_pWorkDirList->GetCount(); id++) {
7928 wxString dirname = m_pWorkDirList->Item(id).fullpath;
7929 wxListItem li;
7930 li.SetId(id);
7931 li.SetAlign(wxLIST_FORMAT_LEFT);
7932 li.SetText(dirname);
7933 li.SetColumn(0);
7934 long idx = pActiveChartsList->InsertItem(li);
7935 }
7936 }
7937
7938 k_charts |= CHANGE_CHARTS;
7939
7940 pScanCheckBox->Disable();
7941
7942 event.Skip();
7943#endif
7944}
7945
7946void options::OnDebugcheckbox1Click(wxCommandEvent& event) { event.Skip(); }
7947
7948void options::OnCancelClick(wxCommandEvent& event) {
7949 m_pListbook->ChangeSelection(0);
7950 comm_dialog->CancelSettings();
7951
7952 lastWindowPos = GetPosition();
7953 lastWindowSize = GetSize();
7954
7955 if (g_pi_manager) g_pi_manager->CloseAllPlugInPanels((int)wxCANCEL);
7956
7957 pConfig->SetPath("/Settings");
7958 pConfig->Write("OptionsSizeX", lastWindowSize.x);
7959 pConfig->Write("OptionsSizeY", lastWindowSize.y);
7960
7961 Hide();
7962}
7963
7964void options::OnClose(wxCloseEvent& event) {
7965 // PlugIns may have added panels
7966 if (g_pi_manager) g_pi_manager->CloseAllPlugInPanels((int)wxOK);
7967
7968 m_pListbook->ChangeSelection(0);
7969
7970 lastWindowPos = GetPosition();
7971 lastWindowSize = GetSize();
7972
7973 pConfig->SetPath("/Settings");
7974 pConfig->Write("OptionsSizeX", lastWindowSize.x);
7975 pConfig->Write("OptionsSizeY", lastWindowSize.y);
7976
7977 gFrame->PrepareOptionsClose(this, m_returnChanges);
7978 Hide();
7979}
7980
7981void options::OnFontChoice(wxCommandEvent& event) {
7982 wxString sel_text_element = m_itemFontElementListBox->GetStringSelection();
7983 m_font_element_array.Add(sel_text_element);
7984
7985 wxFont* pif = FontMgr::Get().GetFont(sel_text_element);
7986 wxColour init_color = FontMgr::Get().GetFontColor(sel_text_element);
7987
7988 m_textSample->SetFont(*pif);
7989 m_textSample->SetForegroundColour(init_color);
7990 m_itemBoxSizerFontPanel->Layout();
7991 event.Skip();
7992}
7993
7994void options::OnChooseFont(wxCommandEvent& event) {
7995#ifdef __ANDROID__
7996 androidDisableRotation();
7997#endif
7998
7999 wxString sel_text_element = m_itemFontElementListBox->GetStringSelection();
8000 m_font_element_array.Add(sel_text_element);
8001 wxFontData font_data;
8002
8003 wxFont* pif = FontMgr::Get().GetFont(sel_text_element);
8004 wxColour init_color = FontMgr::Get().GetFontColor(sel_text_element);
8005
8006 wxFontData init_font_data;
8007 if (pif) init_font_data.SetInitialFont(*pif);
8008 init_font_data.SetColour(init_color);
8009
8010#ifdef __WXGTK__
8011 if (g_Platform->getDisplaySize().y < 800) {
8012 ocpnGenericFontDialog dg(this, init_font_data);
8013 wxFont* qFont = dialogFont;
8014 dg.SetFont(*qFont);
8015
8016 int retval = dg.ShowModal();
8017 if (wxID_CANCEL != retval) {
8018 font_data = dg.GetFontData();
8019 wxFont font = font_data.GetChosenFont();
8020 wxFont* psfont = new wxFont(font);
8021 wxColor color = font_data.GetColour();
8022 FontMgr::Get().SetFont(sel_text_element, psfont, color);
8023 gFrame->UpdateAllFonts();
8024 m_bfontChanged = true;
8025 OnFontChoice(event);
8026 }
8027 } else
8028#endif
8029 {
8030#ifdef __WXGTK__
8031 wxFontDialog dg(this, init_font_data);
8032#else
8033 wxFontDialog dg(pParent, init_font_data);
8034#endif
8035
8036 wxFont* qFont = dialogFont;
8037 dg.SetFont(*qFont);
8038
8039#ifdef __WXQT__
8040 // Make sure that font dialog will fit on the screen without scrolling
8041 // We do this by setting the dialog font size "small enough" to show "n"
8042 // lines
8043 wxSize proposed_size = GetSize();
8044 float n_lines = 30;
8045 float font_size = dialogFont->GetPointSize();
8046
8047 if ((proposed_size.y / font_size) < n_lines) {
8048 float new_font_size = proposed_size.y / n_lines;
8049 wxFont* smallFont = new wxFont(*dialogFont);
8050 smallFont->SetPointSize(new_font_size);
8051 dg.SetFont(*smallFont);
8052 }
8053#endif
8054
8055 if (g_bresponsive) {
8056 dg.SetSize(GetSize());
8057 dg.Centre();
8058 }
8059
8060 int retval = dg.ShowModal();
8061 if (wxID_CANCEL != retval) {
8062 font_data = dg.GetFontData();
8063 wxFont font = font_data.GetChosenFont();
8064 wxFont* psfont = new wxFont(font);
8065 wxColor color = font_data.GetColour();
8066 FontMgr::Get().SetFont(sel_text_element, psfont, color);
8067 gFrame->UpdateAllFonts();
8068 m_bfontChanged = true;
8069 OnFontChoice(event);
8070 }
8071 }
8072
8073#ifdef __ANDROID__
8074 androidEnableRotation();
8075#endif
8076
8077 event.Skip();
8078}
8079
8080#if defined(__WXGTK__) || defined(__WXQT__)
8081void options::OnChooseFontColor(wxCommandEvent& event) {
8082 wxString sel_text_element = m_itemFontElementListBox->GetStringSelection();
8083 m_font_element_array.Add(sel_text_element);
8084
8085 wxColourData colour_data;
8086
8087 wxFont* pif = FontMgr::Get().GetFont(sel_text_element);
8088 wxColour init_color = FontMgr::Get().GetFontColor(sel_text_element);
8089
8090#ifdef __ANDROID__
8091 androidDisableRotation();
8092
8093 unsigned int cco = 0;
8094 cco |= 0xff;
8095 cco = cco << 8;
8096 cco |= init_color.Red();
8097 cco = cco << 8;
8098 cco |= init_color.Green();
8099 cco = cco << 8;
8100 cco |= init_color.Blue();
8101 unsigned int cc = androidColorPicker(cco);
8102
8103 wxColor cn;
8104 unsigned char blue = (unsigned char)cc % 256;
8105 unsigned char green = (unsigned char)(cc >> 8) % 256;
8106 ;
8107 unsigned char red = (unsigned char)(cc >> 16) % 256;
8108 cn.Set(red, green, blue);
8109
8110 FontMgr::Get().SetFont(sel_text_element, pif, cn);
8111
8112 gFrame->UpdateAllFonts();
8113 m_bfontChanged = true;
8114
8115 androidEnableRotation();
8116#else
8117 wxScrolledWindow* sw =
8118 new wxScrolledWindow(this, wxID_ANY, wxDefaultPosition, wxSize(400, 400));
8119
8120 wxColourData init_colour_data;
8121 init_colour_data.SetColour(init_color);
8122
8123 wxColourDialog dg(sw, &init_colour_data);
8124
8125 int retval = dg.ShowModal();
8126 if (wxID_CANCEL != retval) {
8127 colour_data = dg.GetColourData();
8128
8129 wxColor color = colour_data.GetColour();
8130 FontMgr::Get().SetFont(sel_text_element, pif, color);
8131
8132 gFrame->UpdateAllFonts();
8133 m_bfontChanged = true;
8134 OnFontChoice(event);
8135 }
8136
8137 sw->Destroy();
8138#endif
8139 event.Skip();
8140}
8141#endif
8142
8143void options::OnChartsPageChange(wxListbookEvent& event) {
8144 unsigned int i = event.GetSelection();
8145
8146 UpdateChartDirList();
8147
8148 // User selected Chart Groups Page?
8149 // If so, build the remaining UI elements
8150 if (2 == i) { // 2 is the index of "Chart Groups" page
8151 if (!groupsPanel->m_UIcomplete) groupsPanel->CompletePanel();
8152
8153 // Make sure any recently added chart dirs appear in the
8154 // Groups panel, making them available for addition to groups.
8155 UpdateWorkArrayFromDisplayPanel();
8156 groupsPanel->SetDBDirs(*m_pWorkDirList); // update the Groups tab
8157 groupsPanel->m_treespopulated = FALSE;
8158
8159 if (!groupsPanel->m_settingscomplete) {
8160 ::wxBeginBusyCursor();
8161 groupsPanel->CompleteInitialSettings();
8162 ::wxEndBusyCursor();
8163 } else if (!groupsPanel->m_treespopulated) {
8164 groupsPanel->PopulateTrees();
8165 groupsPanel->m_treespopulated = TRUE;
8166 }
8167 } else if (1 == i) { // Vector charts panel
8168 LoadS57();
8169 if (!m_bVectorInit) {
8170 SetInitialVectorSettings();
8171 UpdateOptionsUnits(); // sets depth values, overriding defaults
8172 }
8173 }
8174
8175 event.Skip(); // Allow continued event processing
8176}
8177
8178void options::OnPageChange(wxListbookEvent& event) {
8179 DoOnPageChange(event.GetSelection());
8180}
8181
8182void options::OnSubNBPageChange(wxNotebookEvent& event) {
8183 // In the case where wxNotebooks are nested, we need to identify the subpage
8184 // But otherwise do nothing
8185 if (event.GetEventObject()) {
8186 if (dynamic_cast<wxWindow*>(event.GetEventObject())) {
8187 wxWindow* win = dynamic_cast<wxWindow*>(event.GetEventObject());
8188 wxWindow* parent = dynamic_cast<wxWindow*>(win->GetParent());
8189 if (dynamic_cast<wxNotebook*>(parent)) {
8190 lastSubPage = event.GetSelection();
8191 return;
8192 }
8193 if (dynamic_cast<wxListbook*>(parent)) {
8194 lastSubPage = event.GetSelection();
8195 return;
8196 }
8197 }
8198 }
8199}
8200
8201void options::OnTopNBPageChange(wxNotebookEvent& event) {
8202 DoOnPageChange(event.GetSelection());
8203}
8204
8205void options::DoOnPageChange(size_t page) {
8206 unsigned int i = page;
8207
8208 // Sometimes there is a (-1) page selected.
8209 if (page > 10) return;
8210
8211 lastSubPage = 0; // Reset sub-page
8212
8213 lastPage = i;
8214
8215#ifndef __ANDROID__
8216 if (0 == i) { // Display
8217 if (m_sconfigSelect_single) m_sconfigSelect_single->Refresh(true);
8218 if (m_sconfigSelect_twovertical) m_sconfigSelect_twovertical->Refresh(true);
8219 }
8220#endif
8221 // User selected Chart Page?
8222 // If so, build the "Charts" page variants
8223 if (1 == i) { // 2 is the index of "Charts" page
8224 k_charts = VISIT_CHARTS;
8225 UpdateChartDirList();
8226 }
8227
8228 else if (m_pageUI == i) { // 5 is the index of "User Interface" page
8229 if (!m_itemLangListBox) return;
8230#if wxUSE_XLOCALE || !wxCHECK_VERSION(3, 0, 0)
8231
8232 if (!m_bVisitLang) {
8233 ::wxBeginBusyCursor();
8234
8235 int current_language = plocale_def_lang->GetLanguage();
8236 wxString current_sel = wxLocale::GetLanguageName(current_language);
8237
8238 current_sel = GetOCPNKnownLanguage(g_locale);
8239
8240 int nLang = sizeof(lang_list) / sizeof(int);
8241#ifdef __WXMSW__
8242 // always add us english
8243 m_itemLangListBox->Append(_T("English (U.S.)"));
8244
8245 wxString lang_dir = g_Platform->GetSharedDataDir() + _T("share/locale/");
8246 for (int it = 1; it < nLang; it++) {
8247 if (wxLocale::IsAvailable(lang_list[it])) {
8248 wxLocale ltest(lang_list[it], 0);
8249 ltest.AddCatalog(_T("opencpn"));
8250 if (!ltest.IsLoaded(_T("opencpn"))) continue;
8251
8252 // Defaults
8253 wxString loc_lang_name = wxLocale::GetLanguageName(lang_list[it]);
8254 wxString widgets_lang_name = loc_lang_name;
8255 wxString lang_canonical =
8256 wxLocale::GetLanguageInfo(lang_list[it])->CanonicalName;
8257
8258 // Make opencpn substitutions
8259 wxString lang_suffix;
8260 loc_lang_name = GetOCPNKnownLanguage(lang_canonical, lang_suffix);
8261
8262 // Look explicitely to see if .mo is available
8263 wxString test_dir = lang_dir + lang_suffix;
8264 if (!wxDir::Exists(test_dir)) continue;
8265
8266 m_itemLangListBox->Append(loc_lang_name);
8267 }
8268 }
8269#else
8270 wxArrayString lang_array;
8271
8272 // always add us english
8273 lang_array.Add(_T("en_US"));
8274 for (int it = 0; it < nLang; it++) {
8275 {
8276 wxLog::EnableLogging(
8277 FALSE); // avoid "Cannot set locale to..." log message
8278
8279 wxLocale ltest(lang_list[it], 0);
8280#if wxCHECK_VERSION(2, 9, 0)
8281#ifdef __WXGTK__
8282 ltest.AddCatalogLookupPathPrefix(
8283 wxStandardPaths::Get().GetInstallPrefix() +
8284 _T( "/share/locale" ));
8285#endif
8286#endif
8287 ltest.AddCatalog(_T("opencpn"));
8288
8289 wxLog::EnableLogging(TRUE);
8290 if (ltest.IsLoaded(_T("opencpn"))) {
8291 auto x = wxLocale::GetLanguageInfo(lang_list[it]);
8292 wxString s0;
8293 if (x)
8294 s0 = x->CanonicalName;
8295 else
8296 continue;
8297 wxString sl = wxLocale::GetLanguageName(lang_list[it]);
8298 if (wxNOT_FOUND == lang_array.Index(s0)) {
8299 lang_array.Add(s0);
8300 }
8301 }
8302 }
8303 }
8304
8305 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < lang_array.GetCount(); i++) {
8306 // Make opencpn substitutions
8307 wxString loc_lang_name = GetOCPNKnownLanguage(lang_array[i]);
8308 m_itemLangListBox->Append(loc_lang_name);
8309 }
8310#endif
8311 // BUGBUG
8312 // Remember that wxLocale ctor has the effect of changing the system
8313 // locale, including the "C" libraries.
8314 // It should then also happen that the locale should be switched back to
8315 // ocpn initial load setting
8316 // upon the dtor of the above wxLocale instantiations....
8317 // wxWidgets may do so internally, but there seems to be no effect upon
8318 // the system libraries, so that
8319 // functions like strftime() do not revert to the correct locale setting.
8320 // Also, the catalog for the application is not reloaded by the ctor, so
8321 // we must reload them directly
8322 // So as workaround, we reset the locale explicitely.
8323
8324 delete plocale_def_lang;
8325 plocale_def_lang = new wxLocale(current_language);
8326
8327 setlocale(LC_NUMERIC, "C");
8328 plocale_def_lang->AddCatalog(_T("opencpn"));
8329
8330 m_itemLangListBox->SetStringSelection(current_sel);
8331
8332 // Initialize Language tab
8333 const wxLanguageInfo* pli = wxLocale::FindLanguageInfo(g_locale);
8334 if (pli) {
8335 wxString clang = pli->Description;
8336 // m_itemLangListBox->SetValue(clang);
8337 }
8338
8339 m_bVisitLang = TRUE;
8340
8341 ::wxEndBusyCursor();
8342 }
8343#endif
8344 } else if (m_pagePlugins == i) { // 7 is the index of "Plugins" page
8345 // load the disabled plugins finally because the user might want to enable
8346 // them
8347 auto loader = PluginLoader::getInstance();
8348 if (LoadAllPlugIns(false)) {
8349 delete m_pPlugInCtrl;
8350 m_pPlugInCtrl = NULL;
8351 delete m_PluginCatalogMgrPanel;
8352 m_PluginCatalogMgrPanel = NULL;
8353 itemBoxSizerPanelPlugins->Clear();
8354 }
8355
8356 if (!m_pPlugInCtrl) {
8357 // Build the PlugIn Manager Panel
8358 ::wxBeginBusyCursor();
8359
8360 m_pPlugInCtrl = new PluginListPanel(itemPanelPlugins, ID_PANELPIM,
8361 wxDefaultPosition, wxDefaultSize);
8362 m_pPlugInCtrl->SetScrollRate(m_scrollRate, m_scrollRate);
8363 itemBoxSizerPanelPlugins->Add(m_pPlugInCtrl, 01,
8364 wxEXPAND | wxGROW | wxALL, 4);
8365 if (g_pi_manager) g_pi_manager->SetListPanelPtr(m_pPlugInCtrl);
8366
8367 m_PluginCatalogMgrPanel = new CatalogMgrPanel(itemPanelPlugins);
8368 m_PluginCatalogMgrPanel->SetListPanelPtr(m_pPlugInCtrl);
8369
8370 itemBoxSizerPanelPlugins->Add(m_PluginCatalogMgrPanel, 0,
8371 wxEXPAND | wxALL, 4);
8372 itemBoxSizerPanelPlugins->Layout();
8373
8374 // Update the PlugIn page to reflect the state of individual selections
8375 m_pPlugInCtrl->UpdateSelections();
8376
8377 ::wxEndBusyCursor();
8378
8379 wxDEFINE_EVENT(EVT_COMPAT_OS_CHANGE, wxCommandEvent);
8380 GlobalVar<wxString> compat_os(&g_compatOS);
8381 }
8382 k_plugins = TOOLBAR_CHANGED;
8383 }
8384}
8385
8386wxString options::SelectSoundFile() {
8387 wxString sound_dir = g_Platform->GetSharedDataDir();
8388 sound_dir.Append(_T("sounds"));
8389 wxString sel_file;
8390 int response;
8391
8392#ifndef __ANDROID__
8393 wxFileDialog* popenDialog = new wxFileDialog(
8394 NULL, _("Select Sound File"), sound_dir, wxEmptyString,
8395 _T("WAV files (*.wav)|*.wav|All files (*.*)|*.*"), wxFD_OPEN);
8396 if (g_bresponsive)
8397 popenDialog = g_Platform->AdjustFileDialogFont(this, popenDialog);
8398
8399 response = popenDialog->ShowModal();
8400 sel_file = popenDialog->GetPath();
8401 delete popenDialog;
8402
8403#else
8404 response =
8405 g_Platform->DoFileSelectorDialog(this, &sel_file, _("Select Sound File"),
8406 sound_dir, wxEmptyString, wxT("*.*"));
8407#endif
8408
8409 if (response == wxID_OK)
8410 return g_Platform->NormalizePath(sel_file);
8411 else
8412 return _T("");
8413}
8414
8415void options::OnButtonSelectSound(wxCommandEvent& event) {
8416 wxString sel_file = SelectSoundFile();
8417
8418 if (!sel_file.IsEmpty()) {
8419 g_sAIS_Alert_Sound_File = g_Platform->NormalizePath(sel_file);
8420 }
8421}
8422
8423void options::OnButtonTestSound(wxCommandEvent& event) {
8424 auto sound = SoundFactory();
8425 auto cmd_sound = dynamic_cast<SystemCmdSound*>(sound);
8426 if (cmd_sound) cmd_sound->SetCmd(g_CmdSoundString.mb_str());
8427 sound->SetFinishedCallback([&](void* snd) { m_on_sound_done.Notify(snd); });
8428 sound->Load(m_soundPanelAIS->GetSoundFile(), g_iSoundDeviceIndex);
8429 sound->Play();
8430}
8431
8432wxString GetOCPNKnownLanguage(wxString lang_canonical, wxString& lang_dir) {
8433 wxString return_string;
8434 wxString dir_suffix;
8435
8436#if wxUSE_XLOCALE || !wxCHECK_VERSION(3, 0, 0)
8437
8438 if (lang_canonical == _T("en_US")) {
8439 dir_suffix = _T("en");
8440 return_string = wxString("English (U.S.)", wxConvUTF8);
8441
8442 } else if ((lang_canonical == _T("cs_CZ")) || (lang_canonical == _T("cs"))) {
8443 dir_suffix = _T("cs");
8444 return_string = wxString("etina", wxConvUTF8);
8445
8446 } else if ((lang_canonical == _T("da_DK")) || (lang_canonical == _T("da"))) {
8447 dir_suffix = _T("da");
8448 return_string = wxString("Dansk", wxConvUTF8);
8449
8450 } else if ((lang_canonical == _T("de_DE")) || (lang_canonical == _T("de"))) {
8451 dir_suffix = _T("de");
8452 return_string = wxString("Deutsch", wxConvUTF8);
8453
8454 } else if ((lang_canonical == _T("et_EE")) || (lang_canonical == _T("et"))) {
8455 dir_suffix = _T("et");
8456 return_string = wxString("Eesti", wxConvUTF8);
8457
8458 } else if ((lang_canonical == _T("es_ES")) || (lang_canonical == _T("es"))) {
8459 dir_suffix = _T("es");
8460 return_string = wxString("Espaol", wxConvUTF8);
8461
8462 } else if ((lang_canonical == _T("fr_FR")) || (lang_canonical == _T("fr"))) {
8463 dir_suffix = _T("fr");
8464 return_string = wxString("Franais", wxConvUTF8);
8465
8466 } else if ((lang_canonical == _T("it_IT")) || (lang_canonical == _T("it"))) {
8467 dir_suffix = _T("it");
8468 return_string = wxString("Italiano", wxConvUTF8);
8469
8470 } else if ((lang_canonical == _T("nl_NL")) || (lang_canonical == _T("nl"))) {
8471 dir_suffix = _T("nl");
8472 return_string = wxString("Nederlands", wxConvUTF8);
8473
8474 } else if ((lang_canonical == _T("pl_PL")) || (lang_canonical == _T("pl"))) {
8475 dir_suffix = _T("pl");
8476 return_string = wxString("Polski", wxConvUTF8);
8477
8478 } else if ((lang_canonical == _T("pt_PT")) || (lang_canonical == _T("pt"))) {
8479 dir_suffix = _T("pt_PT");
8480 return_string = wxString("Portugus", wxConvUTF8);
8481
8482 } else if ((lang_canonical == _T("pt_BR")) ||
8483 (lang_canonical == _T("pt_BR"))) {
8484 dir_suffix = _T("pt_BR");
8485 return_string = wxString("Portugus Brasileiro", wxConvUTF8);
8486
8487 } else if ((lang_canonical == _T("ru_RU")) || (lang_canonical == _T("ru"))) {
8488 dir_suffix = _T("ru");
8489 return_string = wxString("", wxConvUTF8);
8490
8491 } else if ((lang_canonical == _T("sv_SE")) || (lang_canonical == _T("sv"))) {
8492 dir_suffix = _T("sv");
8493 return_string = wxString("Svenska", wxConvUTF8);
8494
8495 } else if ((lang_canonical == _T("fi_FI")) || (lang_canonical == _T("fi"))) {
8496 dir_suffix = _T("fi_FI");
8497 return_string = wxString("Suomi", wxConvUTF8);
8498
8499 } else if ((lang_canonical == _T("nb_NO")) || (lang_canonical == _T("nb"))) {
8500 dir_suffix = _T("nb_NO");
8501 return_string = wxString("Norsk", wxConvUTF8);
8502
8503 } else if ((lang_canonical == _T("tr_TR")) || (lang_canonical == _T("tr"))) {
8504 dir_suffix = _T("tr_TR");
8505 return_string = wxString("Trke", wxConvUTF8);
8506
8507 } else if ((lang_canonical == _T("el_GR")) || (lang_canonical == _T("el"))) {
8508 dir_suffix = _T("el_GR");
8509 return_string = wxString("", wxConvUTF8);
8510
8511 } else if ((lang_canonical == _T("hu_HU")) || (lang_canonical == _T("hu"))) {
8512 dir_suffix = _T("hu_HU");
8513 return_string = wxString("Magyar", wxConvUTF8);
8514
8515 } else if ((lang_canonical == _T("zh_TW")) ||
8516 (lang_canonical == _T("zh_TW"))) {
8517 dir_suffix = _T("zh_TW");
8518 return_string = wxString("", wxConvUTF8);
8519
8520 } else if ((lang_canonical == _T("zh_CN")) ||
8521 (lang_canonical == _T("zh_CN"))) {
8522 dir_suffix = _T("zh_CN");
8523 return_string = wxString("Simplified Chinese", wxConvUTF8);
8524
8525 } else if ((lang_canonical == _T("ca_ES")) || (lang_canonical == _T("ca"))) {
8526 dir_suffix = _T("ca_ES");
8527 return_string = wxString("Catalan", wxConvUTF8);
8528
8529 } else if ((lang_canonical == _T("gl_ES")) ||
8530 (lang_canonical == _T("gl_ES"))) {
8531 dir_suffix = _T("gl_ES");
8532 return_string = wxString("Galician", wxConvUTF8);
8533
8534 } else if ((lang_canonical == _T("ja_JP")) ||
8535 (lang_canonical == _T("ja_JP"))) {
8536 dir_suffix = _T("ja_JP");
8537 return_string = wxString("Japanese", wxConvUTF8);
8538
8539 } else if ((lang_canonical == _T("vi_VN")) ||
8540 (lang_canonical == _T("vi_VN"))) {
8541 dir_suffix = _T("vi_VN");
8542 return_string = wxString("Vietnamese", wxConvUTF8);
8543
8544 } else {
8545 dir_suffix = lang_canonical;
8546 const wxLanguageInfo* info = wxLocale::FindLanguageInfo(lang_canonical);
8547 if (info)
8548 return_string = info->Description;
8549 else
8550 return_string = lang_canonical;
8551 }
8552
8553 lang_dir = dir_suffix;
8554#endif
8555 return return_string;
8556}
8557
8558wxString GetOCPNKnownLanguage(const wxString lang_canonical) {
8559 wxString lang_dir;
8560 return GetOCPNKnownLanguage(lang_canonical, lang_dir);
8561}
8562
8563ChartGroupArray* ChartGroupsUI::CloneChartGroupArray(ChartGroupArray* s) {
8564 ChartGroupArray* d = new ChartGroupArray;
8565 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < s->GetCount(); i++) {
8566 ChartGroup* psg = s->Item(i);
8567 ChartGroup* pdg = new ChartGroup;
8568 pdg->m_group_name = psg->m_group_name;
8569 pdg->m_element_array.reserve(psg->m_element_array.size());
8570
8571 for (auto& elem : psg->m_element_array)
8572 pdg->m_element_array.push_back(elem);
8573
8574 d->Add(pdg);
8575 }
8576 return d;
8577}
8578
8579void ChartGroupsUI::EmptyChartGroupArray(ChartGroupArray* s) {
8580 if (!s) return;
8581
8582 // ChartGroups don't need anything special for delete, just calling the
8583 // destructor is enough.
8584 WX_CLEAR_ARRAY(*s);
8585}
8586
8587// Chart Groups dialog implementation
8588BEGIN_EVENT_TABLE(ChartGroupsUI, wxEvtHandler)
8589EVT_TREE_ITEM_EXPANDED(wxID_TREECTRL, ChartGroupsUI::OnNodeExpanded)
8590EVT_NOTEBOOK_PAGE_CHANGED(
8591 wxID_ANY,
8592 ChartGroupsUI::OnGroupPageChange) // This should work under Windows :-(
8593END_EVENT_TABLE()
8594
8595ChartGroupsUI::ChartGroupsUI(wxWindow* parent) : wxScrolledWindow(parent) {
8596 m_GroupSelectedPage = -1;
8597 m_pActiveChartsTree = 0;
8598 pParent = parent;
8599 lastSelectedCtl = NULL;
8600 allAvailableCtl = NULL;
8601 defaultAllCtl = NULL;
8602 iFont = NULL;
8603 m_pAddButton = NULL;
8604 m_pRemoveButton = NULL;
8605 m_pDeleteGroupButton = NULL;
8606 m_pNewGroupButton = NULL;
8607 m_pGroupArray = NULL;
8608 m_GroupNB = NULL;
8609 modified = false;
8610 m_UIcomplete = false;
8611 m_treespopulated = false;
8612 dialogFont = GetOCPNScaledFont(_("Dialog"));
8613}
8614
8615ChartGroupsUI::~ChartGroupsUI(void) {
8616 m_DirCtrlArray.Clear();
8617 m_GroupNB->Disconnect(
8618 wxEVT_COMMAND_NOTEBOOK_PAGE_CHANGED,
8619 wxNotebookEventHandler(ChartGroupsUI::OnGroupPageChange), NULL, this);
8620
8621 delete iFont;
8622}
8623
8624void ChartGroupsUI::SetInitialSettings(void) {
8625 m_settingscomplete = FALSE;
8626 m_treespopulated = FALSE;
8627}
8628
8629void ChartGroupsUI::PopulateTrees(void) {
8630 // Fill in the "Active chart" tree control
8631 // from the options dialog "Active Chart Directories" list
8632 wxArrayString dir_array;
8633 int nDir = m_db_dirs.GetCount();
8634 for (int i = 0; i < nDir; i++) {
8635 wxString dirname = m_db_dirs[i].fullpath;
8636 if (!dirname.IsEmpty()) dir_array.Add(dirname);
8637 }
8638
8639 PopulateTreeCtrl(allAvailableCtl->GetTreeCtrl(), dir_array,
8640 wxSystemSettings::GetColour(wxSYS_COLOUR_WINDOWTEXT),
8641 dialogFont);
8642 m_pActiveChartsTree = allAvailableCtl->GetTreeCtrl();
8643
8644 // Fill in the Page 0 tree control
8645 // from the options dialog "Active Chart Directories" list
8646 wxArrayString dir_array0;
8647 int nDir0 = m_db_dirs.GetCount();
8648 for (int i = 0; i < nDir0; i++) {
8649 wxString dirname = m_db_dirs[i].fullpath;
8650 if (!dirname.IsEmpty()) dir_array0.Add(dirname);
8651 }
8652 PopulateTreeCtrl(defaultAllCtl->GetTreeCtrl(), dir_array0,
8653 wxSystemSettings::GetColour(wxSYS_COLOUR_WINDOWTEXT), iFont);
8654}
8655
8656void ChartGroupsUI::CompleteInitialSettings(void) {
8657 PopulateTrees();
8658
8659 BuildNotebookPages(m_pGroupArray);
8660
8661 m_panel->GetSizer()->Layout();
8662
8663 m_settingscomplete = TRUE;
8664 m_treespopulated = TRUE;
8665}
8666
8667void ChartGroupsUI::PopulateTreeCtrl(wxTreeCtrl* ptc,
8668 const wxArrayString& dir_array,
8669 const wxColour& col, wxFont* pFont) {
8670 ptc->DeleteAllItems();
8671
8672 wxDirItemData* rootData = new wxDirItemData(_T("Dummy"), _T("Dummy"), TRUE);
8673 wxString rootName;
8674 rootName = _T("Dummy");
8675 wxTreeItemId m_rootId = ptc->AddRoot(rootName, 3, -1, rootData);
8676 ptc->SetItemHasChildren(m_rootId);
8677
8678 wxString dirname;
8679 int nDir = dir_array.GetCount();
8680 for (int i = 0; i < nDir; i++) {
8681 wxString dirname = dir_array[i];
8682 if (!dirname.IsEmpty()) {
8683 wxDirItemData* dir_item = new wxDirItemData(dirname, dirname, TRUE);
8684 wxTreeItemId id = ptc->AppendItem(m_rootId, dirname, 0, -1, dir_item);
8685
8686 // wxWidgets bug workaraound (Ticket #10085)
8687 ptc->SetItemText(id, dirname);
8688 if (pFont) ptc->SetItemFont(id, *pFont);
8689
8690#ifndef __WXOSX__
8691 // On MacOS, use the default system dialog color, to honor Dark mode.
8692 ptc->SetItemTextColour(id, col);
8693#endif
8694 ptc->SetItemHasChildren(id);
8695 }
8696 }
8697}
8698
8699void ChartGroupsUI::OnInsertChartItem(wxCommandEvent& event) {
8700 wxString insert_candidate = allAvailableCtl->GetPath();
8701 if (!insert_candidate.IsEmpty()) {
8702 if (m_DirCtrlArray.GetCount()) {
8703 wxGenericDirCtrl* pDirCtrl = (m_DirCtrlArray[m_GroupSelectedPage]);
8704 ChartGroup* pGroup = m_pGroupArray->Item(m_GroupSelectedPage - 1);
8705 if (pDirCtrl) {
8706 wxTreeCtrl* ptree = pDirCtrl->GetTreeCtrl();
8707 if (ptree) {
8708 if (ptree->IsEmpty()) {
8709 wxDirItemData* rootData =
8710 new wxDirItemData(wxEmptyString, wxEmptyString, TRUE);
8711 wxString rootName = _T("Dummy");
8712 wxTreeItemId rootId = ptree->AddRoot(rootName, 3, -1, rootData);
8713
8714 ptree->SetItemHasChildren(rootId);
8715 }
8716
8717 wxTreeItemId root_Id = ptree->GetRootItem();
8718 wxDirItemData* dir_item =
8719 new wxDirItemData(insert_candidate, insert_candidate, TRUE);
8720 wxTreeItemId id =
8721 ptree->AppendItem(root_Id, insert_candidate, 0, -1, dir_item);
8722 if (wxDir::Exists(insert_candidate)) ptree->SetItemHasChildren(id);
8723 }
8724
8725 pGroup->m_element_array.push_back({insert_candidate});
8726 }
8727 }
8728 }
8729 modified = TRUE;
8730 allAvailableCtl->GetTreeCtrl()->UnselectAll();
8731 m_pAddButton->Disable();
8732
8733 wxGenericDirCtrl* pDirCtrl = (m_DirCtrlArray[m_GroupSelectedPage]);
8734 if (pDirCtrl) {
8735 wxTreeCtrl* ptree = pDirCtrl->GetTreeCtrl();
8736 if (ptree) ptree->Refresh();
8737 }
8738}
8739
8740void ChartGroupsUI::OnRemoveChartItem(wxCommandEvent& event) {
8741 if (m_DirCtrlArray.GetCount()) {
8742 wxGenericDirCtrl* pDirCtrl = (m_DirCtrlArray[m_GroupSelectedPage]);
8743 ChartGroup* pGroup = m_pGroupArray->Item(m_GroupSelectedPage - 1);
8744
8745 if (pDirCtrl) {
8746 wxString sel_item = pDirCtrl->GetPath();
8747
8748 wxTreeCtrl* ptree = pDirCtrl->GetTreeCtrl();
8749 if (ptree && ptree->GetCount()) {
8750 wxTreeItemId id = ptree->GetSelection();
8751 lastDeletedItem = id;
8752 if (id.IsOk()) {
8753 wxString branch_adder;
8754 int group_item_index =
8755 FindGroupBranch(pGroup, ptree, id, &branch_adder);
8756 if (group_item_index >= 0) {
8757 ChartGroupElement& pelement =
8758 pGroup->m_element_array[group_item_index];
8759 bool b_duplicate = FALSE;
8760 for (unsigned int k = 0; k < pelement.m_missing_name_array.size();
8761 k++) {
8762 if (pelement.m_missing_name_array[k] == sel_item) {
8763 b_duplicate = TRUE;
8764 break;
8765 }
8766 }
8767 if (!b_duplicate) {
8768 pelement.m_missing_name_array.Add(sel_item);
8769 }
8770
8771 // Special case...
8772 // If the selection is a branch itself,
8773 // Then delete from the tree, and delete from the group
8774 if (branch_adder == _T("")) {
8775 ptree->Delete(id);
8776 pGroup->m_element_array.erase(pGroup->m_element_array.begin() +
8777 group_item_index);
8778 } else {
8779 ptree->SetItemTextColour(id, wxColour(128, 128, 128));
8780 // what about toggle back?
8781 }
8782 }
8783 }
8784 modified = TRUE;
8785 lastSelectedCtl->Unselect();
8786 lastSelectedCtl = 0;
8787 m_pRemoveButton->Disable();
8788
8789 wxGenericDirCtrl* pDirCtrl = (m_DirCtrlArray[m_GroupSelectedPage]);
8790 if (pDirCtrl) {
8791 wxTreeCtrl* ptree = pDirCtrl->GetTreeCtrl();
8792 if (ptree) ptree->Refresh();
8793 }
8794 }
8795 }
8796 }
8797 event.Skip();
8798}
8799
8800void ChartGroupsUI::OnGroupPageChange(wxNotebookEvent& event) {
8801 m_GroupSelectedPage = event.GetSelection();
8802 allAvailableCtl->GetTreeCtrl()->UnselectAll();
8803 if (lastSelectedCtl) {
8804 lastSelectedCtl->UnselectAll();
8805 lastSelectedCtl = 0;
8806 }
8807 m_pRemoveButton->Disable();
8808 m_pAddButton->Disable();
8809
8810 // Disable delete option for "All Charts" group
8811 if (m_GroupSelectedPage == 0) {
8812 if (m_pDeleteGroupButton) m_pDeleteGroupButton->Disable();
8813 } else {
8814 if (m_pDeleteGroupButton) m_pDeleteGroupButton->Enable();
8815 }
8816}
8817
8818void ChartGroupsUI::OnAvailableSelection(wxTreeEvent& event) {
8819 wxObject* evtObj = event.GetEventObject();
8820 if (allAvailableCtl && (evtObj == allAvailableCtl->GetTreeCtrl())) {
8821 wxTreeItemId item = allAvailableCtl->GetTreeCtrl()->GetSelection();
8822 if (item && item.IsOk() && m_GroupSelectedPage > 0) {
8823 m_pAddButton->Enable();
8824 } else {
8825 m_pAddButton->Disable();
8826 }
8827 } else {
8828 lastSelectedCtl = dynamic_cast<wxTreeCtrl*>(evtObj);
8829 if (!lastSelectedCtl) goto out;
8830 wxTreeItemId item = lastSelectedCtl->GetSelection();
8831 if (item && item.IsOk() && m_GroupSelectedPage > 0) {
8832 // We need a trick for wxGTK here, since it gives us a Selection
8833 // event with the just deleted element after OnRemoveChartItem()
8834 wxGenericDirCtrl* dirCtrl =
8835 dynamic_cast<wxGenericDirCtrl*>(lastSelectedCtl->GetParent());
8836 if (!dirCtrl) goto out;
8837 wxString itemPath = dirCtrl->GetPath();
8838 if (!itemPath.IsEmpty()) m_pRemoveButton->Enable();
8839 } else {
8840 m_pRemoveButton->Disable();
8841 }
8842 }
8843
8844out:
8845 event.Skip();
8846}
8847
8848void ChartGroupsUI::OnNewGroup(wxCommandEvent& event) {
8849 wxTextEntryDialog* pd = new wxTextEntryDialog();
8850 wxFont* qFont = GetOCPNScaledFont(_("Dialog"));
8851 pd->SetFont(*qFont);
8852
8853 pd->Create(m_panel, _("Enter Group Name"), _("New Chart Group"));
8854
8855#ifdef __ANDROID__
8856 androidDisableRotation();
8857#endif
8858
8859 if (pd->ShowModal() == wxID_OK) {
8860 if (pd->GetValue().Length()) {
8861 AddEmptyGroupPage(pd->GetValue());
8862 ChartGroup* pGroup = new ChartGroup;
8863 pGroup->m_group_name = pd->GetValue();
8864 m_pGroupArray->Add(pGroup);
8865
8866 m_GroupSelectedPage =
8867 m_GroupNB->GetPageCount() - 1; // select the new page
8868 m_GroupNB->ChangeSelection(m_GroupSelectedPage);
8869 m_pDeleteGroupButton->Enable();
8870 modified = TRUE;
8871 }
8872 }
8873 delete pd;
8874
8875#ifdef __ANDROID__
8876 androidEnableRotation();
8877#endif
8878}
8879
8880void ChartGroupsUI::OnDeleteGroup(wxCommandEvent& event) {
8881 if (0 != m_GroupSelectedPage) {
8882 m_DirCtrlArray.RemoveAt(m_GroupSelectedPage);
8883 if (m_pGroupArray) m_pGroupArray->RemoveAt(m_GroupSelectedPage - 1);
8884 m_GroupNB->DeletePage(m_GroupSelectedPage);
8885 modified = TRUE;
8886 }
8887 if (m_GroupSelectedPage <= 0) {
8888 m_pAddButton->Disable();
8889 m_pDeleteGroupButton->Disable();
8890 }
8891}
8892
8893int ChartGroupsUI::FindGroupBranch(ChartGroup* pGroup, wxTreeCtrl* ptree,
8894 wxTreeItemId item, wxString* pbranch_adder) {
8895 wxString branch_name;
8896 wxString branch_adder;
8897
8898 wxTreeItemId current_node = item;
8899 while (current_node.IsOk()) {
8900 wxTreeItemId parent_node = ptree->GetItemParent(current_node);
8901 if (!parent_node) break;
8902
8903 if (parent_node == ptree->GetRootItem()) {
8904 branch_name = ptree->GetItemText(current_node);
8905 break;
8906 }
8907
8908 branch_adder.Prepend(ptree->GetItemText(current_node));
8909 branch_adder.Prepend(wxString(wxFILE_SEP_PATH));
8910
8911 current_node = ptree->GetItemParent(current_node);
8912 }
8913
8914 // Find the index and element pointer of the target branch in the Group
8915 unsigned int target_item_index = -1;
8916
8917 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < pGroup->m_element_array.size(); i++) {
8918 const wxString& target = pGroup->m_element_array[i].m_element_name;
8919 if (branch_name == target) {
8920 target_item_index = i;
8921 break;
8922 }
8923 }
8924
8925 if (pbranch_adder) *pbranch_adder = branch_adder;
8926
8927 return target_item_index;
8928}
8929
8930void ChartGroupsUI::OnNodeExpanded(wxTreeEvent& event) {
8931 wxTreeItemId node = event.GetItem();
8932
8933 if (m_GroupSelectedPage <= 0) return;
8934 wxGenericDirCtrl* pDirCtrl = (m_DirCtrlArray[m_GroupSelectedPage]);
8935 ChartGroup* pGroup = m_pGroupArray->Item(m_GroupSelectedPage - 1);
8936 if (!pDirCtrl) return;
8937
8938 wxTreeCtrl* ptree = pDirCtrl->GetTreeCtrl();
8939 wxString branch_adder;
8940 int target_item_index = FindGroupBranch(pGroup, ptree, node, &branch_adder);
8941 if (target_item_index < 0) return;
8942 const ChartGroupElement& target_element =
8943 pGroup->m_element_array[target_item_index];
8944 const wxString& branch_name = target_element.m_element_name;
8945
8946 // Walk the children of the expanded node, marking any items which appear in
8947 // the "missing" list
8948 if (!target_element.m_missing_name_array.GetCount()) return;
8949 wxString full_root = branch_name;
8950 full_root += branch_adder;
8951 full_root += wxString(wxFILE_SEP_PATH);
8952
8953 wxTreeItemIdValue cookie;
8954 wxTreeItemId child = ptree->GetFirstChild(node, cookie);
8955 while (child.IsOk()) {
8956 wxString target_string = full_root;
8957 target_string += ptree->GetItemText(child);
8958
8959 for (unsigned int k = 0; k < target_element.m_missing_name_array.GetCount();
8960 k++) {
8961 if (target_element.m_missing_name_array[k] == target_string) {
8962 ptree->SetItemTextColour(child, wxColour(128, 128, 128));
8963 break;
8964 }
8965 }
8966 child = ptree->GetNextChild(node, cookie);
8967 }
8968}
8969
8970void ChartGroupsUI::BuildNotebookPages(ChartGroupArray* pGroupArray) {
8971 ClearGroupPages();
8972
8973 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < pGroupArray->GetCount(); i++) {
8974 ChartGroup* pGroup = pGroupArray->Item(i);
8975 wxTreeCtrl* ptc = AddEmptyGroupPage(pGroup->m_group_name);
8976
8977 wxString itemname;
8978 int nItems = pGroup->m_element_array.size();
8979 for (int i = 0; i < nItems; i++) {
8980 const wxString& itemname = pGroup->m_element_array[i].m_element_name;
8981 if (!itemname.IsEmpty()) {
8982 wxDirItemData* dir_item = new wxDirItemData(itemname, itemname, TRUE);
8983 wxTreeItemId id =
8984 ptc->AppendItem(ptc->GetRootItem(), itemname, 0, -1, dir_item);
8985
8986 if (wxDir::Exists(itemname)) ptc->SetItemHasChildren(id);
8987 }
8988 }
8989 }
8990}
8991
8992wxTreeCtrl* ChartGroupsUI::AddEmptyGroupPage(const wxString& label) {
8993 wxGenericDirCtrl* GroupDirCtl =
8994 new wxGenericDirCtrl(m_GroupNB, wxID_ANY, _T("TESTDIR"));
8995 m_GroupNB->AddPage(GroupDirCtl, label);
8996
8997 wxTreeCtrl* ptree = GroupDirCtl->GetTreeCtrl();
8998 ptree->DeleteAllItems();
8999
9000 wxDirItemData* rootData =
9001 new wxDirItemData(wxEmptyString, wxEmptyString, TRUE);
9002 wxString rootName = _T("Dummy");
9003 wxTreeItemId rootId = ptree->AddRoot(rootName, 3, -1, rootData);
9004 ptree->SetItemHasChildren(rootId);
9005
9006 m_DirCtrlArray.Add(GroupDirCtl);
9007
9008 return ptree;
9009}
9010
9011void ChartGroupsUI::ClearGroupPages() {
9012 if (m_GroupNB->GetPageCount() == 0) return;
9013
9014 for (unsigned int i = m_GroupNB->GetPageCount() - 1; i > 0; i--) {
9015 m_DirCtrlArray.RemoveAt(i);
9016 m_GroupNB->DeletePage(i);
9017 }
9018}
9019
9020void options::OnInsertTideDataLocation(wxCommandEvent& event) {
9021 wxString sel_file;
9022 int response = wxID_CANCEL;
9023
9024#ifndef __ANDROID__
9025 wxFileDialog* popenDialog = new wxFileDialog(
9026 NULL, _("Select Tide/Current Data"), g_TCData_Dir, wxT(""),
9027 wxT("Tide/Current Data files (*.IDX; *.TCD)|*.IDX;*.idx;*.TCD;*.tcd|All ")
9028 wxT("files (*.*)|*.*"),
9029 wxFD_OPEN);
9030 if (g_bresponsive)
9031 popenDialog = g_Platform->AdjustFileDialogFont(this, popenDialog);
9032
9033 response = popenDialog->ShowModal();
9034 sel_file = popenDialog->GetPath();
9035 delete popenDialog;
9036
9037#else
9038 wxString path;
9039 response = g_Platform->DoFileSelectorDialog(this, &path,
9040 _("Select Tide/Current Data"),
9041 g_TCData_Dir, _T(""), wxT("*.*"));
9042 sel_file = path;
9043#endif
9044
9045 if (response == wxID_OK) {
9046 wxListItem li;
9047 int id = tcDataSelected->GetItemCount(); // next index
9048 li.SetId(id);
9049 long idx = tcDataSelected->InsertItem(li);
9050 tcDataSelected->SetItem(id, 0, g_Platform->NormalizePath(sel_file));
9051
9052 // Record the currently selected directory for later use
9053 wxFileName fn(sel_file);
9054 wxString data_dir = fn.GetPath();
9055 g_TCData_Dir = g_Platform->NormalizePath(data_dir);
9056 }
9057}
9058
9059void options::OnRemoveTideDataLocation(wxCommandEvent& event) {
9060 long item = -1;
9061 for (;;) {
9062 item = tcDataSelected->GetNextItem(item, wxLIST_NEXT_ALL,
9063 wxLIST_STATE_SELECTED);
9064 if (item == -1) break;
9065 tcDataSelected->DeleteItem(item);
9066 item = -1; // Restart
9067 }
9068}
9069
9070// OpenGLOptionsDlg
9071enum { ID_BUTTON_REBUILD, ID_BUTTON_CLEAR };
9072
9073#ifdef ocpnUSE_GL
9074BEGIN_EVENT_TABLE(OpenGLOptionsDlg, wxDialog)
9075EVT_BUTTON(ID_BUTTON_REBUILD, OpenGLOptionsDlg::OnButtonRebuild)
9076EVT_BUTTON(ID_BUTTON_CLEAR, OpenGLOptionsDlg::OnButtonClear)
9077END_EVENT_TABLE()
9078
9079OpenGLOptionsDlg::OpenGLOptionsDlg(wxWindow* parent)
9080 : wxDialog(parent, wxID_ANY, _T( "OpenGL Options" ), wxDefaultPosition,
9081 wxDefaultSize,
9082 wxDEFAULT_DIALOG_STYLE | wxRESIZE_BORDER
9083#ifdef __WXOSX__
9084 | wxSTAY_ON_TOP
9085#endif
9086 ),
9087 m_brebuild_cache(FALSE) {
9088
9089 wxFont* dialogFont = GetOCPNScaledFont(_("Dialog"));
9090 SetFont(*dialogFont);
9091
9092 wxBoxSizer* mainSizer = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
9093 wxFlexGridSizer* flexSizer = new wxFlexGridSizer(2);
9094
9095 m_cbTextureCompression =
9096 new wxCheckBox(this, wxID_ANY,
9097 g_bGLexpert ? _("Texture Compression")
9098 : _("Texture Compression with Caching"));
9099 m_cbTextureCompressionCaching =
9100 new wxCheckBox(this, wxID_ANY, _("Texture Compression Caching"));
9101 m_memorySize =
9102 new wxStaticText(this, wxID_ANY, _("Texture Memory Size (MB)"));
9103 m_sTextureMemorySize = new wxSpinCtrl(this);
9104 m_sTextureMemorySize->SetRange(1, 16384);
9105 m_cacheSize =
9106 new wxStaticText(this, wxID_ANY, _("Size: ") + GetTextureCacheSize());
9107 wxButton* btnRebuild =
9108 new wxButton(this, ID_BUTTON_REBUILD, _("Rebuild Texture Cache"));
9109 wxButton* btnClear =
9110 new wxButton(this, ID_BUTTON_CLEAR, _("Clear Texture Cache"));
9111 btnRebuild->Enable(g_GLOptions.m_bTextureCompressionCaching);
9112 if (!g_bopengl || g_raster_format == GL_RGB) btnRebuild->Disable();
9113 btnClear->Enable(g_GLOptions.m_bTextureCompressionCaching);
9114 m_cbPolygonSmoothing = new wxCheckBox(this, wxID_ANY, _("Polygon Smoothing"));
9115 m_cbLineSmoothing = new wxCheckBox(this, wxID_ANY, _("Line Smoothing"));
9116 m_cbSoftwareGL =
9117 new wxCheckBox(this, wxID_ANY, _("Software OpenGL (restart OpenCPN)"));
9118 m_cbUseAcceleratedPanning =
9119 new wxCheckBox(this, wxID_ANY, _("Use Accelerated Panning"));
9120
9121 flexSizer->Add(new wxStaticText(this, wxID_ANY, _("Texture Settings")), 0,
9122 wxALIGN_RIGHT | wxALIGN_CENTER_VERTICAL, 5);
9123 flexSizer->Add(m_cbTextureCompression, 0, wxALL | wxEXPAND, 5);
9124 flexSizer->AddSpacer(0);
9125 flexSizer->Add(m_cbTextureCompressionCaching, 0, wxALL | wxEXPAND, 5);
9126 flexSizer->Add(m_memorySize, 0, wxALIGN_RIGHT | wxALIGN_CENTER_VERTICAL, 5);
9127 flexSizer->Add(m_sTextureMemorySize, 0, wxALL | wxEXPAND, 5);
9128 flexSizer->Add(new wxStaticText(this, wxID_ANY, _("Texture Cache")), 0,
9129 wxALIGN_RIGHT | wxALIGN_CENTER_VERTICAL, 5);
9130 flexSizer->Add(m_cacheSize, 0, wxALIGN_CENTER | wxALIGN_CENTER_VERTICAL, 5);
9131 flexSizer->AddSpacer(0);
9132 flexSizer->Add(btnRebuild, 0, wxALL | wxEXPAND, 5);
9133 flexSizer->AddSpacer(0);
9134 flexSizer->Add(btnClear, 0, wxALL | wxEXPAND, 5);
9135 flexSizer->Add(new wxStaticText(this, wxID_ANY, _("Miscellaneous")), 0,
9136 wxALIGN_RIGHT | wxALIGN_CENTER_VERTICAL, 5);
9137 flexSizer->Add(m_cbPolygonSmoothing, 0, wxALL | wxEXPAND, 5);
9138 flexSizer->AddSpacer(0);
9139 flexSizer->Add(m_cbLineSmoothing, 0, wxALL | wxEXPAND, 5);
9140 flexSizer->AddSpacer(0);
9141 flexSizer->AddSpacer(0);
9142 flexSizer->Add(m_cbSoftwareGL, 0, wxALL | wxEXPAND, 5);
9143 flexSizer->AddSpacer(0);
9144 flexSizer->Add(m_cbUseAcceleratedPanning, 0, wxALL | wxEXPAND, 5);
9145 flexSizer->AddGrowableCol(1);
9146 mainSizer->Add(flexSizer, 0, wxALL | wxEXPAND, 5);
9147
9148 wxStdDialogButtonSizer* btnSizer = new wxStdDialogButtonSizer();
9149 btnSizer->AddButton(new wxButton(this, wxID_OK));
9150 btnSizer->AddButton(new wxButton(this, wxID_CANCEL, _("Cancel")));
9151 btnSizer->Realize();
9152
9153 mainSizer->AddStretchSpacer();
9154 mainSizer->Add(btnSizer, 0, wxALL | wxEXPAND, 5);
9155
9156 Populate();
9157
9158 SetSizer(mainSizer);
9159 mainSizer->SetSizeHints(this);
9160 Centre();
9161}
9162
9163bool OpenGLOptionsDlg::GetAcceleratedPanning(void) const {
9164 return m_cbUseAcceleratedPanning->GetValue();
9165}
9166
9167bool OpenGLOptionsDlg::GetTextureCompression(void) const {
9168 return m_cbTextureCompression->GetValue();
9169}
9170

9172 return m_cbPolygonSmoothing->GetValue();
9173}
9174

9176 return m_cbLineSmoothing->GetValue();
9177}
9178

9180 return m_cbSoftwareGL->GetValue();
9181}
9182
9183bool OpenGLOptionsDlg::GetTextureCompressionCaching(void) const {
9184 return m_cbTextureCompressionCaching->GetValue();
9185}
9186
9187bool OpenGLOptionsDlg::GetRebuildCache(void) const { return m_brebuild_cache; }
9188
9189int OpenGLOptionsDlg::GetTextureMemorySize(void) const {
9190 return m_sTextureMemorySize->GetValue();
9191}
9192
9193void OpenGLOptionsDlg::Populate(void) {
9194 m_cbTextureCompression->SetValue(g_GLOptions.m_bTextureCompression);
9195 /* disable caching if unsupported */
9196 // if (b_glEntryPointsSet && !s_glCompressedTexImage2D) {
9197 // g_GLOptions.m_bTextureCompressionCaching = FALSE;
9198 // m_cbTextureCompression->Disable();
9199 // m_cbTextureCompression->SetValue(FALSE);
9200 // }
9201
9202 m_cbTextureCompressionCaching->Show(g_bGLexpert);
9203 m_memorySize->Show(g_bGLexpert);
9204 m_sTextureMemorySize->Show(g_bGLexpert);
9205 if (g_bGLexpert) {
9206 m_cbTextureCompressionCaching->SetValue(
9207 g_GLOptions.m_bTextureCompressionCaching);
9208 m_sTextureMemorySize->SetValue(g_GLOptions.m_iTextureMemorySize);
9209 }
9210 m_cbPolygonSmoothing->SetValue(g_GLOptions.m_GLPolygonSmoothing);
9211 m_cbLineSmoothing->SetValue(g_GLOptions.m_GLLineSmoothing);
9212
9213#if defined(__UNIX__) && !defined(__ANDROID__) && !defined(__WXOSX__)
9214 if (gFrame->GetPrimaryCanvas()->GetglCanvas()) {
9215 if (gFrame->GetPrimaryCanvas()
9216 ->GetglCanvas()
9217 ->GetVersionString()
9218 .Upper()
9219 .Find(_T( "MESA" )) != wxNOT_FOUND)
9220 m_cbSoftwareGL->SetValue(g_bSoftwareGL);
9221 }
9222#else
9223 m_cbSoftwareGL->Hide();
9224#endif
9225
9226 wxFont* dialogFont = GetOCPNScaledFont(_("Dialog"));
9227 SetFont(*dialogFont);
9228
9229 if (g_bGLexpert) {
9230 if (gFrame->GetPrimaryCanvas()->GetglCanvas()) {
9231 if (gFrame->GetPrimaryCanvas()->GetglCanvas()->CanAcceleratePanning()) {
9232 m_cbUseAcceleratedPanning->Enable();
9233 m_cbUseAcceleratedPanning->SetValue(
9234 g_GLOptions.m_bUseAcceleratedPanning);
9235 } else {
9236 m_cbUseAcceleratedPanning->SetValue(FALSE);
9237 m_cbUseAcceleratedPanning->Disable();
9238 }
9239 } else {
9240 m_cbUseAcceleratedPanning->SetValue(g_GLOptions.m_bUseAcceleratedPanning);
9241 }
9242 } else {
9243 m_cbUseAcceleratedPanning->SetValue(g_GLOptions.m_bUseAcceleratedPanning);
9244 m_cbUseAcceleratedPanning->Disable();
9245 }
9246}
9247
9248void OpenGLOptionsDlg::OnButtonRebuild(wxCommandEvent& event) {
9249 if (g_GLOptions.m_bTextureCompressionCaching) {
9250 m_brebuild_cache = TRUE;
9251 EndModal(wxID_CANCEL);
9252 }
9253}
9254
9255void OpenGLOptionsDlg::OnButtonClear(wxCommandEvent& event) {
9256 if (g_bopengl && g_glTextureManager) {
9257 ::wxBeginBusyCursor();
9258 g_glTextureManager->ClearAllRasterTextures();
9259
9260 wxString path = g_Platform->GetPrivateDataDir();
9261 appendOSDirSlash(&path);
9262 path.append(_T("raster_texture_cache"));
9263
9264 if (::wxDirExists(path)) {
9265 wxArrayString files;
9266 size_t nfiles = wxDir::GetAllFiles(path, &files);
9267 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < files.GetCount(); i++)
9268 ::wxRemoveFile(files[i]);
9269 }
9270
9271 m_cacheSize->SetLabel(_("Size: ") + GetTextureCacheSize());
9272 ::wxEndBusyCursor();
9273 }
9274}
9275
9276wxString OpenGLOptionsDlg::GetTextureCacheSize(void) {
9277 wxString path = g_Platform->GetPrivateDataDir();
9278 appendOSDirSlash(&path);
9279 path.append(_T("raster_texture_cache"));
9280 long long total = 0;
9281
9282 if (::wxDirExists(path)) {
9283 wxArrayString files;
9284 size_t nfiles = wxDir::GetAllFiles(path, &files);
9285 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < files.GetCount(); i++)
9286 total += wxFile(files[i]).Length();
9287 }
9288 double mb = total / (1024.0 * 1024.0);
9289 if (mb < 10000.0) return wxString::Format(_T( "%.1f MB" ), mb);
9290 mb = mb / 1024.0;
9291 return wxString::Format(_T( "%.1f GB" ), mb);
9292}
9293#endif
9294//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
9295// CanvasConfig selection panel
9296//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
9297
9298BEGIN_EVENT_TABLE(CanvasConfigSelect, wxPanel)
9299EVT_PAINT(CanvasConfigSelect::OnPaint)
9300END_EVENT_TABLE()
9301
9302CanvasConfigSelect::CanvasConfigSelect(wxWindow* parent, options* parentOptions,
9303 wxWindowID id, wxBitmap& bmp,
9304 const wxPoint& pos, const wxSize& size)
9305 : wxPanel(parent, id, pos, size, wxBORDER_NONE) {
9306 m_parentOptions = parentOptions;
9307 m_bmpNormal = bmp;
9308 m_borderWidth = 5;
9309 SetSelected(false);
9310
9311 int refHeight = GetCharHeight();
9312 // SetMinSize(wxSize(-1, 5 * refHeight));
9313 SetMinSize(wxSize(bmp.GetSize().x + m_borderWidth * 2,
9314 bmp.GetSize().y + m_borderWidth * 2));
9315
9316 Connect(wxEVT_LEFT_DOWN,
9317 wxMouseEventHandler(CanvasConfigSelect::OnMouseSelected), NULL, this);
9318}
9319
9320CanvasConfigSelect::~CanvasConfigSelect() {}
9321
9322void CanvasConfigSelect::OnMouseSelected(wxMouseEvent& event) {
9323 if (!m_bSelected) {
9324 SetSelected(true);
9325 } else {
9326 SetSelected(false);
9327 }
9328 if (m_parentOptions)
9329 m_parentOptions->OnCanvasConfigSelectClick(GetId(), GetSelected());
9330}
9331
9332void CanvasConfigSelect::SetSelected(bool selected) {
9333 m_bSelected = selected;
9334
9335 if (selected) {
9336 m_boxColour =
9337 wxSystemSettings::GetColour(wxSystemColour::wxSYS_COLOUR_HIGHLIGHT);
9338 } else {
9339 m_boxColour =
9340 wxSystemSettings::GetColour(wxSystemColour::wxSYS_COLOUR_WINDOW);
9341 }
9342
9343 Refresh(true);
9344}
9345
9346void CanvasConfigSelect::OnPaint(wxPaintEvent& event) {
9347 int width, height;
9348 GetSize(&width, &height);
9349 wxPaintDC dc(this);
9350
9351 dc.SetBackground(*wxLIGHT_GREY);
9352
9353 dc.SetPen(*wxTRANSPARENT_PEN);
9354 dc.SetBrush(wxBrush(GetBackgroundColour()));
9355 dc.DrawRectangle(GetVirtualSize());
9356
9357 if (m_bSelected) {
9358 dc.SetBrush(wxBrush(m_boxColour));
9359 dc.SetPen(wxPen(
9360 wxSystemSettings::GetColour(wxSystemColour::wxSYS_COLOUR_HIGHLIGHT),
9361 3));
9362 dc.DrawRoundedRectangle(0, 0, width - 1, height - 1, height / 10);
9363 } else {
9364 dc.SetBrush(wxBrush(m_boxColour));
9365 dc.SetPen(wxPen(
9366 wxSystemSettings::GetColour(wxSystemColour::wxSYS_COLOUR_HIGHLIGHT),
9367 3));
9368 dc.DrawRoundedRectangle(0, 0, width - 1, height - 1, height / 10);
9369 }
9370
9371 dc.DrawBitmap(m_bmpNormal, m_borderWidth, m_borderWidth, false);
9372}
